Content: The app itself is obviously worse performance wise as well as UI, finding things like categories is now behind multiple other screens, the hubs for the different companies programs and movies are gone which isn‚Äôt the worst but it was something I used quite a bit. My biggest concern, and why it‚Äôs a one star review instead of maybe a 2, is how does this brand new app have 112k reviews almost all of them being 5 stars, it should be a completely different app listing since it forced me to download a COMPLETELY different app. If it is, then no one this planet can expect me to believe roughly 100 THOUSAND people gave this 5 stars almost immediately despite the fact I have not heard a single person mention anything good online or in person. I have heard tons of complaints just like mine which aren‚Äôt completely experience destroying but are nowhere near 5 stars quality. Definitely seems like something sketchy is happening there.
Title: Not great and sketchy

Content: Since the changeover from HboMax to Max, the app does not work as well. In addition to the technical difficulties others have mentioned, the Continue Watching feature appears to be broken, as these shows/episodes never actually show up there. The biggest problem, though, is that the HBO content for which many subscribe is now hidden beneath a deluge of reality TV shows. It‚Äôs mainly relegated to the HBO hub, making it difficult to explore the app and find content. This change has completely destroyed the user experience. Max‚Äôs biggest advantage and draw - prestige TV - has been mostly replaced by the kind of worthless television that fills basic cable. Honestly, even the option to customize the app‚Äôs home screen and pick the genres showing there would make me much, much happier.
Title: Worse in both functionality & content

Content: Not a bad transitions from HBO Max to max. Really the same app with a different name in terms of functionality. My biggest issue was the decision to put pop up ads, asking to stream another show or movie, on top of the content you just decided to play. Even more insulting to your intelligence is when this pop up window is blocking a preview for another show or movie that is playing before the content you selected. It‚Äôs an ad on top of their own ad, all from the same company. Why would I change my mind and stream something else after I have already made my choice? Please remove these pop up ads of give an option to turn them off.  Also, interface elements do not disappear when content is playing. The 3 dots and the line across the bottom of the screen do not disappear after a few seconds, as they should. Other video apps handle this fine. Sometimes event the time and date stay visible.
Title: Ads on top of ads‚Ä¶.

Content: A dramatic title sure, but HBO is really taking the reigns of its own demise seriously. By removing itself from the unique set of names now it‚Äôs making the brand another garbage entry in monotony by eliminating its standout color purple, removing HBO the only recognizable detail that matters about its name because max? Who really wants to sit there and think, ‚Äúman can‚Äôt wait to max and chill with so and so‚Äù. No it‚Äôs ridiculous to think that this change to be nearly identical to prime video, Facebook, Twitter, discord, Disney plus would mistaking my have people just choose one of the blue dots to watch something now. And yeah of course this is all aesthetic but isn‚Äôt that what‚Äôs really the important thing here? This brand is digging itself a hole deeper than the eye can see. I pray it goes back to the static HBO intro for something beautiful and unique rather than trying to be one of the Barbie dolls where they‚Äôre all made from the same mold. Pathetic app design and despicable lack of creativity all around.
Title: The end of HBO

Content: if i could leave a lower rating, i would. -no ability to interact with ads other than pause (no ‚Äúreport ad‚Äù, ‚Äúnot interested‚Äù, or ‚Äúwhy am i seeing this?‚Äù) -if you attempt to skip an ad by exiting and restarting, the video will no longer work until you restart the entire film, return to where you were, and watch at LEAST 2 different ad blocks in the process (one at the beginning, and at least one more when you skip to the spot you were at (this occurred SEVERAL different times, which means it‚Äôs programmed to happen)). -suddenly the plan i‚Äôm paying for has ads, when i originally purchased a plan with no ads for the same price. i am receiving no additional amenities; and significantly worse customer experience, so i‚Äôm unsure as to why i‚Äôm paying the same/or more and receiving significantly less. tldr; ‚Äúhbo max‚Äù is awful. unless you NEED to watch a specific show, i‚Äôd recommend absolutely ANY. other option.
Title: awful

Content: I don‚Äôt know what was wrong with the previous version of this app. In my opinion, it was way more user friendly. One way in particular that the new version bothers me is that it doesn‚Äôt save my spot on season episodes that I‚Äôve already seen. I am one who watches the same episodes over and over again. Yes, I‚Äôve seen them before. Yes, I want to watch them again. With the new app, every time I want to pull up something I‚Äôve already seen, it makes me search for it again and does not save my spot in where I was re-watching it. I think it‚Äôs because it thinks I‚Äôve already seen it and don‚Äôt want to keep it in my list anymore?? Definitely a first world problem, I know. But the old app didn‚Äôt do that, and I am very frustrated that they changed it completely to something else that is frankly subpar.
Title: Not friendly to those who want to watch the same show over and over again

Content: So here we are: after all the hype, HBO Max has become ‚ÄúMax,‚Äù a clunky app apparently coded by people who never used a streaming service before. It‚Äôs ridiculously difficult to find whatever you‚Äôre trying to watch. Some unqualified person decided to add content and remove the sidebar menu. There are no useful menus or easy hubs, just multicolored tiles randomly hidden in the middle of the home page and the bottom of everything else. Even worse, the category tiles at the bottom throw everything together into giant buckets, with no way to sort the BRANDS corporate Hollywood loves so much. You scroll and scroll and scroll and scroll.  I refuse to believe this thing was tested with users, journey maps, or anything else. I gave it three stars for its content, but this is one of the worst streaming apps out there.
Title: Menus? Hubs? Organization? Just scroll forever!

Content: Who sat in the board to approve this change? We‚Äôll never know. Was there something wrong with the old app? Not that I‚Äôve found in 2 years of use. But hey! Who doesn‚Äôt want to see a BRIGHT A F BLUE SCREEN in their living room at 9:30 PM while trying to wind down for the night??? Well, not us. Best of all, there‚Äôs no dark mode for the TV app üôÑ. And how long has HBO been known all over as HBO? Longer than I‚Äôve been alive. But hey now it‚Äôs Max! Max what? What Max? Nope just max‚Ä¶  But for a real complaint, this UI is a step backwards or at least in the wrong direction. Had I not paid for a year up front, I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd bother with this app. And the new suggestions and related content is either nothing related or pushing unpopular shows. The same shows pop up for the popular now and trending but we‚Äôve had to scroll and scroll to find shows we were meaning to start on.  Anyways, guess we‚Äôll deal with the ULTRA BLUE and cheap UI for the days ahead.
Title: Don‚Äôt break what‚Äôs not broken

Content: The new Max is terrible! It does NOT keep track of where you left off with a series so you better write it down, take a picture, or have a photographic memory. Also, if you want to watch a specific episode, you have to choose the episode prior to that, because it starts playing from the end of the episode you selected, and starts the next one from the beginning. For example, if I want to watch S1:Ep3, the app will play the credits from that episode, and start playing S1:E4 even though that isn‚Äôt what was selected. Very annoying!   You no longer have the option to choose your own picture for your profile. I also can‚Äôt access everything on my list from the home screen. I have to use the left navigation and choose ‚Äúmy stuff‚Äù to access my entire list. I‚Äôm not sure what prompted these changes but the previous version of the app was just fine. These ‚Äúupdates‚Äù were completely unnecessary.
Title: Unnecessary

Content: I have a few titles in rotation to be completed for viewing however, every now and then I will see a title be removed without me knowing it as well as certain titles I watch not being at the right spot I left off because it didn‚Äôt recognize it was watched on another device.  Also when watching the titles via a streaming smart tv like Roku, etc the show toggle description is a bit delayed and jumpy and it doesn‚Äôt appear for the viewer to start from the beginning of the title, in any case it has to be rewind manually to the beginning.   There are still a few more bugs to fix but the titles available are good.
Title: The titles are good but the app/channel still needs work

Content: Let me start by saying that as soon as I noticed the shuffle button was gone I knew Max would be a total let down. Max works decently enough on my iPhone but it is frustrating that I have to airplay shows on Max onto my smart tv because the app on Roku is horrendous. The interface is slow and glitchy and the couple of shows I‚Äôve watched since downloading Max have horrible issues with audio playback. The audio is corrupted and you hear what‚Äôs happening at least 30 seconds before you even see the events on the screen. Airplaying shows from Max on my iPhone onto Max on my smart tv is the only way to avoid this and it‚Äôs annoying. HBOMax was doing so good before it got switched to Max. The interface was running smoothly and there were no audio issues. We even had a shuffle button! It‚Äôs a shame the Max app has taken such massive steps back from the progress HBOMax had made.
Title: Extremely slow and horrible audio problems

Content: Back when it was HBO max my family loved it. The last couple months of it‚Äôs life as HBO max it didn‚Äôt add much good content, but we held on. Now the change to MAX has arrived and we‚Äôre all disappointed. The previous amenities we had like 4K and ‚Äúpremium audio‚Äù are locked behind their ‚Äúultimate package‚Äù at $20. If you let your account carry over it puts you in the middle ground remaining at $15 but you lose 4K and basically all hearing capabilities. Before I‚Äôd have my volume set to 30 or 35 and hear just fine. Now I have to put my volume up to 80 to hear anything. It‚Äôs not my tv I checked other streaming services and they‚Äôre fine. With the lack of good content and forcing the kind of tv you would only watch when you‚Äôre home sick from school this revised app is a complete failure. The only reason they don‚Äôt have 1 star is because they have some nostalgic content but that‚Äôll only save them for so long.
Title: Disappointing Change

Content: I wish there were better category options like HBO Max had, and also a like or dislike option so you could be recommended to what you might like. I used Discovery+ only for paranormal stuff and HBO Max for Studio Ghibli and it‚Äôs just annoyingly frustrating to find what I liked watching before now since everything is so generally categorized instead of its own page. It feels like any other streaming app now with simple, boring categories, and too many items thrown all over the place (pretty much why I don‚Äôt watch Netflix much anymore, it‚Äôs all too chaotic even with the ‚Äúlike/dislike‚Äù features). I‚Äôm hoping it gets better over time, as the fluid overlays were what kept me coming back to both HBO Max and Discovery+
Title: A good start, features could be polished more

Content: I don‚Äôt understand for the life of me why don‚Äôt they just release the DC comics universe content directly, and exclusively to HBO max? I‚Äôm not paying all this money for HBO max for nothing. I specifically paid HBO Max to give me everything DC hubÔøº can offer, so why not release the newest content DC comics Universe has to offer DIRECTLY TO THE DC HUB/HBOmax?????? ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è üò° This is why, as much as I hate to say it because I hate (SJW PROPAGANDA) & the directions that Marvel/Disney are going; but that is the edge that Disney and marvel has over Warner Bros./DC. Ôøº All Marvel content, for the most part is exclusively released on Disney+. Yet you have to wonder & guess what is included on HBO Max and what isn‚Äôt because it seems like there‚Äôs so much missing for the DC hub. In fact, the DC hub doesn‚Äôt even really get much screen promotion on their app. It‚Äôs almost like they want them to be on the back burner or forgotten about and it‚Äôs a shame, because if it wasn‚Äôt for DC, I could care less about HBO.Ôøº
Title: NOT ENOUGH DC content & appreciation

Content: There are dozens of minor issues with downloading and actually watching the content, like with the previous app, but this app seems to have an even worse issue; it‚Äôs impossible to watch some movies and certain episodes.   For example, I wanted to watch the Flash, but last night it didn‚Äôt show up in my downloads. Weird, it should be there. Now, I go to watch it while online, and it‚Äôs just a black screen. Closing the app does not fix it, deleting the download (which my phone DID still see, in storage settings) and even restarting my phone did nothing. I literally cannot watch what Max is advertising. The same thing happened to an episode of Rick and Morty.   This isn‚Äôt a bug report, this is just an example of how much of a mess this app is. Somehow, a downgrade of the bugfest HboMax app was. I‚Äôd prefer to watch this content, but I‚Äôm pretty much forced to use Netflix because it actually works!
Title: Just doesn‚Äôt work

Content: It has a good variety of shows and not too expensive.  The only problem though is the constant changing in ‚Äúcurrently watching‚Äù.  The most common occurrence I see is the show I‚Äôm watching to go back to the beginning/after the intro after pausing for a minimum of 2 minutes (ex. Get a something to drink, press play and you at back at the beginning of the episode).  It also skips over half an episode after pressing play.  I‚Äôm trying to binge several shows so it is quite annoying. However, this platform is the best when it comes to anyone with a DC fix, action shows/movies, or episodes being posted after a few days. Please stop the skips/trips- I would‚Äôve thought that this issue would have been fixed due to having a previous platform.
Title: Stop the skips and trips

Content: Not many from time to time the darker parts at the bottom and top of my screen (from checking remaining time or pausing the movie/show) will remain after the other has gone away and I have to restart the app to get it to go away (at first I thought it was just my phone but then it happened on my television and I thought maybe it‚Äôs my wife but tonight me and a friend were watching a movie and it happened on theirs too- so I know it‚Äôs not just my account or my wifi) -some times the subtitles are cut off at the bottom of the screen (also tested this in several ways my phone and the movie with my friend) -that‚Äôs it and like I said these are minor issues that don‚Äôt extremely effect my viewing experience
Title: MINOR GLITCHES

Content: Since the change from HBOMax to Max the cell phone application has had several issues causing it to crash and also to crash my entire phone and cause it to restart.  The app has stalled and left the screen frozen while streaming audio continued for 6/6 uses and had caused my phone to restart mid-streaming 4/6 uses.  If I get a notification or adjust the volume controls while the application is running, the screen direction will automatically adjust and rotate instead of remaining in the direction of phone rotation. This occurs even with the screen rotation locked! These are not cell phone issues, I have a relatively new phone updated to the most recent OS. No problems on the television applications so far as I can tell. And yes, all my favorites are still there, the same great HBO selection. But the phone crashing is the most annoying thing ever.
Title: Buggy

Content: I‚Äôll be canceling my subscription. I am not interested in their new discovery content. If I wanted that content I would have subscribed to it in the past. I was hoping that there would be lots of new movies to watch in the new Max app but instead it‚Äôs almost entirely the same old selection I had with HBO MAX. If it was just the lack luster new selection I wouldn‚Äôt have been so disappointed but the app itself is harder to use than the former HBO MAX app. Before I could quickly select recently added and leaving soon and would be brought to a the entire selection of new or leaving content. Now they are buried in a new & notable section that only shows a fraction of the content it used too. I feel like they added lots of content I was not interested in that I scroll past in order to give the illusion that there is lots of content when it is just junk to skip past.
Title: Added nothing of value and harder to use

Content: This app contains the best quality out of all the streaming apps in my opinion. However, this is because HBO was already known for it‚Äôs high production. The previous app went from being barely functional, to working exceptionally well.  This app has restarted all of that progress and works okay with much to improve.  I constantly cast to chromecast from the app and it works maybe half of the time. On top of this, the app stretches the image which isn‚Äôt an issue but is off putting.   A big functional issue is when casting, there is no slider to rewind, fast-forward, play next episode or anything. This is highly unintuitive as wherever the video is becomes where you are stuck.  These functions do exist except that they are only there 40-50% of the time causing me to have to constantly disconnect, reconnect to the chromecast and hope the settings are there. THEN, once I finally close the app and get settled, if I ever wanna change the time again there‚Äôs a chance the options aren‚Äôt there and I‚Äôll have to go through the whole process to obtain basic app functionality with time control in a streaming app.  0 stars for the functionality, 3 for content.
Title: Good quality / poor implementation

Content: I loved the old app. When it was time for the new one I didn‚Äôt mind. I didn‚Äôt mind that the name changed, that the color scheme was different, or that I would have to completely redownload a new app. Then I started actually using it. I‚Äôm watching one of my shows and it keeps restarting where I am in the show. It will either rewind itself, jump to the end, or skip episodes either in the middle of me watching it or when I go to watch it the next time. Also, I started watching a new show and every time I log on it completely disappears from my continued watching and this happens whether it‚Äôs a brand new show or a show that I have already seen but want to watch again. I love the content that is on this app but it‚Äôs unorganized and dis functional. Please fix it!
Title: Max

Content: Hbo has been a pain when it comes to audio subtitles and captions. Out of all the streaming services it is so unnecessarily complicated. It only works when it‚Äôs watched directly from the phone. When I try to do anything with the audio it always says you can customize in settings, despite the fact the they could literally just do it on the home page or on the show or movie itself there is also nothing in the settings for it. When I try to chrome cast it has commercials and subtitles in English but won‚Äôt let me change the language from Spanish. When I try to watch on Roku the audio was audio description for English and English description so there was narration over the show. It‚Äôs literally comical how it‚Äôs always one little thing that has to ruin it. It sucked on Hbo Max and nothing changed. Except the blue which was a choice, a bad one but a choice indeed.
Title: Audio Subtitles Languages

Content: Last update troublesome, then most recent makes it impossible to continue streaming where you left off if you are using from cell phone to cast.  -if you cast a movie or show from your phone, then put your phone down/ have to take a break and hit pause/ the app times out, even if it‚Äôs been a minute - You can‚Äôt just hit app to start where you left off. You have to close app. Then open app again and restarts the movie from beginning and in mobile watching mode. And sound all the way to 100! No ‚Äúresume‚Äù even if you hit resume.  -then have to wait movie to load to beginning, turn down volume, switch to Not mobile mode, and then fast forward manually scrolling to if you remember what minute you left off on‚Ä¶  I want to relax when using, pause when I need and assume it will pick up where I left off like all other streaming apps.
Title: Steaming via Mobile

Content: This trash pile of an app keeps spiking up the volume to my tv speakers all the way to 100. If casting gives the app read and write rights I don‚Äôt want it plus it‚Äôs slow loading a simple movie with ads takes nearly 2 mins. And now I can‚Äôt get rid of auto description!!! Control of language needs to be in settings and option for auto description language also needs to be global in the settings part of the app as to how this app keeps choosing Spanish for me makes no sense I‚Äôve deleted and installed cleared my cache if cast even from my laptop and I‚Äôm running to the same issues??????? How ????????   I‚Äôm experiencing this issues of auto-description with the movie ready player one the same issue isn‚Äôt there for other movies and tv series but thats there across all movies and series it the spiking of my tv speakers something no streaming app does
Title: Reduce latency and read and write rights while casting

Content: This used to be my favorite streaming service but now it‚Äôs nearing the bottom of my list. The bugs are endless. If I pause a movie or a show, no matter what it is, it jumps back to a random spot in the show/movie so I have to fast-forward or do a funky trick to prevent that from happening. For a while it also didn‚Äôt show the shows I was in the middle of watching in my ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù list. I haven‚Äôt noticed that bug in a while, but I also don‚Äôt use this app as much as I used to because of all of the bugs. I also don‚Äôt like the new UI for shows at all. What was wrong with the grid?? I hate side-scrolling, it‚Äôs so inefficient and unnecessary. Please go back to the original UI or something, this is driving me crazy. Y‚Äôall have so many good shows and movies but they‚Äôre almost unwatchable since of this integration!!
Title: I miss HBOMax.

Content: Was this streaming service necessary? HBO Max was the best streaming service ever until Discovery got their mitts on it. First off, why did you get rid of the custom profile pic feature? I thought that was so cool and unique for a streaming service to allow people to customize their profile icon with photos from their phone. Second, I see a lot of purged anime from the service, and I highly doubt it‚Äôs because of your licensing with Sony expiring. It‚Äôs because your too lazy to put both English and Japanese version of said anime on the platform. The only anime you managed to keep both in English and Japanese were the Studio Ghibli films and you streamed the language separately. Overall, not a great start for a service such as this. I miss HBO Max, and I wish David Zaslav would be fired already.
Title: Same streaming service, but with less features and a lot of purged content

Content: The UI leaves an awful lot to be desired. It‚Äôs an incredibly frustrating adventure to scroll through the endless jumble of disorganized and mashed up content. I don‚Äôt particularly care to scroll through Sister Wives and My 600lb life in an attempt to find a DC movie or a hard hitting documentary. While you can search by hubs the process to get there is equally as aggravating as scrolling. The main page feels like a cluttered nightmare and the process of trying to find something to watch makes me just click out of the app and head to somewhere else. As a user of Discovery+ and HBO Max I can honestly say I never had a desire for the content to be smashed together, let alone in such an unappealing package. I‚Äôm sure performance issues can be addressed on future updates but the entire concept is a mess from the ground up.
Title: Horrible To Navigate

Content: This app is so much worse ‚Äî so much less user-friendly ‚Äî than the previous HBOMax version!  For example, you used to be able to view your list of bookmarked shows/movies in alphabetical order, which was very convenient for finding the title I wanted to watch.  That capability is gone.  Now you must view your list in the order in which you bookmarked the titles, which frankly is less than useless.  Why would they get rid of letting the customer choose?? Also, they got rid of the option menu (upper left corner of the old app).  It was very convenient for navigating around.  And it‚Äôs not as though they replaced it with anything better.  They just took away that convenience.  It‚Äôs as if they put all their energy into making the app look snazzy and decided to ignore functionality and user-friendliness.  Blech!
Title: Dreadful!

Content: I have been a loyal HBO subscriber for many years, and I have always been happy with the service. However, since the launch of HBO Max, I have been completely unable to use the app on my Apple TV. The app simply will not download, no matter what I do. I have tried restarting my Apple TV, logging out and back into my HBO Max account, and even deleting and reinstalling the app, but nothing has worked.  I am beyond frustrated with this issue. I pay a premium for HBO Max, and I expect the service to work flawlessly. But instead, I am forced to use my iPhone or AirPlay to watch HBO every time I want to use my Apple TV. This is a complete and utter inconvenience, and it is unacceptable.  To make matters worse, HBO has decided to rebrand itself as HBO Max. Is it the new Cinemax streaming service? Because that‚Äôs what it sounds like. I understand that HBO wanted to create a new brand that would appeal to a wider audience, but I think they made a mistake by changing the name from HBO to HBO Max. HBO was a well-known and respected brand, and I think the new name is confusing and unnecessary.  HBO was the best household brand name for decades, recognized around the world by millions, and you basically threw it in the garbage. I am now considering cancelling my HBO Max subscription, and I will not be recommending HBO to anyone in the future.
Title: MAX Does NOT work with Apple TV

Content: They say you can‚Äôt put lipstick on a pig and call it a girlfriend. You also can‚Äôt change the name of HBO and pretend it matters. HBO programming and universal understanding of what movies are necessary to make and/or license makes them a premium and will always keep them that way. I recommend that they rerelease specific shows. I understand that they are trying to get away from the old label of a more adult program channel. But, with shows about drug smuggling, middle aged women living in NYC, and documentaries about cults, I say if you can‚Äôt beat them, run everyone else out of the market. Double down on it and make a killing.
Title: It‚Äôs hbo‚Ä¶what do you expect?

Content: The new Max app is lacking functionality when it comes to casting. The main issue for me is the continuous narration throughout each and every episode that I cannot seem able to get rid off. This is very frustrating. I have tried every from uninstalling and reinstalling the app to switching from English to Spanish narration (there is no off option to turn that feature off). Additionally, when the substitutes are own, some episodes will just skip into the next episode 5 mins into it (this will not happen if the subtitles are off). Finally, as others have mentioned, the episodes do not start where I left off. In terms of contents, Max excels when compared to Netflix but in terms of ease of use and functionally, the Netflix app blows this one out of the water. This app needs major overhaul and those updates need to be pushed rapidly.
Title: App experience is terrible

Content: I‚Äôm not sure how to leave feedback on the  appletv App Store version so I‚Äôm doing it here.  There‚Äôs a weird bug where when I‚Äôm watching a show/movie I have to press the left/right side of the pad twice to jump forward/back the first tome.  Once the scrubber line at the bottom displays I can then press once as expected.  In the HBO max app it would take action on the very first press.  Also, everything (and I mean everything) is super quiet.  I can‚Äôt crank my tv up high enough to actually hear what people are saying when I‚Äôm watching something.  I‚Äôm not experiencing this in other appletv apps and I don‚Äôt remembering it being a problem on the hbomax app so im assuming it‚Äôs something with this app versus my setup.  I‚Äôm hoping there‚Äôs a resolution for it on this app.
Title: AppleTV version needs work

Content: Let me start by saying Max has the best show selection of any streaming app. That fact makes me all the more frustrated with how awful its app is.   The HBO Max app was the worst functioning of all the services I have before this rebrand, and I expected them to put some care into this new one. It‚Äôs even worse. No auto play, no skip intro button, I have to turn captions on manually every episode, and it remembers I haven‚Äôt finished the credits on things I‚Äôve already seen. Today it completely skipped an episode of The Sopranos so I've gotta go back and watch it out of order.   It felt like nobody qualify tested the old app and this one is significantly worse. The Netflix app functioned better than this in 2010. Unbelievably poor effort. If you spend millions on shows and your fancy new branding put an ounce of time into making the user experience work.
Title: Downgrade on a flawed product

Content: I‚Äôve used MAX (and HBO Max before it) for a few years now. It has a lot of great shows, but the one thing holding it back is the horrendous app experience.  I download shows when I have WiFi so I can watch videos at high quality, because there is limited internet availability/low data connection. So I download a series when I have the chance, make sure it‚Äôs downloaded, then put my tablet in my bag. Big surprise the next day when I‚Äôm 100 miles from internet that MAX has signed me out, and as a result, deleted all the downloads.   MAX also has a glitch where even in offline mode, it will spam you with a notification (Halloween, Hispanic Month, etc) every time you pause the show. Sometimes you unpause the show, and a minute later the notification pops back up.
Title: Great Shows, Horrible App

Content: Somehow I had two different hbomax accounts under the same hbo login info (apple and google play) and was getting charged under both. I decided let the google play account subscription expire and just use the apple account. However, once that happened I couldn‚Äôt log in on my apple device while simultaneously getting monthly charges subscription charges from the apple account.  I tried to resolve this with hbomax customer support who was no help. I decided to cancel the apple account and start fresh. Then I attempted to renew on my apple device and when I create the account I received an error message, the account was not created and HBOMax charged me anyway. They charged me for a service for which they didn‚Äôt provide.   I‚Äôve never had an issue like this in my life. Please be careful with this app and your money, because HBOMax isn‚Äôt.
Title: HBOMax Will Steal Your Money

Content: Apple users love their Apple TV because it has a lot of useful features. I have a TV that supports Dolby Vision and so does my Apple TV.  Normally I‚Äôll only get Dolby Vision settings when I‚Äôm playing Dolby Vision content. However, in the Max tvOS app it thinks everything I‚Äôm playing is Dolby Vision when we know that can‚Äôt possibly me true. It affects the color accuracy. Then things like ‚Äúwhat did they say‚Äù don‚Äôt work, neither does precision fast forwarding or rewinding using the touch controls. These are not issues when using Apple‚Äôs native player. You already tried using a custom player in HBO Max and got so much backlash because it broke all the features Apple TV users love and had to switch back to Apple‚Äôs native player a week later. I don‚Äôt know why you thought it would be a good idea to use your custom player after it failed the first time.
Title: Stop using a custom player on tvOS

Content: Broken watchlist. Anything you want to watch starts over every time you open the app, if it even remembers at all. Watchlist often disappears altogether. I thought paramount+ was the worst streaming app ever made until this utter garbage. Enjoy still getting my money, because there‚Äôs shows I want to be able to watch. 1 star for having those shows, suffering through this horrible app. Edit: having the same issues as everyone else with casting to a tv. You could watch 8 episodes of something consecutively, open app to pause, and here you go! Let‚Äôs start the same episode you started 6 hours ago, or something else entirely, who knows! Pay attention to the dev responses to these bad reviews. They aren‚Äôt actually responding to any of these problems, instead offering vague redirects to generic troubleshooting.
Title: The bugs are insufferable and omnipresent.

Content: The new Max app improved in one area: it no longer crashes all the time like HBO Max did. That said, now the app just logs me out every few days, and for some reason the login info isn‚Äôt saved so that I can just login with TouchID - instead I have to go to chrome, copy the password, type it in again, re-login. It gets really annoying when you have to do it twice a week. Also, outputting video from my iPad to a TV no longer works well - it doesn‚Äôt go full screen, it stays in the square-ish form from the iPad screen. Again, backwards instead of forwards. So, the new Max fixed one thing, broke two‚Ä¶ why am I not surprised? Please fix it‚Ä¶ then again I‚Äôve been asking HBO to fix their apps for years now, so‚Ä¶
Title: Doesn‚Äôt crash anymore, but logs out all the time and doesn‚Äôt output to TV well anymore

Content: If you  want to download and subscribe to watch a specific tv show or movie on this app-don‚Äôt. I specifically searched (on google) where I could watch Fear the Walking Dead. Max is the first thing to pop up with a subtext reading: we have all your favorites! Of course on the website it says they have the show. So I go ahead and download the app ready to binge my show to hopefully escape my mental state for a little bit. But no- there is no fear the walking dead or even an amc network tab. I was tricked into subscribing for $10, plus I have to remember to cancel next month. If I had money to waste I wouldn‚Äôt be this irritated, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend getting the app. ONLY if you know for a fact that what you want to watch is on there. It‚Äôs not like you can double check before subscribing either, as you have to pay to even access the search bar.
Title: Horrible.

Content: Max has to be the best video streaming platform out there. Here are several reasons why I believe this.  1.) The end user - so easy to navigate through even the elderly in my life love using this platform. 2.) quantity - Max offers so many movies and series you literally can‚Äôt find something that peaks your interest. 3.) variety - MAX offers such a wide variety of genres, again they have to have something that peeks your interest. 4.) Finally The QUALITY - Max doesn‚Äôt just offer an abundant of movies and/or TV series. Max is not like a cable company that offers a 100 channels and 40 of the channels are home shopping networks. Max offers quality I.e. The Flash it was in the theaters recently. Even better a series like ‚ÄúWARRIOR‚Äù this series was hands down the best in history. It offered drama, action, western and Saturday afternoon karate movies. This show ‚ÄúWARRIOR‚Äù has it all rolled up into 1 series. I can‚Äôt stress enough how great Max is. Thank you!!!  P.S.    You think you could right another season of ‚ÄúWARRIOR‚Äù !!! It‚Äôs GREAT!!!
Title: Best video streaming app

Content: Very pleased with the MAX app. It is easy to navigate, find and select shows.  SHOW-WISE: I recently watched Perry Mason on MAX and was thrilled to find such a high quality show!  I found that this MAX series has top notch writing, directing, production, and acting!  My family and I were so disappointed to learn that it was not renewed for a third season!  I hope that MAX executives will reconsider their decision (was not renewing the series at this time due to the writers‚Äô strike perhaps?). MAX will only thrive in the future with high quality productions that retains viewers.  Give we‚Äôll done productions time to find their audience.
Title: Easy App to Navigate & Quality Shows

Content: I used to have some problems with HBO Max, but now with this new update, I have problems everywhere. Every device I stream on will buffer and lag. There are ads everywhere where they weren‚Äôt before. HBO was much better than Max. Why is it named Max? Why was the color changed? None of this makes sense and has just destroyed what HBO used to be. Should‚Äôve just updated HBO and not changed the entire platform. Such a bummer.  I also never had many ads on HBO. Maybe one at the start of every episode which was fine but now it lags and cuts off in the middle of my episodes and movies. Max wont even work for me half the time saying there‚Äôs a ‚Äúproblem‚Äù with the connection when I am right next to and connected to the router. Max is not dependable anymore. Might as well spend my money on a service that won‚Äôt change for the worse
Title: Worse than hbo

Content: HBO Max used to be my favorite streaming platform, but I never thought to myself what it needs is commercials and more reality tv. Discovery content belongs on a separate streaming service. I‚Äôm not interested in that kind of television at all. I know I‚Äôm not alone in my distaste for reality tv. It was great before and the choice to end shows like Titans was a huge mistake. I wasn‚Äôt finished watching Westworld and after paying ever climbing monthly subscription fees I don‚Äôt pay for individual shows. Yanking content with no warning is considered rude these days. I was really looking forward to Batgirl. The new trend in streaming services charging more money for 4K and less users is getting ridiculous. I have a family, we don‚Äôt always watch tv together. The entire rebrand is an epic fail in my book.
Title: Shake down not shake up

Content: Max is a streaming app that gives access to so many favorites from the past decades of television and film. I love perceiving all of the old sitcoms from Disney and abc that were released in the 90‚Äôs. Full House, Family Matters, and Step by Step are just a few of the titles that I genuinely enjoy. I am grateful that I have instant access to so many of the stories that showcase wholesome family values and moral ethics. It‚Äôs also a thrill being able to perceive the  rom-coms of the early 2000‚Äôs as well. Max has many great classics in all genres. In today‚Äôs culture and world of streaming Max is most definitely the spot for great entertainment.
Title: Classics in Max

Content: I have had hbo app from hbo now to hbo go to hbo max to now just max. This is by far the WORST launch of their new app. It wouldn‚Äôt recognize my account as a user. I spent an hour chatting with support with absolutely no resolution and ended up cancelling my subscription and creating a brand new one because it didn‚Äôt seem like I would get any answer or real help. This app doesn‚Äôt always give you the option to continue watching episodes of a show you‚Äôre watching. If the show isn‚Äôt saved on your list you have to search for the show and then hopefully you remember what episodes you‚Äôve seen because the app sometimes doesn‚Äôt have that you‚Äôve seen the episode. I‚Äôm really hoping the app function gets better because I‚Äôm about ready to cancel for good.
Title: Horrible new app launch

Content: Hi, when I did a free trial on watching this show called M√¥nica and Friends or simply in Portuguese called ‚ÄúTurma Da M√¥nica‚Äù their new episodes have been released, and I was trying to see if I could watch it, but it‚Äôs not available in the United States even if the episodes aren‚Äôt dubbed in English, and when I used an app called expressVPN to have the country and region changed to Brazil to make my phone think that I‚Äôm in the Brazil even though I‚Äôm not per say. And when I did that, it wouldn‚Äôt let me access it because of the name change from HBO MAX to just MAX, I want to when it‚Äôll be available for the Latin American so I can have access watching it, even though it‚Äôs from Brazil dubbed both in Portuguese and Spanish. Please help.
Title: Searching a foreign show

Content: Every time I open the app on my tv and click play on my shows it starts playing in Spanish instead of English. The only thing that‚Äôs fixed it is hitting pause, clicking on the caption button on the bottom (that already says English) and just hitting the back button without changing a thing. So stupid. I never had that problem with HBO. And now after a while it just won‚Äôt load after a while and if you go back and then try to click play it still won‚Äôt load. I have to turn my tv off and back on to force close the app and then hit play. Definitely a downgrade. Also this has nothing to do with app performance but I prefer the purple that HBO was. It was fun and different from the other apps. Now it‚Äôs just boring blue like everything else.
Title: Issues

Content: HBOMax was easily the best streaming service available, not just in terms of its content but the way the app was set up. There was a sense of exclusivity and prestige to the different hubs, like TCM and DC. You could easily check what was expiring and when. Now you can only search by genre, so Batman is now right next to Big Mamas House, and though it does have a ‚Äúleaving soon‚Äù section right at the bottom, it doesn‚Äôt tell you when and doesn‚Äôt seem to be complete, based on lists of expiring titles posted online. Movies that are listed in the ‚Äúfeatured‚Äù section aren‚Äôt listed  in the A-Z section, and if it really so hard to program your multi million dollar service to not list all the titles beginning with ‚Äúthe‚Äù in the T section? We went from a classy, sophisticated, and intuitive set up to something generic and lazy
Title: From crucial to crap

Content: I downloaded a bunch of content onto the app for a long plane ride. But when I came back to the app after pausing a movie for a bit, the app was totally non-functional. It was just a blank blue screen and wouldn‚Äôt load anything even though I restarted the app and restarted my iPad.   Now that I am off the plane I am signed out and I can‚Äôt sign back in because the ‚Äúconnect your provider‚Äù option doesn‚Äôt work (at least not for xfinity). You get caught in an infinite loop where you log in to xfinity, then a pop up browser appears with xfinity homepage where you need to sign in again. And then when you do, nothing happens. When you click out of the pop-up browser the app just says ‚ÄúAn error occurred! Something went wrong. Please try again.‚Äù  As the title says, a total total failure of an app. Unusable and unreliable.
Title: Total failure

Content: I opened the new Max app today with zero issues on web or mobile iOS when transferring from previous HBO Max. The Max interface is clear and continues to provide a better experience than Netflix on access to shows I am currently watching and for recommendations based on watch history. A plus that I was interested in is the expanded library with additional shows from Discovery. Love the range and options with no increase to cost. Not sure how anyone can argue against more choices with an effective user experience. This is a step in a very good direction.
Title: New Max App and Content - Excellent

Content: This app is a buggy mess. Why take away an app that worked (HBO Max) and replace it with something that removed useful features, is poorly designed, and can‚Äôt handle the essential elements needed for a streaming app.  This app doesn‚Äôt do some of the most basic things expected of a streaming app. Like saving where I was when watching a show. I‚Äôm midway through a season of a show but instead of saving it under Continue Watching and showing where I left off, I have to go search for the show again, try to remember which episode I was on, and then try to find where I stopped watching within the episode.  Other useful features like hubs for the different channels or types of content are gone. We can no longer edit the Continue Watching list (though I guess maybe that doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs not going to save anything new in that list).  Even little things like having episodes for a show on a single line now instead of the much more user friendly version from HBO Max where episodes scrolled down the page making it quick and easy to see them.  The only good thing about Max is that if it stays like it is, I‚Äôll save money no longer having this subscription.
Title: A huge step backwards

Content: As a very long time massive fan of hbo I am stunned with how bad this new ‚Äúmax‚Äù app is. I‚Äôm terms of hbo as a whole it‚Äôs still the best place for tv shows period. But specifically the new max service is trash it has so many bugs it crashes on my phone, and it hardly functions on my actual tv when the old app didn‚Äôt have any issues. I really miss hbo go ever sense they started rebranding a couple years ago it‚Äôs gone down hill. The only upside is they added a lot of new content some of which I enjoy but I could go without most of it as I mostly use hbo for actual original hbo content. Please hbo stop rebranding and focus on the stuff the true fans truly want, a clean easy to use service to watch all our favorite hbo shows in hd. Absolutely nobody was asking for all this other garbage and it was not worth the rebrand.
Title: Hbo what are you doing.

Content: It‚Äôs amazing how bad this app is. I use it on consoles and on a smart cast tv and the quality is worse than Netflix. The quality of the last app HBO Max was nice; you could choose a show and have it play on shuffle instead of choosing a start place and dealing with everything after. It was cool to have that feature for shows to watch. Now the connection is subpar; it‚Äôs a nice clear sky out and internet is good, yet the graphics regularly become a colour mess on screen, blurring together as if the screen is breaking, and the menu is frustrating when choosing episodes it continues when it stopped. Meaning it‚Äôll play the last 3 seconds before playing the next. If I‚Äôm paying for this app I expect it to be at least polished to the public instead of preforming like a 30fps game on Xbox.
Title: Either fix it or don‚Äôt bother paying

Content: There are many things I dislike about this app. First, they made a whole new app that I was forced to install instead of just changing the original one which is just extra. I really hate the name. You can‚Äôt even tell that it‚Äôs hbo because now it‚Äôs literally just called max. It‚Äôs such a basic name and I feel like it‚Äôs trying to hard to be minimalistic but does a horrible job at it. I personally dislike the blue theme of the app and prefer the old purple. HBO max before was very slow no matter what I did but this app is just as or even worse. I can‚Äôt see the photos for anything and it never ends up loading. (Not my wifi) the only positive I see of this app is that there are better profile photos. I regret paying for HBO max ever since it changed to this and I might cancel because this app is so annoying.
Title: Just bad.

Content: I hate that once I finish an episode of a tv series the next episode doesn‚Äôt show up in my continue watching for when im ready to CONTINUE WATCHING said show. Instead I have to either search the show or scroll FOREVER and hope I find it then scroll to the episode im looking for (which is super hard when I‚Äôm rewatching a show and every episode appears as already watched). Why doesn‚Äôt it just show up in the continue watching section because I‚Äôm continue watching THE SHOW. If it‚Äôs not fixed I‚Äôll continue my business with paramount or another service instead. Seriously every single streaming app keeps the shows your watching in the continue watching section until you finish the whole series. Make it make sense.
Title: Can‚Äôt find my shows easily

Content: The functionality of the new Max app is frustrating and a poor experience. It reminds me of Netflix, but harder to navigate. In order to access movies by genre, while in the movie section I have to scroll all the way to the bottom, but the app can‚Äôt keep up and I get stuck waiting for all the cute-name-suggestion categories to load. Then, once I‚Äôm in the genre, it offers Featured, A-Z. Series, and Movies instead of just movies. Then when you try to select Movies, the cursor automatically kicks back up to the suggestions for you, as you move through the four items, so you have to move the cursor back down each time. This interface is terrible. Please fix this. You have made it so much harder to find movies to watch.
Title: New app is not great

Content: Navigation is better then all my other movie apps I have 4-5 the selection on max is great I think again better then the other apps I have if I had to make a complaint it‚Äôs that max does rotate movies instead of holding a growing library just like other apps I do not and have not liked that from any movie app but it like this if max doesn‚Äôt have it and someone els does I wish it had just been in max I prefer to use max somthing about the max app just feel better the any other movie app Iv ever used not just the ones I have
Title: If it‚Äôs not on max I wish it was I prefer to use max

Content: And my sister love to watch Max because there‚Äôs so many good shows on it my dad loves to watch Max too it‚Äôs very fun to him because he likes to watch Xbox and stuff he likes to watch a lot of stuff but other than that Max you are my my queen I love you leave me that‚Äôs literally the only app I have it‚Äôs nice could I please get a membership for free I told you everything I love about this because my family always watches Max we love to watch Max I like to watch Max because I can also wash my hair like Superman wonder woman and all the others I love it I want all this love your favorite fan
Title: Love it üòç

Content: I love the shows that are on max but since the switch from hbo max to max i no longer have a ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù section and it doesn‚Äôt keep my spot of where I‚Äôm at in a series so i have to remember where I‚Äôm at each time. Things are no longer alphabetical when searching. So the for ever scrolling to find something is annoying. THE PURPLE WAS ICONIC. Many other issues that are listed on other reviews i agree with. The app was perfect the way it was, downloading a whole new app for it to be like an off brand app is so disappointing considering the amount of push this new app got. All it needed was a name change and the additions of the newer shows & channels. The channels added is a very nice feature which i appreciate but the rest needs fixing
Title: Max Needs Fixing

Content: When I first got this app a year or so ago I was so excited to be able to see all of my favorite cartoon networks shows and even some that I didn‚Äôt get a chance to really watch. However, more and more HBO MAX or ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù as let go of these shows and others like it. I‚Äôm not really a fan of any of the new ‚Äúoriginals‚Äù they put out so I really only watch anime and cartoons on this steaming service. Long story short if the platform keeps dispatching these shows I might have to move on completely because it‚Äôll be kinda useless/ boring to keep paying $15  for service that I can only enjoy limitedly..  Ps. The streaming is great and I‚Äôve never had a problem with the actual app or buffering
Title: Cartoon Network

Content: Under no circumstances should you sign up for this service through Apple. Even though they offer it as an option all they will do is charge you but then not allow you to log in and just show the screen that you need to subscribe. After calling help desk 3 time and sending 15 emails with no response the woman on the other side argued with me that it wasn‚Äôt their problem and that I hadn‚Äôt given them enough time to respond even though it had been two weeks. Absolutely terrible service all around.   Update: Somebody from the support team reached out after this comment and then told me they‚Äôre special support team would reach out but shocker nobody reached out once again after another 12 days. My one star stays as this is the worst customer service ive ever seen.
Title: Unhelpful garbage service

Content: I don't understand why they didn't just update the original HBOMax app instead of making us download a new app on every device. They also made it so my older iPad cannot download it because it's on the previous version of iOS which is the latest version that iPad can be. The old HBO Max app works on that device, but this app cannot be installed on that version. It feels like poor planning and rollout by the company.  The app itself is ok, but not as nice as other streaming services. It's difficult to explore and find content on Max without it being on the first page. There's no recommendations for shows/movies, and even finding Max only content requires browsing into many catagories. It's basically just a name change to the old HBOMax app with more hassle and less device support.
Title: please support older devices

Content: You really couldn‚Äôt just change the name of the app you already had? You had to kick everyone out and delete profile pictures just to watch ‚Äúall the same stuff‚Äù in another app. You literally took things away from this app like being able to watch foreign films in their original language or in English. Majority you used to be able to switch back and forth with the click of a button. Now some are only English others are only for example Japanese or other languages I like the option and it‚Äôs much more satisfying to listen to a different language. That‚Äôs all I used the app for honestly so I will probably cancel the whole membership unless it‚Äôs fixed soon. Friends are doing the safe. Nice job doing nothing you guys ! üòéüëçüèªü´°ü§†
Title: So pointless. Honestly starting to regret paying for this.

Content: The app format is great. However, for some reason, if you start watching an episode and close the app, then try to reopen the app several minutes later, once I open the app, it will restart the entire episode when I did not even touch the bar?! Also it is not marking episodes as watched so if you fall asleep, good luck! You‚Äôre going to have a hard time knowing where you left off and it‚Äôll restart the shows episode from whenever it decided to stop logging internally and it‚Äôll restart it from the beginning. I find it frustrating to get into any series with its behavior. Playing movies does not create the same issues
Title: Crashing and unwanted episode restarts

Content: While I appreciate the existence of accessibility options such as descriptive audio tracks, it is incredibly frustrating and confusing for them to be turned on for no reason and with no option to turn them off, which happens constantly when using the app with a chromecast. I am constantly having to delete and then redownload the app, which will temporarily fix the problem, but within a few days, you can be sure I‚Äôll have to do it again. How is this an issue? This isn‚Äôt new technology. Oh, and what I said about accessibility? Well, the only way to use this accessibility feature with chromecast is if it turns on randomly! Which I am sure is an ideal way for that to work.
Title: Major Functionality Issues with Chromecast

Content: At this point, I am pretty much done with Max, between their price increases, rollback of quality and features of the plan that I‚Äôve had, and especially the way that they have essentially ruined the HBO brand. I recently downloaded several movies and shows to watch on a flight, only to find once I was on my 6 hr trip that two of the three would not play back. I good-naturedly assumed that perhaps my app needed updating or there was a download problem.  Once I was at my destination, I checked that my app was up-to-date (it was), deleted the problem downloads, and downloaded several more things. Once again, I had that issue on my return trip. This pretty much seals it for me with Max. I am done. Canceling.
Title: Playback problem w/downloads

Content: Why is there no option to delete credit card info on the app or website for customers who do not wish to re-subscribe?  My subscription just ended and I have no desire to re-subscribe. Contacted customer service and was told that the info cannot be deleted.  The only option for me to remove my credit card info is to fill out a ‚ÄòDelete your data‚Äô request and wait 45 days for you to ‚Äúprocess the request and update what information you can based on my needs and your ability‚Äù.  You have no right to keep credit card info of people who are no longer your customers on your database. I have no faith you can keep my info safe in the case of a data breach.  This just solidify my decision not to renew my subscription.
Title: Not able to delete credit card info

Content: Variety abounds on MAX‚Äôs streaming service with plenty of genres and formats (series, limited series, movies, TV shows) from which to choose. You don‚Äôt have to wait an inordinate amount of time before first run theater movies appear in your playlists‚Äô choices. there is quality entertainment that are HBO/max exclusives and plenty of series that you may have missed the first time around, but are now worthy of being labeled classics (Julia Louis-Dreyfus in VEEP and Longmire, where old timey sheriff Walt Longmire, solves modern day western crimes)   Three thumbs up for HBO‚Äôs, instantaneous and satisfying little brother !!!
Title: All The Streaming That‚Äôs Fit To Watch

Content: If this app added autoplay to PIP mode, I would‚Äôve given it five stars. Love the app and content given. I would‚Äôve given five stars if it wasn‚Äôt for there being no autoplay when in picture-in-picture mode. Some streaming apps have this functionality, and I love it, because I don‚Äôt have to re-enter the app to play the next episode. I am not constantly on one app at a time. I have to have something playing in the background, even when I‚Äôm on my phone, but PIP mode on this app is below my standards when the next episode doesn‚Äôt play, meaning I have to pause whatever else I am doing to play the next episode.
Title: Love, but need autoplay in PIP mode

Content: Max is solid and nicely cleaned up. Bugs will be fixed. It's by far the best streaming app as far as content and execution, but a lot of room for improvement.   The UI/UX organization could be a lot simpler and deliver more value to the user. Apple TV+ has pretty much no content but the execution is way better and intuitive. Max feels like it's trying to mash things up in a way that keeps you sucked into the app versus just giving you what you want.  They should focus on elevating the brand, not finding the lowest common denominator. Thats reflected in both the name and color choice and also loading the app home page with reality tv schlock. Hide that stuff behind a hub. Don't hide HBO behind a hub. Literally should be doing the opposite.   Make the service stand out in the branding and highlight the best IP while making the garbage available but hidden.   "HBO+" with black and vibrant purple/pink/violet would have been better.
Title: Best streaming app, but room for improvement

Content: So once I updated to the new MAX (I‚Äôve been a HBO MAX user for 3 years) and I never experienced the stressful experience like I did with this new unnecessary MAX. You know how it‚Äôs supposed to save your ‚Äúrecently watched‚Äù in the Home Screen or even in the ‚Äúmy stuff‚Äù tab but NOPE this new MAX is not saving them. I watch the Big Bang theory religiously and I have to actually type in the name EVERYTIME just to watch it because it completely disappears?? Not sure how if I watch it everyday. Also you know how it‚Äôs supposed to atleast save the last episode you left from, well NOPE so it adds on to the stress of having to type in the show name and navigate to the last season and episode I paused at. I mean WHAT A HASSLE! I paid for my year and honestly I regret it. Use another streaming service or cross your fingers they bring back HBO max.
Title: New MAX not working!

Content: HBO Max was problematic. Max is just as problematic. I hate the new blue color, what was wrong with purple? I can‚Äôt seem to get the subtitles to stay on when one episode finishes to watch another one. I‚Äôve closed the app a million times, restarted my phone, updated the app it‚Äôs latest version and turned my tv on and off and I can‚Äôt seem to get it to play the subtitles. Whenever it does, they‚Äôre delayed or in Spanish. Why have the option if not going to work. Also, when I leave the app to go into the another, it won‚Äôt load so I end up having to completely close the app out and open it again. It doesn‚Äôt keep track of what episode I‚Äôm on so I have to guess. I mainly use the app to watch friends. I was hoping this new ‚Äúupdate‚Äù would make streaming better. But it‚Äôs the same with minor changes.
Title: Not Satisfied

Content: Max app is largely the same. It‚Äôs still lower on data draw than many other streaming apps which helps me out in my area where GBs per month are limited.   Discovery merger added a lot of channels I didn‚Äôt watch often when I still had a cable TV subscription. I guess if they announce Diners Drive Ins and Dives is being taken off for not being watched, that‚Äôll be a clue for how this merger is really going.   It‚Äôs cool I guess that Food network or travel channel is available to me again now. Maybe a new crowd will find the 21 seasons of Mythbusters, but all that just looks like old shows I watched when they were on so far
Title: It‚Äôs the same really

Content: When I wrote a review on Friday, I gave this app 3 stars. It has incredible content (I originally said if I was rating the movies/shows I‚Äôd give 6 stars) but the app has some issues. And then I received a developer comment! Incredible! One of the biggest media empires on earth took the time to address my concerns. And then I read the comment. They gave me a link that told me how to turn on subtitles. Didn‚Äôt address the issue (having to manually turn subtitles on every single time I open the app on TV/computer/phone) in the slightest bit and totally ignored my other comment. I would‚Äôve rather they never responded at all; if they didn‚Äôt reply I would‚Äôve left my old rating but bad customer service is worse than none. 3 star review to 1 star because their support is laughable.
Title: Update: customer service is laughable

Content: I‚Äôve had HBO Max for years and never had any problems, once it switched over to Max. I‚Äôve had nothing but problems when it comes to ads. You‚Äôll be watching the show just fine and  then it will freeze as if an ad is going to play, all you see is the countdown for the ad, and when it gets to zero, nothing happens. The show just remains frozen on the screen. You have to rewind and play every single time. I‚Äôve called into Max to notify them of this, and all they tell me is they‚Äôre still working out bugs. Only reason why I‚Äôm giving you three star review is because it doesn‚Äôt have this issue when watching from your phone.
Title: Ad issues

Content: So many things need to be fixed. I can be in the middle of a season of a series and it will not be in my Continue Watching. So after you find it, let‚Äôs hope you remember what season and episode you‚Äôre on because it always takes me to season 1 episode 1. Let‚Äôs keep the movies I‚Äôve already completed in my Continue Watching but not the actual series I‚Äôm watching, love it. When changing your profile picture for your account, only recent ‚Äúpopular‚Äù show‚Äôs characters are available but these shows aren‚Äôt popular with everyone! I personally haven‚Äôt seen or heard of over half the options they give to pick from. I know it‚Äôs new, but to be advertised as bigger and better, it definitely needs some work.
Title: Awful

Content: The original hbo max app was terrific. This Max app took all the great features away and made using the app nearly impossible. I‚Äôm finally writing a review because I‚Äôm canceling the service solely due to not being able to use the app.   The app intermingles different users watch history. It does not save your place on any show. Every update makes the app worse! Now I can‚Äôt even touch the screen on my device during playback because whatever is playing starts over. Even when I get something to play I can‚Äôt even pause it. Captions may or may not appear even when selected.   The watching selection is expanding rapidly but it‚Äôs truly low quality watching for a company with the reputation of HBO. The library is so dense with no real description of any selection. The details about shows used to include original air dates, actors, directors, producers, writers. Now you‚Äôre lucky if you can even get a title from the details provided.   I am truly astounded at how this company changed something that was already so far ahead of the competition to an app worse than Tubi. At least they don‚Äôt charge for their ineptitude.
Title: Garbage. It‚Äôs not TV. Because it‚Äôs unwatchable.

Content: I would like to watch 30 Coins with English audio. However, the only audio available in the US is ‚ÄúEnglish with Audio Description‚Äùon Apple TV and Samsung TV. While I understand that this choice is beneficial to sight impaired viewers, it‚Äôs not always needed for others who are not. This seems to be totally inconsistent service where some shows allow for English overdub, but then there is this one where there is no other choice but to listen to a lady narrate in between the characters‚Äô speaking parts. Please add regular English without audio description to this show‚Ä¶.especially in light of the fact that Paul Giamatti (an English speaking actor) will be joining in Season 2.
Title: Inconsistent with English audio overdub

Content: I am unclear as to why the overall stars on this are so much higher now than last time I looked, it was 2.7 and I thought that was generous. If you actually read the comments it reflects how I feel. Please go back! The change was unnecessary and has made using the service so much more difficult for no reason. I really am trying to decide if it‚Äôs even worth it and this is a services I have used everyday for over a year. It‚Äôs hard to find episodes and if you‚Äôve watched the whole series it won‚Äôt come up on your continue watching so you have to search for it and then when you click on an episode it starts from the end then goes to the next episode instead of just starting from the beginning like it used to. All in all it‚Äôs trash and I‚Äôm very disappointed.
Title: Trash

Content: HBOMax was slower and a bit cumbersome quite often, but so far my experience with the new max app is making my spouse and I contemplate dropping our subscription altogether. This new format is like moving backwards. It fails repeatedly to keep up with our viewing progress on different series we‚Äôve been watching (Titans, Succession, and Love and Death). There‚Äôs no easy way of marking an episode as ‚Äúviewed‚Äù either so the app keeps telling us there are New Episodes available. THERE ARE NO NEW EPISODES!! The new format with the flashy new name is just awful at keeping up.  What genius thought changing everything was a good idea? So many completely FREE apps work so much better than this.   Succession will be over soon. Our subscription to this train wreck will likely follow very closely behind.
Title: HBOMax app was far better‚Ä¶

Content: Honestly the time i‚Äôve looked to find a good app that had great shows had to come down to Max. I love this app and I highly recommend to users looking for an awesome experience and ready to get entertained. Although the name brand switching to Max and having to download a whole new app was confusing but definitely worth while experience. Finally, I would like to end of saying you‚Äôll never find a app this well made and I give thanks to the people that gather together and thought of this idea.
Title: As wise a wise man said Max is like a cup of fine wine.

Content: The changes made to the interface, largely algo based, are just plain thumbs down. Almost every category is a slightly different version of itself and all the categories are pushing the same small list. I am no longer able to pull up a complete list of newly added titles or titles soon to leave the service. Instead I get categories like ‚Äútrending now‚Äù or ‚Äúrecently added‚Äù but they are only showing approx 10 titles each‚Ä¶and pretty much the same 10 titles regardless of the algo category.  In the meantime I know there is a lot more new content because the titles being spammed at me are Lifetime movies, reality shows etc; none of which I have a history of watching.  Please bring back a version of the interface that operates more like a library catalog and less like poorly generated ai-content. We have been subscribers to HBO since they launched their first streaming app. Prior to that we would rent the DVDs for the original HBO content. We are on the verging of canceling our subscription solely based on the changed interface.  Or at least, give us the option to browse the catalog with the algorithm shut off.
Title: Horrible interface changes, full catalog opaque

Content: First, it‚Äôs buggy and force quits (especially on Apple TV). It also switched away from the native video player to its own which no longer supports frame rate matching or HDR correctly and the jogging is terrible. Also, they messed up subtitles/cc. No more Siri integration so you can‚Äôt ask ‚Äúwhat did they say‚Äù like you used to. Also some networking issues seem to affect the OS somehow, the app crash seems to crash the network stack and I have to literally restart my device. Other apps don‚Äôt work on the internet until I do this. Force quitting the app does not seem to be enough.   What an awful anti-consumer, iOS/tvOS hostile rebrand/ ‚Äúupdate‚Äù. Why not just rework the HBO MAX app with the new branding? Why go backwards in features? So awful. Thinking of cancelling the subscription over this.
Title: So much worse than HBO MAX

Content: HBOMAX/max has some of my most favorite shows but the app itself is awful. The app constantly kicks me off when watching my shows and changes the episode and time I was at. Not only that but  I get logged out all the time and when signing in with my provider i‚Äôm stuck on a loading screen and can‚Äôt even access the app for extend periods of time. The whole new ‚Äúmax‚Äù thing is ridiculous with absolutely zero improvements. 1st of all the name is so impractical, everyone knows hbomax is a streaming platform, but when I refer to the platform as ‚Äúmax‚Äù ppl ask ‚Äúwho‚Äôs max‚Äù? Yeah who is max? The new layout out of the app and functions are difficult. Someone needs fired.
Title: Glitchy

Content: 1. Why did you ruin decades worth of branding to make my brain needing to try remembering ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the new name for that HBO app?‚Äù  2. Every time I open the app to; say put on closed captioning - it starts my program from the start every freaking time‚Ä¶ like why?? !! And sure it‚Äôs a mistake but then why isn‚Äôt it fixed? What does it say about a company when their tech people don‚Äôt immediately fix the most annoying things that are driving users away? It says the company treats them so badly when they leave to go home they don‚Äôt even use the products because they want to be as far away from HBO/Max as possible and don‚Äôt even care about the issues.   Sorry not sorry but I‚Äôm cancelling over this.
Title: Why?

Content: This app does not work. I have a login through my cell provider (ATNT) and even though it is verified, it will not work 75% of the time. A loop will start asking you to login, then saying you don‚Äôt have a subscription, then telling to contact service provider. Not helpful since they have confirmed that the service is active and push me back to contacting Max. It‚Äôs an endless loop that ends with consumers not being able to access things that they pay for. Horrible app, horrible consumer service, fake reviews to prop up this score.  Edit: contacted developer as recommended in the reply, nothing happened. No return email, call, or anything. They are responding here as a way to deceive consumers that they care. I am switching my business away from this group to a competitor.
Title: Does not work

Content: Something happened right after the install and it locked up my iPad and I thought I was going to have to do a hard reset. Not sure how it finally staightened itself out. Still hard to find any good comedy shows on here. Please add more sitcoms. I don‚Äôt always have time to sit and stare at the screen and like to have it playing while I am cleaning house, cooking, etc. I can‚Äôt do that within 10 storylines, I would like to have some funny sitcoms to listen to. Also, I would like some more older movies and better ones.. more fantasy shows and less cops and robbers.
Title: So far so good except it crashed my iPad

Content: We've gone from enduring months of HBO Max slowly becoming less and less broken, to going right back to ground zero. We're talking failings with just basic functionality: most distracting being videos do not completely trigger fullscreen mechanics, such as failing to hide the status bar unless you leave the app & return mid-playback, yet that *still doesn't get rid of the home bar or multi-task button at the top. It's like having a taskbar present on a computer as you're trying to watch a movie. There's a reason it disappears when you go fullscreen - It's just not a premium experience otherwise. Other apps manage it, and HBO Max even managed it on day 1, yet we're somehow behind day 1 of *that.
Title: No full-screen support

Content: Edit: Cancelled my subscription. The app is horrendously organized and the video player is garbage. It doesn‚Äôt know how to play episodes in order, nor does it restart a previously watched episode from the beginning, so there‚Äôs no rewatching your favorite shows. You literally have to manually restart every episode.  Also, huge amounts of content were cut from the site. A major example that pushed me to cancel my subscription was the removal of 131 episodes of Impractical Jokers, leaving 100 random episodes spread across 9 seasons. I don‚Äôt care about the HBO exclusive content (TLOU was literally the only thing I watched), but am sad to miss out on their wonderful collection of documentaries, but if I really want to watch something I can watch it for free or super cheap somewhere else.  This app is ridiculous and the subscription is not worth the money. I‚Äôd rather use the $10 to patron a favorite YouTuber to continue to make quality content.   PS. Pay your writers more. Cutting content in a desperate attempt to save money will not save you. This transition was a horror show and I will be laughing at the decline of streaming services.
Title: Seriously considering cancelling my subscription

Content: This is not the only streaming site I subscribe to. With that said- it‚Äôs far SUPERIOR than anything else. It‚Äôs more user friendly than the original platform. It has something for EVERYONE whether it‚Äôs TCM‚Äôs or DC‚Äôs complete list of movies (both animated and live action) and I‚Äôve yet to not find something I was looking for. I spent an ENTIRE day off from work adding things to ‚Äúmy list‚Äù. Did I mention Food Network and TLC‚Ä¶ Might be getting rid of 4 other streaming services, not because THEY aren‚Äôt worth it- this is far better!!!
Title: Not the only streaming site!

Content: I originally had HBOMax but got rid of it because of the glitches it had. I read the mostly positive  reviews for Max and thought I‚Äôd give it a try again. But, I‚Äôm having the same issues I was before; the app shuts it self down or doesn‚Äôt even start; the sound will randomly go out so all I have is a picture, I‚Äôll have to open another app and then open Max in order for it  to reset itself, etc. I even cancelled my Netflix subscription because I had high hopes for Max. I gave it a 2 star because it does have content I enjoy watching and offers a great variety, which is what I was looking for. I really wanted to like the new version,  but all it is is a rebrand with the same problems.
Title: Fix the bugs

Content: First of all I‚Äôm not sure why they changed the entire app, but I did not really care too much. Max has some good shows and movies but the problem is watching those productions. Whenever I try to watch something there is a 75% chance it will load for 2 minutes and end up saying to Retry because Your WiFi Connection is Bad or something else like that when my WiFi is perfectly running on other services. So if any employee sees this PLEASE make it so I can watch TV shows and movies on this app.
Title: It‚Äôs Good, but with a big problem

Content: I think the new app does a pretty good job most of the time. But like a lot of the new apps out on the market. I don‚Äôt understand how there‚Äôs not a share button so that I can share with other people.  I know a certain movie or a certain show that I like and I would like to show them that it‚Äôs there so they can also watch it, there is no way to do this on this app. It seems to be a flaw on most new streaming apps for some strange reason.  So please give me a way to share a movie preview or info about a show I like on Facebook or thru a message app etc.
Title: Wish for a share button

Content: The previous app wasn‚Äôt great. But this one is even worse. I‚Äôll stream Succession one night and sound works fine but then the next night the sound doesn‚Äôt work no matter what I do (restart my phone, delete the app, reinstall the app). I play another show on the app and it works fine. I use Netflix and it works fine. I play Succession- sound doesn‚Äôt work. I play Barry- sound doesn‚Äôt work. I play Dr Who- sound works. I uncast while watching Succession- sound is fine coming out of my phone. Please fix‚Ä¶ Netflix and many other apps is ahead of you here. Will delete and unsubscribe soon if you don‚Äôt resolve this. User experience should be way better than this. Too many competitors out there for you to keep messing this up.
Title: The sound works 1/2 the time when I‚Äôm casting to TV

Content: As a personal use Max is great for watching any content the user may enjoy. However, I find it idiotic that Max does not allow screen share compared to before with HBO Max. The standards are lower when they should be better than before.
