Both my friend and I have the app. We will continue to enjoy Max in hopes that they bring that option out instead of only their partner in streaming D+. Please don‚Äôt let them keep bullying us into lower standards or believe that one person is nit picking at them. I don‚Äôt expect them to be perfect, but to keep their standards that was presented to the public. I hope they can at least adopt that standard.
Title: Good but not HBO Max good

Content: I do enjoy being able watch movies and tv shows but as of late with one show it removes the show from Continue watching and it doesn‚Äôt show what you‚Äôve watched already. I hope that this is a bug as other shows and movies I‚Äôve watched don‚Äôt have that problem. The show that it‚Äôs happening on for me is The Worst Cooks In America. I don‚Äôt know if other guys have that same problem with different shows they‚Äôre watching. I‚Äôm sure that there are other problems that needs fixed and those should be fixed. This is also a problem for me but I don‚Äôt know about other people.
Title: Shows and movies on Continue Watching

Content: The app is HORRENDOUS - enough that I‚Äôm seriously considering canceling my subscription because of it! The audio gets out of sync with the video about every 10 minutes - if you stop the video and then restart, it is fixed, but most of the time you then get kicked back to the last ad break, so it takes about 25% longer to watch anything than it should (although the advertisers are probably extremely happy about this!). Also, a green strip keeps appearing at the bottom of the screen - incredibly distracting if the scene is dark, or if you just want your video to look like it‚Äòa supposed to. HBO is a joke and they clearly hate their customers because they have gone backwards in terms of both content and functionality with this ‚Äúupdate‚Äù.
Title: Don‚Äôt bother‚Ä¶

Content: Ever since the update it has not been saving any of my shows I‚Äôm watching on my continue watching list. I have to go find the show and then find the episode I‚Äôm on, and sometimes when I find the episode I‚Äôm on it didn‚Äôt save where I left off (ie. I was in the middle of an episode of the middle when I had to leave for an appointment and it restarted the whole episode). This is a bug in the system that needs to be worked on because some people don‚Äôt have the patience to keep looking for their shows/episodes. Other than that, I loved it when it was HBO Max and I like the broader selection of shows without having to change apps.
Title: Not saving any of the shows to my continue watching list.

Content: If you‚Äôre running on some modern iPads, the ‚Äúswipe‚Äù bar at the bottom of the screen and ‚Äúresize‚Äù tool at the bottom right of the app doesn‚Äôt go away when watching full screen content. This is a bit of a deal breaker especially if you‚Äôre watching a movie or something in the dark. There are 2 very white bright elements distracting from the program or movie.  HBO Max didn‚Äôt have this. This is a failure of QA and product sign off and a basic feature of any video application. You can do better.  On a good note, the new combined content is good I guess. I like that HBO is broken off into its own channel as is the rest of the content. I‚Äôm nervous what the future will bring since I‚Äôm an old school HBO consumer.  I will continue to subscribe because the HBO content is stellar, but I think while some bugs are going to be ironed out, there‚Äôs no reason to have the full screen issue. It‚Äôs like getting a car and the seat reclines, but only 100% back.  You can do better, thank you for working hard on this.
Title: Full screen on iPad flawed

Content: Apple TV app keeps crashing. The 10-seconds skip forward and skip backwards buttons are not intuitive. Click once and the timeline appears on screen, and then click again to actually skip ahead or back. Small thing, but somehow really irritating. Every other app is just one-click and responsive.  The design of the app feels clunkier, heavy, and not as thoughtfully designed as the previous HBO Max app. For example, the welcome screen where you choose a profile is ugly / why are the profile pictures so massive? (I‚Äôm in graphic design, I can‚Äôt help but notice this). I wish they just changed the app name versus forcing you to re-download a new app that is worse in aesthetics and function.
Title: Uglier, Glitchy

Content: Recently, every time I start watching something on Max, and cast it to the tv. If the app is still open on my phone, and I unlock it, whatever I‚Äôm watching starts over. This happens even when I start my show and exit the app. If I go back into the app to pause or turn on subtitles, the app starts the show over. And in doing so, it never saves the spot I left off. Several shows in my continue watching are stuck in episodes that I have already seen. But won‚Äôt update to the new part of the show I‚Äôm in. I deleted the app and redownloaded but the problem still persists. I‚Äôm very disappointed, I watch a lot of history docs and I can never keep track of my spot in the shows because this app malfunctions every time.
Title: Major issue with casting to TV

Content: The best TV & movie app I‚Äôve found ‚Ä¶ now. I Absolutely loved HBOMAX‚Ä¶ great variety, tons of top quality shows - all my favorites! Had liberal, center and conservative documentary choices. The app worked smoothly and was easy user friendly, great layout etc .  Now it‚Äôs MAX, not quite the same or as good in all of those areas‚Ä¶ especially some of the functions, like it‚Äôs difficult to Restart an episode (little bitty area you gotta touch just right) and the option is not automatically offered when you return to a show.  I love MAX almost as much; it‚Äôs still the best out there!!!.
Title: Great! But I liked HBOMAX better

Content: App is more user friendly than it was before, but I still have intermittent problems with casting to my streaming device.  None of the other streaming apps have the performance problems that this one does.  Tracking screen disappears constantly‚Ä¶and I have to disconnect and reconnect to see it again.  Constantly losing connection to the screen and has to reconnect and reload‚Ä¶goes for seconds or minutes and then happens again. It‚Äôs difficult to enjoy shows when it‚Äôs interrupted like this over and over.  Makes me question why I am paying for this.
Title: Better than before, but still has problems

Content: App seems faster than old HBO Max which is good.  Bunch of new disposable reality content now pushed above fiction shows.  Never gonna watch any of that. (I can‚Äôt see any reason to sunset a respected global brand like HBO for not so great name MAX which most people wonder if related to Cinemax‚Äîit‚Äôt not).  2 stars because there‚Äôs a bug in current version on iPad.  The white swipe up bar at the bottom of the screen and time date and battery percentage never disappear, even in full screen playback.  Not the end of the world, but distracting during long viewing.  Screen should be black except for show in full screen like ALL other media apps on iPad.
Title: iPad problems

Content: The HBO Max app (and website) allowed user to edit My Stuff and viewing history. That has changed. Also, if I‚Äôm watching a series, after each episode it shows a new suggested show, not the next episode. If I‚Äôm rewatching a series that I enjoy, instead of playing the next episode from the start, it plays from last played. So, If I stopped watching at the credits, it starts at that point and not at the beginning of the next episode. I tried removing watch history, but that doesn‚Äôt seem to be available. I liked having more control over my viewing, not being force fed what Max believes I should watch. They took a fine working app and downgraded it, making it more difficult to use. I wish they had left well enough alone.
Title: Not user friendly

Content: Old HBO Max app was much easier. It takes so much longer to find what I want. Example:  the old Expiring Soon showed everything expiring in the next 30 days and had the date under each titles thumbnail. Now there is Last Chance with no dates and different lists whether you are under the Home or Movies screen.  No Show All option to see the full list of content expiring.  And even in the movies detail page it doesn‚Äôt show the expire date.  I much preferred having the left menus to get to the Hub or category, then only scroll vertical then what it is now with the vertical AND horizontal scrolling.
Title: Navigation needs to be better

Content: So the hubs on the side are gone, which is kind of annoying. I still can‚Äôt zoom full screen on the AppleTV since you INSIST on using a customized video player. You want me to pay MORE to watch 4K content, which you barely have anyways. But the name change means you have to launch a new app? Why? Like seriously. Apps have changed names in the past. It‚Äôs.. not difficult. So why an entirely new app? Are you going to change the name again in two years and make a new app for it with an icon that now blends in with Prime Video? Did you ignore your consultants, or did you hire a terrible firm? Is the next step to axe another huge pool of content that used to define the HBO name and replace it with garbage original reality shows? Oh wait‚Ä¶
Title: Worse interface. Bad on AppleTV. Why a new app AGAIN?

Content: The movies and TV shows here are phenomenal. But I‚Äôm not here to write a review about my TV shows.   The app is awful. Forced us to move to a second app and completely took away the fine-tuning FF/Rewind that comes on the new AppleTVs, and every single time I try to watch something it starts it at the very end. I‚Äôd like to rewind all the way, but the scrolling instead of spinning is meticulous- if you don‚Äôt brush completely horizontally then it won‚Äôt work- and slow. AND the ‚Äúplay next episode button‚Äù pops up immediately so when you pause to rewind (since you *need* to on this app) it‚Äôll immediately play the next episode. You know, the one you didn‚Äôt want to watch.   Absolutely awful. Honestly makes me want to unsubscribe to the service
Title: Service is Great, App is Awful

Content: Update: I received an invitation to speak to a developer and a request to update my review. Weird- would that somehow fix all the technical glitches and return the cancelled programming? This review is unchanged.  Crashes, glitches. I have had to re-sign in 6 or 7 times in the last few days. Putting aside the fact that there was no earthly reason to make these changes in the first place, now it‚Äôs incredibly annoying to use. There are no longer the wonderful hubs, and it‚Äôs super annoying to search for shows now. I totally get this was all a huge money grab to get out of paying residuals by claiming to be a new streaming service, but you‚Äôve now lost a customer of many years. I‚Äôm cancelling my account
Title: Requires new sign it each time I use

Content: I love this app. It has all of my beloved shows and movies. The only thing lacking is the ability to reset a series that I‚Äôve binged before in the past. Now that I‚Äôve completed this series now it‚Äôll bring me to the last few seconds of the next episode and if I‚Äôm not paying attention I‚Äôll have to back out and restart the whole process. After that the auto play works just fine for every episode following. I just want a reset watch history button to clear the cache. Please Max??
Title: Watch history

Content: Why does this need to be a whole new app.   My 75 year old grandfather and I were on the phone for 2 hours trying to download it on all of his TV‚Äôs in his house. I am tech savvy and I had a problem at every single step of the download and sign in process. When I finally got the app downloaded on his TV, as soon as I first opened the app it asked for a password. For what account??? We put in 5 different passwords including the actual account password, his TV account password and other ones as well. The man just wants to watch Chuck in peace without having to get a new app on every single device he owns.   Now he calls me and tells me HBO Max doesn‚Äôt work, but I tell him every-time that it‚Äôs Max now not HBO max. I‚Äôm sure that most people had no problem downloading it and signing in but it was extremely unnecessary. Absolutely wasting everyones time be creating a new app. Anyone who has older family members/friends that are not tech savvy will understand my issue with the new app and they will probably agree with me. Thank you for your time.   The only reason that I will keep using this app is to watch The Sopranos.
Title: Wasting everyone‚Äôs time

Content: Watching ‚ÄúKill Chain‚Äù on the Russian hacking of America‚Äôs election was clear and convincing; and ‚ÄúInside Job‚Äù about financial collapse and the corruption and collusion among Leaders in Finance and Government is appalling  and has evidently not changed for the new billionaires‚Ä¶in contrast with how extraordinary  GREED and contempt for the lives of ordinary citizens remains largely ignored .  Good stuff, Max.  I remember The Wall Street Journal writing that. ‚ÄúNobody understands Credit Default instruments‚Ä¶well,‚ÄùInside Job‚Äù does.  I recommend everyone, especially every American,  see these two significant films!
Title: The variety and depth of important documentaries

Content: First item on the agenda is how little thought was given to the naming of this product.  The name could give you the impression that you may have kidnapped a person?  ‚ÄúHey, do you have Max?‚Äù  Anyway, this review is for Apple tvOS.  The transitions between top bar menu items and programming is atrocious.  For the love of my eyesight please introduce a fade in and out transition - not a sudden pop in and out.  Also, there is something terribly off with the frame rate while watching content on the app, after scanning through time.  It appears to almost play too slowly or quickly depending on if you have moved forward or backwards.  This doesn‚Äôt happen all of the time, but once is enough to make you feel slightly ill.  Lastly, why are categories of content so hard to locate?  It‚Äôs as if you don‚Äôt want your customers to be able to find content they would like.  The HBO and discovery apps both did better jobs of this.  Although it was not perfect, the discovery app still did a better job than the HBO app when it came to displaying content in a well layer out manner.
Title: tvOS App Review

Content: I use Max primarily for streaming to my google device/smart TV - literally anytime you open the app after starting a show - it will cause the app to shut down, while simultaneously starting your stream over at full volume. The shows ALL start at full volume too so it will put my TV at 100% each time I open the app (which lately with all the bugs it‚Äôs anytime I try to open the app at all mid stream). So you can imagine how NOT user friendly this app is when you maybe want to lower the volume and your app shuts down completely and restarts your stream at FULL volume each time. It‚Äôs almost as unusable as the AMC app - please fix this I never had this issue with the HBO Max app.
Title: App closes and restarts stream

Content: What happen to the home tool or whatever it was called, to look a features an upcoming?Only my stuff An search What happen to the third tool or whatever it say. the second one that was in the middle It was there yesterday Now my phone an the tv app are missing it.  Edited: it just pop up after I post this had to close app out multiple times 5+ times an it finally pop up. Why is app my  message not posting up the way I did it? I made spaces an click the return. I don‚Äôt like to put dotes an cross my T‚Äôs on messages
Title: What happen the one of the tools

Content: At first I wasn‚Äôt expecting much, it was just a free thing from being customers with at&t. As time went on, I witnessed the selection grow from ‚Äúmeh i guess‚Äù to ‚Äúwow, what dont they have!‚Äù I dont use any other streaming service, since this has a great selection to pick from. The only weird thing is when I think ‚Äúi wish they had this option.‚Äù Their response is ‚Äúso you wish it, so i grant it.‚Äù And boom its in the content next time i hop on. I don‚Äôt know if theyre listening, but i dont mind since its benefiting me üòÖ
Title: Great Variety in Selection

Content: Others have already mentioned the dropped content and change in how you find what you‚Äôre looking for.  My issue was rather small:  UI elements don‚Äôt leave the screen while watching content.  My home bar at the bottom and status bar at the top of the screen remain on screen while video is playing.  This happens across multiple devices.  I‚Äôm more irritated now due to waiting in chat to discuss this with customer service and having chat ended twice without any response.  I was looking to waste my time watching content, not have you waste my time in the chat.
Title: The app and customer service need work

Content: This new version is just plain horrible. I can‚Äôt load anything. Nada. All I get are the graphic boxes with different categories and when I click on the box nothing comes up. When do a search for The Larry Sanders show it tells me that it is not in the catalogue. Even though I‚Äôve been watching it up to yesterday. I see it via Apple TV so when I try to get to it that way it doesn‚Äôt load. I get a prompt: Something went wrong. What the heck. It‚Äôs not working on iPhone and iPad. Fix it, please.
Title: Horrible

Content: I have had HBO for many years. I enjoy the shows and think it is good value. The app however has got to be the worst streaming app available compared to all the other apps I currently have access to. The music volume compared to voice volume is quite dramatic I often have to adjust the volume to due the music being exceptionally louder than voice volume. Also it will constantly start serial many episodes back from where I left off. I only use the app on my phone so it should remember my viewing history. It often disconnects freezes or just flat out doesn‚Äôt work causing me to watch my other video apps. Overall I love the content but they really need to invest in the infrastructure or the app.
Title: Worst streaming app

Content: I‚Äôm disappointed with the new Max app. With the latest update, I was able to go to continue watching, but the app wants me to start with the first show of the season I was watching. The biggest issue is a synching problem with audio and video. The video drags and the audio continues at the proper rate. This has happened with two series so far. The previous HBOMAX had issues, but not as many as I have found here. The main page is more difficult to navigate and I have had to put shows in my stuff and go to each episode to see where I left off. I‚Äôm sure it will be fixed in future updates, but just wish it had been fixed prior to launch.
Title: Very buggy

Content: I like the addition of new content but they have really taken a step backward in terms of organization/functionality. You can no longer sort your watchlist by alphabetical order, which is inconvenient, but that is nothing compared to the new way they have movies and series sorted. Now you can only search for movies/series by genre and not alphabetically. So just now instead  of being able to browse  A-Z, I had to search through every single  genre, where  some of movies appeared in multiple genres.  Who in their right minds thought this was a more convenient option? The only reason I even gave it two stars is because the app isn‚Äôt as glitchy.
Title: Major downgrade

Content: They jumped from a really good AppleTV app to a really bad one. Go to a section/group, like LGBT section, scroll down and try looking through the various lists, and it will randomly jump back to the top. They have their own custom video player which is missing scrub functionality. Something is wrong with the TV app Up Next integration - it‚Äôs either not working or buggy.  That‚Äôs just to start. Hard to believe that the new management would completely dump an existing app, which performed perfectly, and build this horrendously awful app just to accomplish rebrand. This is not the first thing that this new ‚Äúcombined‚Äú company has done. I don‚Äôt think it promises much for the future. For the first time in years, I‚Äôm having to reconsider my subscription.
Title: Horrible

Content: I like how you guys put how many seasons a show has when you put it on ur List. Wish it told u even if it wasn‚Äôt on the List, but i‚Äôll live, it‚Äôs fine. Also, i like the new icons for the ‚ÄòNew‚Äô and ‚ÄòNew Episode‚Äô boxes. They‚Äôre bigger which helps. I also like that you changed the buttons to 10 seconds instead of 15. But I do have a bone to pick tho‚Ä¶ still no double tap to rewind/forward? Tsk tsk üòî  Also, regarding ur website when using a laptop, please add the whole type ‚ÄòF‚Äô for full screen dealio.
Title: So far so good!

Content: This app takes longer to load than all the others, but at least it loads on the first try (unlike hbo now). But the selection on offer is very limited. If it weren‚Äôt for FRIENDS & The Nanny, I wouldn‚Äôt still have it. Currently, the ‚ÄúContinue Watching‚Äù section has stopped updating my stopping point & always reverts back to the same place in the same episodes. So I have to open the episode list & find where I actually stopped every time. Super annoying & no way to report the issue through the app. Literally came here to post this just hoping they‚Äôll see it & fix the issue.
Title: Good but glitchy

Content: I like that everything is in one place now, but everything seems very disorganized, especially when I‚Äôm looking for things from HGTV.   The biggest issue, however, is when we cast it to the tv, no matter what our tv volume is, it automatically turns it up to 100%! Even when we just change episodes. We have to have the remote ready to go to turn the volume down. It makes us not want to cast to the tv, especially at night or when the kids are napping. Not sure if anyone else is having this issue. Our tv is a Vizio and we use chrome cast.
Title: Hard to Find Things and Tuns TV Volume to 100%

Content: Overall, I don‚Äôt like the changes or a lot of the new content. I‚Äôd like to be able to indicate that I‚Äôm not interested in certain things (like all the reality garbage) or select areas of interest. There‚Äôs so much stuff and it‚Äôs a pain to sift through.    I‚Äôd really like more options for managing and browsing saved items, like bumping things to the top.   And why the blue? The purple was nice. And I liked the initials for the profiles, not into the whole avatar thing. Those are the first couple experiences with the app and I went from liking them, and they set the app apart from others, and they ruined them.
Title: Meh‚Ä¶and bring back the purple please

Content: The content is great but the app just doesn‚Äôt work and I‚Äôve got no response from emails sent for help. Same issues on Apple and Roku devices. Doesn‚Äôt track the episodes you‚Äôve watched or where you left off. The continued watching section does not update so you have to search for what you were watching to pick up where you left off and hopefully you remember what episode you were on. What you‚Äôre watching will randomly restart and when it does it then doesn‚Äôt allow you to fast forward to get where you were so you have to close the app entirely to restart. Ultimately pointless to have the service right now because until they fix the issues you can‚Äôt enjoy watching anything.
Title: Great Content, Horrible App

Content: I‚Äôve come to this app the day something new premiered one example is the new Superman show that premiered on Adult Swim the day it released for Max I literally had to search for it because it wasn‚Äôt highlighted at all the new apps algorithm is highlighting discovery content new and old while suppressing newer and more popular Warner content it‚Äôs like who ever is in charge is trying to devalue that content which can be backed by the fact that most content on the app has been licensed to other steamers like HBO and the new Netflix deal discovery content is staying exclusive and being made more accessible in the app while the same can‚Äôt be said for the Warner content
Title: Stop forcing Discovery content on people

Content: Seriously, what the heck y‚Äôall? Not only did y‚Äôall remove the sort A-Z feature so I could just browse everything (without having to know exactly what kind of movie I‚Äôm in the mood to watch!) but to top it off there isn‚Äôt a romance category? Are y‚Äôall nuts? That‚Äôs like having a bookstore with all the romance books just scattered in the fiction category. You took the most watched movie type and just threw it into other categories! To quote The Rainmaker, ‚ÄúYou must be stupid, stupid, stupid.‚Äù Y‚Äôall took a great thing and ruined it with this new app. Selection is still amazing, but it‚Äôs hard to find a rom com without a category to select from! Please just fix it üò≠
Title: Why ain‚Äôt there a Romance category????

Content: I paid for a subscription last year and it will expire in December of this year. When they switched from HBO max to Max The app wouldn‚Äôt download so I‚Äôm thinking I need to rescribe so I can continue watching movies. I assumed that someone would see I have a subscription and refund my money and it never happened. I sent messages and someone saw my problem and wanted my payment information which I sent. Another person texted me saying there was no error and they stopped responding. They still owe me $99
Title: Refund

Content: I love the fact that they included all my favorite black tv shows from the 90s ! They get left out ALOT!! Wish they add good times.   DIFFERENT WORLD  LIVING SINGLE (the show friends was based off of by the same man who said ‚Äú I I could have any show it would be living single ‚Äú the next year they were cancelled and friends came out stealing everything from living single. SMH  MARTIN -which I watch only on B.E.T along with the Wayne brothers. But HBO max or Max did a good job at supporting the top black tv shows that RAN the 90s + other black shows.
Title: The greats!!!

Content: I truly enjoy having Max! I‚Äôve used this streaming service when it was first called ‚ÄúHBO Max‚Äù they always have a great selection of shows and movies! BUT if your a BIG sports fan of football and basketball like myself.. this is not it! I understand it‚Äôs fairly new the sports section but if you like keeping up with pro teams in the NFL and NBA your better off using a sports streaming service to watch any game! Hopefully in the near future the selection of live games grow but as it stand now it‚Äôs not great for sports.. at least not yet I hope!
Title: Love hate relationship..

Content: Max could be better and with the rumored changes that may come (like no more password sharing) it‚Äôs kinda going down. Love that they added sports and they have a decent collection. Plus a lot of the newer stuff is available in Spanish but if they start increasing the prices again or stop password sharing the app just isn‚Äôt worth it. The subscription won‚Äôt be worth it. For now it is, solid 4/5 but if they stop password sharing or increase price, it would go down to 3/5, if they increase price and stop sharing its at best 2/5
Title: Max is alright

Content: Why I choose Max by John. Max is just another video streaming site with an eclectic inventory. It is just one of these streaming service I subscribe to. What can I say about Max? It has some of the content that I like to watch and some of the contact I do not like to watch. The same issues with other streaming service. I can also find. While there is limited content to peak my interest, the bulk is across streaming service is the same. The majority of which are or I consider B or C rent Contant that you‚Äôre either never heard of or never wanted to see again. I am currently enjoying the few entries that I wish to see.
Title: Why I choose MAX

Content: Had no issues with HBO Max. Nothing but problems with this. It rarely remembers where you leave off. The ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù feature only shows up ~30% of the time. I‚Äôm only watching one show. When I search the show, I have to scroll through and pick the episode myself and the place is never saved. Just now, volume cut out entirely however the SFX for the fast-forward / rewind remained. Luckily I don‚Äôt watch a lot of media because I‚Äôve exposed myself to enough propaganda to last me several lifetimes. Just writing this because clearly I don‚Äôt value my time that much. Should probably fix these issues though.  Edit: I‚Äôd like to add that these issues are being experienced on two separate smart TVs.
Title: Littered with issues

Content: How much money did HBO spend to launch a new streaming service that‚Äôs not only worse than their previous one but also a million times worse than their streaming competitors? Out of the many complaints that I have about their new streaming service, the number one issue that makes me want to leave is that once a show finishes, the app freezes at the max logo screen which one can‚Äôt back out of to start a new search‚Ä¶ it doesn‚Äôt take the user to a home page to select a new show, it doesn‚Äôt launch a list of recommendations; the only way to move forward is to close the app completely and reopen it again start a new search (so 2005). Fai
Title: Dumb

Content: If brain damage is your cup of tea, then this app has certainly provided me with a unique experience. It's a true marvel in the world of glitchy, buggy apps that appear to thrive on not functioning properly. Ever dreamed of an app that, during a TV screen cast, whimsically shifts languages to Spanish and refuses to revert or revels in English audio descriptions? You'll be delighted when, by some inexplicable miracle, it successfully casts to your TV, and the volume, like magic, soars to a whopping 100 randomly . And what's not to love about an app that kindly resets your movie every 5 minutes, treating you to an extra 2-minute dose of commercials on a paid service? If this sounds like your idea of a good time, then this app is your perfect match!
Title: Run far away from this trash.

Content: I didn‚Äôt even need to sign in with again. Downloaded the app on my iPhone and iPad and both were automatically signed in. After seeing the reviews, I was skeptical, but now I‚Äôm glad I didn‚Äôt have to sign in again. Hopefully others will be able to have their issues fixed soon. (I have xfinity as a tv provider and AT&T for my cellular provider just Incase this helps with anyone else who has issues signing in with those specific providers).
Title: Automatically signed in

Content: I have always enjoyed HBO Max, but ever since the switch to Max, I am no longer able to continue watching my shows from where I left off. Every time I want to continue watching the Big Bang Theory, I have to scroll through my list, find the show, select the season, select the episode, and then rewind the episode to the beginning. It is a huge pain, especially when I used to be able to just hit Continue Watching and it would pick up right where I left off. I don‚Äôt know what happened during the changeover, but someone please fix this issue!
Title: One big issue with the new version of Max!

Content: Why doesn‚Äôt this app save the progress you make in watching a series? It‚Äôs so annoying! Ever since they went from HBO Max to just Max, it‚Äôs been a headache. It just says to start watching Season 1 episode 1 of whatever I‚Äôm trying to watch despite being several episodes in. It also deleted shows off of my list that I had not finished watching. I‚Äôve tried logging out & logging back in, deleting and redownloading the app & nothing works! Just bring back the Continue Watching section! I don‚Äôt understand why that‚Äôs so hard for them to do. They‚Äôre just angering their customers & making them want to take their business elsewhere. Fix it!
Title: Doesn‚Äôt Save Progress

Content: They took off some of the cool features like the random button on shows. some shows i put on for background noise and have seen them enough that i don't need to follow the plot so i liked the random button cause it would play the episodes in random order, (did it mostly for comedy shows) other than that just seems like the same app kinda disappointing. I also don't like that movies with sub and dub are now two separate movies instead of being able to just switch the audio makes the whole thing unnecessarily difficult And why have to download a whole different app why not just update the app that was already in use?
Title: Its just ehh

Content: I watch this mostly on my iPad, and as a creature of habit I like to fall asleep to the same shows. So if I go back in a show‚Äôs season and choose an episode I‚Äôve already watched, it thinks I want to watch the end credits. What? The most annoying thing is the full screen/theater mode. For some reason, now the clock and battery display doesn‚Äôt turn off automatically and is very distracting. I find I have to turn on Split View and then turn it back to make the top bar disappear but the bottom slider to access apps is still there and very bright. Like this is elementary stuff, come on.
Title: Simple things, out the door

Content: How is it you guys can‚Äôt get the continue watching part of this right? I have several TVs and I might watch something on 3 different floors in my house and yet when I log back in I don‚Äôt have the show available to pick up where I left off and if it is it shows me the first episode in the series.. just so many wasted clicks and time. Please fix!!! Netflix is a good model to follow.. it‚Äôs 2023 why is this app still working like it‚Äôs 20 years old? Where is all the old HBO content? HBO had a whole library of movies they made in the 80s and 90s and yet it‚Äôs never made it on the platform. I never asked for Discovery or TCM‚Ä¶ please give us more HBO and less reality TV‚Ä¶
Title: New HBO Max but same old problems

Content: A new Max iPhone app upgrade came out today, and problems I‚Äôve raised with their agents remain broken.  It‚Äôs been more than a month since notifying staff of episode numbers being wrong for the 2022 seasons of Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel and Real Time with Bill Maher.   Somehow it causes the Nov and Dec episodes of Real Sports to be flat-out missing and unavailable.   More critically for iPhone users who rely on an unlimited 5G cellular plan and Apple‚Äôs Lightning to Digital AV adapter (to watch as a group on a larger screen) the bug introduced in the previous Max upgrade is unfixed.   A downloaded show cannot be viewed, only audio comes through.  Streaming a show does display to the larger screen, but one can of course experience buffering at times when the 5G service is at peak demand or otherwise overloaded.    I was told all these problems were passed into developers but I now doubt that.  MAX has good stuff but the customer service is questionable.
Title: New app still with critical iPhone flaw & more

Content: The audio description bug is driving me insane. No matter how many times I switch the audio to English, the app keeps switching back to English audio descriptions and playing over my contents audio. I‚Äôve gone into settings and made sure I have audio descriptions turned off but it does nothing. I‚Äôve turned off my phone, deleted the app, reinstalled it, logged in and out, but I still can‚Äôt turn it off. The worst part is I never even turned audio descriptions on in the first place - the app updated on its own and now it‚Äôs stuck like this. It‚Äôs great that they have this feature, I bet it‚Äôs really helpful for people who need it, but what‚Äôs the point of using MAX if it‚Äôs too broken to use?
Title: Audio Description Bug.

Content: First, why couldn‚Äôt the old app just update to the new MAX app? It doesn‚Äôt make much sense to have to delete the old on and download a new one,  Also, if your going to do that, create a grace period of a month or so where both can be used‚Ä¶had difficulty getting the new app to work as we get it provided by a cellphone provider with service. The launch page is ok, except it should right away continue with what you are watching and new episodes of what you are most recent watching.
Title: poor rollout of new app, maybe a little faster?

Content: HBO used to be my go to for streaming top quality shows and movies. Now it‚Äôs just another giant streaming platform with 10 million shows, yet nothing to watch. I am not sure who told all the ‚Äústreaming giants‚Äù that more shows regardless of quality is better, it‚Äôs not, when you‚Äôre only adding old bad network tv shows, that now have to be sifted thru to find the few good shows. Also, The new interface is much harder to navigate. I pull up the app on my Roku several times a day look thru the terrible new shows, get frustrated with all the garbage content, then go to a different app to find something to watch. If I didn‚Äôt pay for the year up front I‚Äôd already have cancelled this subscription.
Title: HBO at its worst

Content: On the phone is alright but on the Apple Tv the ability to scroll between scenes needs work. It is worst than how it was with the HBO Max app, you can‚Äôt scroll smoothly. Also there an the annoying dark bar on the top that shows the rating of the movie/series for a few seconds after you play a movie or show. It is annoying to see that unnecessary thing covering part of the picture. That wasn‚Äôt there before why add it now. It is a dumb an annoying way to remind people of the rating of the content. There are other ways to do it without it being so intrusive.
Title: Apple tv app needs work

Content: I LOVE this app, especially now that it‚Äôs merged with Discovery Plus, but it would be nice to have the option to filter my list by movies and television series via a drop menu where you can view all (default) or filter by shows or movies.  It because a bit wild when you go to your watch list and there‚Äôs a tons of stuff to sift through with no options to make that view a bit more orderly and easy to navigate.  I hope the developers see this and make that minor adjustment.
Title: Please give option to filter My List by TV and Movies

Content: The app works very well. It integrates with my cellular client login seamlessly. Having access to movies exclusively while they are in the theaters is a great benefit.. The only complaint I would have is a lot of the proprietary content Max creates is in the woke genre. Not as much for mass audiences or even the critically acclaimed arena; just not my cup of tea. Although, the HBO brand has always been that way, so I‚Äôm not shocked. Who would‚Äôve thought Bill Maher would be the least woke HBO Max content lol
Title: App works great, early access to movies, too much woke content

Content: It‚Äôs pretty cool. I haven‚Äôt experienced any bugs that others are however it doesn‚Äôt mean I won‚Äôt. I do like that we have more stuff to watch so that‚Äôs a plus. I was going back and forth from HBO to Discovery and now it‚Äôs all in one. That‚Äôs a plus. Overall, I can‚Äôt complain. It‚Äôs nice to kinda have everything in one app. The UI could be better but for an app that just launched, I love it. I‚Äôll use it everyday just like I have been with HBO. And you know what, it‚Äôs still cheaper than cable!
Title: I like it

Content: I really like Max and all the things I can watch!!! However, I wish there were more options with animation-specifically Max should spend less of its money on shows like Velma and more on stories warrant a show. Original animated shows that are just reboots of beloved classics perhaps? I would also prefer more anime options but I know it‚Äôs not on Max to provide that‚Ä¶  I was surprised that we could pick a character for a profile. It seems like Mac is trying to copy Disney Plus. I don‚Äôt mind it though.   Don‚Äôt get me wrong- I love the options of anime here! But maybe they could consider adding a few back..
Title: Anime where?

Content: Every time I screen mirror like the smaller screen in the bigger one every time I finish an episode of something that I‚Äôm watching on Max. I have to go back into the app and I click next episode I‚Äôm kind of annoyedüòí by that I wish you would just like automatically start the episode after that one, so I think you should fix that, but overall I like the quality of max and how many shows you can get and I just love it except for that because I think it‚Äôs kind of annoying so yeah
Title: Need to fix but over all good üëç

Content: This app‚Äôs design is much improved over its predecessor‚Äôs; however, I have had almost zero success trying to watch downloaded videos without a network connection. Most of my time watching shows/movies is when I‚Äôm traveling and have limited internet availability, so this functionality being broken severely limits the usefulness of this app for me. The app always gives me an error when trying to play an episode/movie while offline. The Netflix app plays videos offline flawlessly, so it‚Äôs clear that this is a bugged implementation in the Max app, rather than some legal or technical limitation.
Title: Much improved, offline viewing broken

Content: Obviously a goated selection of shows and movies but the transfer from hbo max to max was dumb because of the bugs, had to start new accounts and get rid of old ones and the obvious pay wall for no ads is outrageous because it‚Äôs what made the platform the best in the past, just one price for no ads, and not to mention the less amount of devices that can be watching on the same time, although it‚Äôs not really a big issue the fact that I can‚Äôt watch downloaded episodes because 2 people at home are logged in is absolutely nutts,
Title: I Hope max Doesn‚Äôt Keep Heading Down this path

Content: Love the app, I have it on all my TVs but ever since it got updated to MAX, it doesn‚Äôt save my progress on whatever I‚Äôm watching. There is no ‚ÄòContinue watching‚Äô section and when I open one of the shows I was watching the night before, it takes me back to S1E1. I have to go to the season and try to remember what episode I was at. It‚Äôs a little frustrating, I hope it gets fixed with the next update. Other than that, I enjoy it, especially when this is the only streaming platform that has TVD for me to rewatch :))
Title: Since the update to MAX

Content: I have been able to use this app fine for over a year and it randomly logged me out. I tried to sign back in with my provider, but it directs you to a page to sign in, which I do, and then it just sits there. The only way to back out is to press ‚ÄúCancel‚Äù which then leads to an error message. Signing in won‚Äôt redirect you to the app it just stays on the webpage where you cannot do anything further. Until this is fixed the app is unusable for Xfinity users, or at least me. The app is fully updated as well so maybe there‚Äôs a bug or something but it‚Äôs pretty ridiculous to be paying for the subscription and it randomly not work anymore.
Title: Won‚Äôt let you sign in with provider

Content: I used to use this app but now they changed it and ruined the best features I‚Äôm not one to fight change if it‚Äôs for the better but this price raising is unjustified and quite frankly not worth it you used to be able to look at what‚Äôs on the app but now you buy first look later I wanna see what I‚Äôm getting at least before I overpay for just the base price on this app it was a good value around 10$ for no ads you‚Äôve removed most of the good qualities about the app and then shoved a higher than acceptable price point for the same stuff we already had lower the quality higher the price absolute sham of a company at this point
Title: Very Dissatisfied

Content: I love the app for the most part. Discovery+ and HBO Max wrapped up in one app along with other Warner offerings. But there is one HUGE problem. The default settings can not be adjusted or changed to fit your household. The weird thing is the defaults are different between devices. The same issues that plug the Apple TV app do not affect the iPhone or iPad version, even though the apps cross perform. I hate that every time I start watching a new show the CC is on and then I have to take the time to go in and turn it off. If this gets fixed and it is set up to allow users to change defaults in settings I would happily rate this app higher.
Title: Defaults need a change

Content: Forced to download a totally different app to watch the finale of Succession, and at the end of the episode (well, NOT at the end but with around NINE MINUTES left) it shrinks the show/credits and I get to see a bright white, stupidly difficult to navigate advertisement screen for other HBO shows, with no apparent way to get BACK to the SHOW I WAS WATCHING and continue it in full screen. The way this app takes over like that with no simple way to go back, is absurd. And don‚Äôt click back, or it‚Äôll just bring you to the main generic home screen on the app. Terrible experience. I‚Äôm specifically talking about the Apple TV app (can‚Äôt review on the Apple TV), but the point stands. This app stinks, and it‚Äôs inferior to the old HBO Max app.
Title: Forced to use an inferior app.

Content: App switched from HBO Max to Max. Thought this update would fix all the bugs and problems with the old app. But it‚Äôs even worse.  The app has trouble casting, can‚Äôt skip intro anymore, can‚Äôt skip recap like before. Occasionally the font of the ‚ÄúHBO Max‚Äù logo changes to like a cheap courier new font and the font of the title of the series you‚Äôre watching also changes occasionally indicating there are some bugs to be fixed. Sometimes it randomly plays in Spanish and you don‚Äôt have the option to change the language to English or any preferred language. Takes forever to fix and start watching any series or movie.  Sometimes it works fine but it‚Äôs happened too many times.
Title: Need to improve

Content: I added a star because it‚Äôs much better than the previous app but the ad situation is just about intolerable. If I pause a show in the middle of the episode and have to come back to it later, I lose my place and cannot fast forward to the spot I was at because it stops me and makes me rewatch all the ads again. Then starts me after the ad, I fast forward again and several minutes of more ads, and eventually I repeat the process until I am over it and just turn it off because it‚Äôs not worth it to watch 40 ads just to get back to the spot I was at in a show.
Title: HBO is still the worst streaming service

Content: I just hate how this service and app went from the best content of the classic pay channel of all time, hello HBO, fazed their name out (leaving Max, an allusion to B List Cinemax???  But WORST of all, app is flooded with reality show trash and other garbage since they merged with Discovery - like TLC and others, a once reputable service with quality content  - turned bottom feeding purveyor of the worst TV has to offer. And every time the home page shows more plastic reality show humanoids I want to puke.
Title: They dumped HBO focus?

Title: Max is just terrible now with how they remove things

Content: This is not a complaint for the iPhone version but for the Roku TV version. I‚Äôm currently on season 4 of a tv show that I‚Äôm watching. Ever since I started watching the show it hasn‚Äôt saved the progress on the ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù option and I have to search it every time and remember where I left off. Thank you
Title: Overall great

HBO is highlighting shows from channels that are not available on the other platforms so it helps to broadens my choices available. I only wish that I could rate the shows I watch, so HBO could learn more about the types of show people are interested in and could create their own versions.
Title: Like new app

Content: This is the single worst streaming app I have ever used. When I‚Äôm not casting to a TV it is OK. When I cast, which is most of the time, it barely works. If I go back into the app while I‚Äôm casting, it will restart the whole episode. It randomly turns on audio description or dubbing in another language when my settings are in English with no audio description. Skipping 10 seconds a couple times in a row will make the whole thing crash. Randomly it doesn‚Äôt save my watching progress. It is actually mind blowing to me that a rebranded app is this bad. They went backwards and it is extremely frustrating. If I didn‚Äôt love the show I‚Äôm watching that is Max exclusive, I wouldn‚Äôt be a subscriber.
Title: Absolutely awful

Content: I have been trying to log into the app since it launched. I keep getting messages that it cannot verify my account through my provider.  Then I contact the app for support and they want me to send proof that I have HBO, which I‚Äôve had for years through DirectTV.  I don‚Äôt feel I should have to ‚Äúprove‚Äù I‚Äôm a subscriber when I didn‚Äôt have this issue with HBO Max.  So yeah, not pleased and i am not paying an extra plan to get when I‚Äôm told I can access it at no charge.  No starsüò°
Title: App issues

Content: I looooooves HBO! Cinemax was always mediocre. The diversity, range, and quality of content on HBO was always ahead of the game - insecure, succession, the comeback, watchmen, euphoria, big little lies, I may destroy you, random acts of flyness üôåüèΩüôåüèΩüôåüèΩ - all so good!!! Cinemax hasn‚Äôt really kept up in my opinion, so the merger felt moot. The main issues I have now are all the glitches in the app when trying to cast and find what I want, and what feels like a watering down of the content. I really hope that doesn‚Äôt happen. Also the HBO interface and materials were just sexier. Big fan here, but you‚Äôre losing me a bit.
Title: Why backwards?

Content: Your user-face platform is getting better! But Max please go back to your purple branding. I keep hitting Disney plus by accident because it‚Äôs literally the same color. Why choose the same color as one of your streaming competitors? Don‚Äôt you want to stand out?  Either way thank you for giving a chance on animated adult shows. It‚Äôs a underrated genre that many fear are doomed to just get 2 seasons and then cancelation. There is an audience and there always will be.
Title: Miss the purple

Content: why HBO - the golden child of high quality scripted dramas; and Discovery+ - the schlocky reality tv service; decided to merge is beyond me. there's a reason i had an HBO max account and no discovery+ account. i appreciate the expanded selection because of a handful of shows, but i dislike the new interface and wish they would've just done what spotify/hulu/showtime did for their student bundle, which is to just allow one site's login credentials to work on the others. separate apps, no new interface, no messed up buggy roll out, no painfully unwanted media being forcefully advertised while i'm just trying to watch succession. oh the irony.
Title: literally who asked for this?

Content: HBO puts out quality television and Max is just a different name for the same thing. Shows like The Sopranos, The Wire, and Succession will stand the test of time and always be top tier entertainment. Even a show that doesn‚Äôt stick the landing such as Game of Thrones is still a phenomenal series. True Detective, anything they‚Äôve done with Danny McBride, Barry, WestWorld, the entire Miyazaki/Studio GHIBLI collection ‚Äî all landmark series in their respective genres. All on HBO/Max. If you like good TV, you‚Äôve already downloaded this app
Title: HBO has always been the best

Content: If anyone acquires your password, they can log in and change the password to the app. There is no external confirmation via email link or 2FA text message. This is a major security problem on top of an already non-functional app.  Add to that, ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù options that don‚Äôt resume where you were at or mark shows as completed, Pause functions that keep the show playing and force you to resume at later points in the show, and a migraine inducing library interface, and you have the least functional streaming service on the market, which is saying something given the wretched state of DTC streaming services.  Thanks for breaking the industry, WBD
Title: MAJOR security problem

Content: I was on the fence with paying 15 a month for hbomax, but I‚Äôd never spend that for max.   I hate that hbo max had to create a whole other app just to change the company name. This app is never easy to use and always ends up making mistakes UNLESS you watch it on your phone. It doesn‚Äôt have chrome cast capability unless you have the console and you download it there. The subtitles will play from other shows instead of the one you chose and at some points it even freezes up the app! I tried watching sopranos but it kept playing the audio with the descriptive properties and wouldn‚Äôt give an option to change it. Don‚Äôt like the app and I don‚Äôt like the company; I‚Äôm cancelling
Title: Cancelling for good

Content: I‚Äôll say that Max is a good app, I just simple don‚Äôt understand why they has do upgrade HBO max when it was working perfectly fine. There was no need for it to get ‚Äúfixed‚Äù or improved. There is one problem that I hate: you can‚Äôt SharePlay with Max, unlike HBO max. Title: SharePlay (FaceTime)

Content: Max has the best of hbo and discovery +. Not only does it have the best, it has it all in just one app now . If I were Netflix or other competitors I‚Äôd be afraid of max . Title: Other streaming services should be intimated

Content: The transition from HBOmax to Max was always expected to be an adjustment, but what I didn‚Äôt foresee is for the decline of the platform to be this great. One of biggest plus the HBOmax platform had was the fact that even though the amount of content was soooo extensive, you always had the hubs and menus on the side to direct you straight to where you wanted to go, with Max it just seems like they just dumped all the content and created a free for all.
Title: Should have just added to the HBOmax platform

Content: While this app is enjoyable to browse and watch content on, it disappointed us when we were vacation and was unable to view our downloaded content due to the app telling us we had to update our app. This normally wouldn‚Äôt be a problem but we had no signal and I had just downloaded a couple of movies to watch offline the day prior to leaving. Still, I‚Äôll take this version of the app over the godawful old version, but it‚Äôs still so buggy for me.

Content: It will be nice if it had volume when does show the previews and  still have some glitches like when you‚Äôre watching a show and then it doesn‚Äôt upload into  keeps going back to stock for a few minutes don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my Internet but it doesn‚Äôt happen with any of the app just with that one kind of goes like  when we have record and they got a scratch just keep repeating and repeating but It‚Äôs big improvement in general.
Title: It‚Äôs a big improvement to whatever started

Title: It‚Äôs okay

Content: Less material of quality, a horrible lesser user interface, and a lot of just plain trash is now on here. Title: Shows that used to be on HBO Max now missing

Content: As much as IÔ∏è enjoy ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù and as well as my children there‚Äôs something IÔ∏è am not pleased with. IÔ∏è typically watch MAX on my Roku TV. Title: HBO MAX vs MAX

Content: The app is great, glad everything switched over and nothing was lost from HBO Max. Title: Great App, annoying log in

Content: So I originally had HBO max in South America while visiting family. Worked great! Came back to US, worked great. Now they want me to cancel my subscription to HBO max, create a new account and new subscription in Max, where I would loose all my saved programs. And also when I go to visit my family back in South American‚Ä¶ max doesn‚Äôt work there so I would need to cancel my Max subscription and re subscribe to HBO max.
