Title: Dumbest transition ever

Content: They got rid of the hubs, they added advertising plan options that will cost a person $100 a year to have commercials, or about $150 for no commercials. They are pushing a bunch of reality shows. This is like when MTV stopped doing music videos. I have not seen or heard of new seasons of shows that I did like, or new ones that are enticing. If you watch National Lampoon‚Äôs European Vacation, it dubs out the F word. Can they not find uncensored content to show the original version? I am going to get the Criterion Collection again. Same price, no ads, probably a lot of special features and best yet, it will provide the content that I want to see.
Title: Time to Bid Adieu

Content: So downloaded the new max app and so far no issues streaming, but I noticed all our profile pictures were set to basic and when trying to change the profile pic found out we can‚Äôt upload our own pictures like we could on HBO Max app and can only use their shows/movies pictures. Not a fan of this, we had fun using goofy photos of our cat as our profile pics so very disappointed with not being able to continue to use our pictures for our profiles.
Title: Miss being able to use my pictures for my profile pic

Content: I‚Äôm not one to write reviews, but my frustration with this app has me at my wits end. There isn‚Äôt a single time I use this app that I don‚Äôt experience some kind of complication. Audio descriptions randomly turn on, streaming freezes or goes in and out, and it doesn‚Äôt remember where I‚Äôve left off in episodes/ entire series. I can‚Äôt tell you how many times I‚Äôve deleted the app and redownloaded to try to get it to work better or just to turn off certain things. The last app did not have these problems. What did y‚Äôall do?! I love the shows but this is getting ridiculous. Do better please.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Everything went smooth for me. Logged in and have been watching whatever I want as usual. Only bummer is that some stuff moving over from Discovery+ like Lost Tapes and Fatal Attractions aren‚Äôt on this app. Hopefully they get uploaded along with everything I have on my watchlist on Discovery+. Most are on here so I‚Äôm contemplating keeping that app since everything will be on here. But other than that I‚Äôm happy. Don‚Äôt know what problems some are having.
Title: Works fine for me

Content: why does MAX recommend and push that I watch a slew of reality tv? From my watch history the APP should know what I am interested in seeing. it s all narrative story telling and actual documentaries. It‚Äôs is aggravating to have to sift through piles of reality shows about kitchen makeovers that probably have to be re done by a professional, marrying a stranger, making a inedible cake that looks like a motorcycle, and on and on and on. I don‚Äôt watch this content. Stop putting it in front of me. The amount of content I will never watch on my main feed almost makes the app unusable.  Are you serious MAX?  I gave real feed back. And you responded with an automated reply? Telling me to provide feedback? Either give with a legitimate response or don‚Äôt respond and all. It‚Äôs fine not to respond.   Here is the reply MAX sent for reference.   ‚Äú Hi there, thanks for sharing your thoughts and suggestions. We value your feedback and encourage you to share your ideas for how to improve Max using our feedback form her‚Äù
Title: Stop pushing content I will never watch.

Content: So it asked me for a rating on if I was enjoying before I had a chance to watch anything which should be changed. But that doesn‚Äôt really matter because I have it on my tv so I do know that it is good. One problem is that every once in a while yor watching a show and it has a swirling circle then it rewinds gose back to where it was and rewinds again that gose on forever if you don‚Äôt fix it by winding it forward so that‚Äôs all so just a little laggy but I still completely advise that you get it
Title: Good.

Content: Even after spending 2 separate hours chatting with tech support, for some reason, since the last update my app will only stream to my tv in Spanish. It will be English on my phone and English on my desktop, the moment is stream it to my tv it switches to Spanish and gives no other option for audio. All other audio options disappear when it‚Äôs streaming to my tv. I have an iPhone 13 Pro Max and my phone is completely updated as well as the app with all the latest versions. Even tech couldn‚Äôt figure it out. Please fix this. I don‚Äôt want to watch my shows on a 4‚Äù screen.
Title: Only streaming in Spanish

Content: One why would you make an almost identical app but change to name and color? Two I don‚Äôt like how when I‚Äôm doing other stuff on my phone and tablet and when the Big Bang theory episode is over it just disappears so I have to go and re-open it for the tiny screen!!! Plus I have anxiety and change gives me a lot of it so this could be the anxiety talking from the change rattling me up from your stupid decision!!! Other than that I see no difference or improvement if anything it‚Äôs set you back.
Title: I like it but why change to a different app just for a name?

Content: HBO Max (or Mac now) has ALWAYS been FANTASTIC with the content it keeps (Big Bang Theory, Friends, GOT, House of the Dragon, comedies, romcoms) ‚Äî I LOVE how they pick up all the cult favorites that Netflix drops. BUUT I hate the brand change. I can begrudgingly accept the name changing from ‚ÄòHBO Max‚Äô to ‚ÄòMax‚Äô, but PLEASE change the color back to purple/blue!!! It reminds me of it‚Äôs HBO origins, like GOT. But now that it‚Äôs solely blue, it looks like any basic app (Disney +, Paramount +, Peacock, Zoom, freaking Venmo.) Max is still my favorite streaming platform, but I will forever be against this color change ‚Äî the blue doesn‚Äôt do this streaming platform justice.
Title: Bring back the purple HBO theme!!!

Content: On launch day I opened hbo max and saw the upgrade to max screen. Followed the download button link, downloaded, opened Max and was automatically signed into my account! All my profiles, watch history, and even watch list we‚Äôre all right there where I left. So much more great content to choose, already started binging a new show! Browsing speed feels smooth and fast as well. Looking forward to seeing what else max brings to us.
Title: Seamless sign in

Content: I love the variety of shows and movies on this app, I enjoy it very much due to me working on night shift at my job‚Ä¶ binge watching comes easy! Only thing I do not like is if I just my Max on the television where I want to stream on the bigger screen any show or movie I‚Äôm watching will continue to skip and slowly load, whereas if I‚Äôm watching something on my phone the quality is top tier with no skipping or slow loading. Not really sure what this is caused by but if this could be fixed or taken care of there would be no absolute complaints at all!
Title: Skipping

Content: The platform doesn‚Äôt allow me to rewind when watching shows. Trying to rewind past previous ad breaks crashes the platform and gives an error message before kicking me out of the show I was watching.  The audio/subtitle menus are in reverse places across TV & mobile, so weird inconsistency when I change between devices. It never saves my subtitle preferences on TV either so I have to reset it every time. Main menu doesn‚Äôt have many options for filtering. Overall just an underwhelming app that I don‚Äôt bother with unless I know exactly what I‚Äôm looking for.
Title: Rewind doesn‚Äôt work and ads cause app to crash

Content: I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews but I miss the old HBO. Idk why they have to mess with a good thing. Max is harder to navigate. No more convenient ‚Äúlast chance‚Äù or ‚Äújust added‚Äù sections to choose from the menu. The old HBO was worth the $15/month, but this lower quality ‚Äúupdated‚Äù one is making me question keeping it. Every time I scroll down the list of movies, after about 15 seconds it brings me all the way back up to the top of the list. Super annoying. After it happens a few times I give up trying to find something to watch and switch to a different streaming service.
Title: Not worth it anymore

Content: I used HBO Max every night to watch the Sopranos. iPhone to chromecast. Aside from out of sync subtitles, it worked well.   Now, for whatever reason, it doesn‚Äôt work on this set up. It‚Äôll connect to the chromecast, but when I hit play it tries to play it on my iPhone and chromecast at the same time. I ‚ÄòX‚Äô out of it on my phone and it plays on the tv/chromecast, but it only about 8-10 seconds at a time and then pauses to load for multiple seconds. I‚Äôve tried it multiple nights. And it‚Äôs definitely not an internet issue, because I do the same thing with Netflix or any other app with no problem.   Unfortunately, until they fix it, it‚Äôs unwatchable on this set up.
Title: In Soprano‚Äôs Withdrawal

Content: HBOMax was my go-to for all my favorite shows, so I didn‚Äôt expect much user difference with the switch. However, while it was easy to log in and my shows were all there in Max, IT DOESN‚ÄôT SAVE MY WATCH HISTORY! Now, every time I log in, I have to find the show I was watching, find the season I was on, and then hunt down the episode. Once I get there, I have to hit * to restart the episode & then fast forward to where I was. This is so incredibly annoying and has caused me to stop using the app. I‚Äôve tried signing out, deleting & reloading, hard restart‚Äîall the things. Hopefully they‚Äôll fix this glitch soon. It isn‚Äôt worth the $$ I pay for this kind of inconvenience.
Title: What was wrong with HBOMax?

Content: Frankly it‚Äôs disappointing to say the least that as a company you can‚Äôt uphold your end of the deal! I purchased a yearly plan for an ad free and 4K compatible subscription and now all of a sudden with the rebranding I don‚Äôt have that same access. It‚Äôs NOT my fault pricing and tiers were changed so I believe that I should STILL be able to watch 4K content until my yearly subscription is up. I really hope to hear back because it‚Äôs not very good for your ‚Äònew look‚Äô. I was expecting better from this new app but I‚Äôm just frustrated and mad to be completely honest! A company with so much money and they just are basically stealing from customers at this point‚Ä¶.
Title: New app a serious disappointment

Content: This app is so seamless. The wide variety of shows and movies with new ones added so often make it a great platform. If you thought they couldn‚Äôt improve on HBO Go, then you were wrong. Twice. It has stuff for the whole family: horror movies, family movies, classics, and shows to drool over. I‚Äôm watching through Friends right now, and I tell you, if I start, I cannot stop. Again and again and again, Max continues to amaze me. Thanks, HBO!
Title: Love this!

Content: Another name change and a new app with zero differences to the previous versions. They promote Max as if it‚Äôs something new when no one can tell the difference from before. There is no additional functionality or a way to give any feedback about the titles. Netflix let‚Äôs us give a thumbs up or down. HBO probably just looks at views and has no idea that many of the title are no good. Terrible business model. I also don‚Äôt love how they throw so much of their agenda in our faces. Just terrible.
Title: Poses too much content we don‚Äôt want and no way to give feedback

Content: I phoned last night to try to get imax on my tv. The rep, who I could hardly understand as he did not know what I was talking about instructed me to put it on my iPhone, which I can hardly see. He had no idea how to place on tv. Finally he hung up on me. I get my service through the community and called for help because I am entitled to it through my association fees. Why can‚Äôt you hire workers from our country who we can understand us and we can understand them?? Please hire help who can speak English. I was on phone with different agents who couldn‚Äôt understand English and I didn‚Äôt understand a word they said. Please have an English speaking rep call me. I am entitled to max through my community
Title: Max

Content: One of the features I miss from HBO Max is the ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù section. It‚Äôs gone. I have to search for the content I want to watch using the hearth bar or my watchlist and go from there. So inconvenient. Other streaming platforms have this feature available by default.  Also, time stamps are off, some buttons and commands do not function, and it crashes constantly. I often get a message notifying me that ‚Äúan unexpected error has occurred‚Äù. I‚Äôm just gonna have to unsubscribe in a month from today if they don‚Äôt acknowledge and fix the issues that so many of us are experiencing üòï
Title: Simple features gone

Content: Why change the app in the first place? I didn‚Äôt know, didn‚Äôt bother me. HBO is my most used streaming service by a landslide.  I use it on my cellphone and three TVs. With the new app, whatever the last show I was watching will disappear completely from the ‚ÄúContinue Watching‚Äù section. I‚Äôll have to search for the show, find the episode I was last on, which will be reset like I never watched it. So I‚Äôll have to fast forward to the last spot I was on every time I want to start the show back. This is consistent with every show and it‚Äôs made Max such a headache for what used to be one of the best streaming apps.
Title: Max for Massive Headache

Content: I have always enjoyed the selection of shows and movies on hbo, it‚Äôs the app I know will have something to watch if I couldn‚Äôt find anything on my other steaming apps. The only issue with the old hbo app it was glitchy and would cut out mid movie or show. It was annoying but not bad enough to cancel. This new app has completely eliminated that issue and is much better overall with the viewing experience.
Title: Much improved

Content: Amazing content everybody I think with the current update the app performs very good, especially since I stream it on my phone but two shows that I haven‚Äôt seen which I would like to our dark tails with Don Wildman and true terror with Robert Englund so if you could add that to your service, that would be great other than that keep up the good work I enjoy the DC horror and other content you provide
Title: Amazing content and two shows I want to see

Content: I recently started using Max because I felt like Netflix has been moving away from movies that I typically enjoy and getting more independent films, which is great if that‚Äôs what you enjoy. For me, I would never watch it.   Now I find myself getting excited to watch movies! I love enjoying movies alone, while cleaning, family time, and more! Max has really been the best change in streaming services!!! Netflix what?!  Max is a here it‚Äôs at!
Title: Incredible Change

Content: Max definitely has bugs, it‚Äôs super slow even with good internet connection. Then it also constantly logs you out on multiple devices and makes you have to log back in. Then it‚Äôll ask you to chose a plan all over again even though your original one hasn‚Äôt ended, and it auto charges so that shouldn‚Äôt even be an issue. Then there‚Äôs the crazy price on it. 100% over charging people. The only good things it has is the dc collection even though it incomplete and the the old Cartoon Network shows from when we were kids. It has partnerships with both companies and still has a limited collection on both.
Title: Not good.

Content: An absolute terrible streaming app, a 1 hour episode take 3-4 hours to watch due to the buffering issue. The app is updated all other streaming apps work fine. This app is the only issue. You would think a company that has been around as long as H.B.O. would have a quality product. Especially with the success of Game of Thrones, Sopranos, etc has had. I know they aren't hurting for money, and can afford to make something with quality. Companies that have been out for a fraction of the time are better than this company. STEP IT Up and stop being a company that is screwing people over by charging a premium price for inferior product.
Title: Wish no stars was an option

Content: Max AKA HBO max is a great app that you can you use on your iPad, iPhone and television. I prefer Tv better than iPhone or iPad, Just because you get a bigger screen and view. You can watch almost anything that pops in your head. Like DC or Horror like the evil dead rise or something else. Anime is also I pick, They don‚Äôt have lot of anime‚Äôs like the action movies they have but it is a good category to choose from. Max is better then any streaming app. You try it out
Title: My review

Content: Menu loud you to scroll in block of four, the new series menu. How do you scroll all the way to the right. It‚Äôs have 20+ episodes. Also the restart back to the beginning of each episode. The only way to restart a serious episode is to first quick on the episode, then back out and select restart. The old app seem to function, more user-friendly for a lot of series options.
Title: Please Update the Series Menus

Content: Not sure exactly what was wrong with the original app. I could get around the globe much more easily. I travel between countries a lot and never had much problems with the original HBO max app. Now they made me download the Max app and all of a sudden I‚Äôm out of my favorite shows whenever I‚Äôm in Brazil. The other app worked just fine - so I‚Äôm not sure how rights to the content in the app would‚Äôve turned a complete 180¬∞ so fast in the sense that one day I could watch all my content, and on the other day y‚Äôall mandate an app switch to something that is not even available in my region. Well, if it‚Äôs not available, why demand the switch?
Title: ‚ÄúNot available in my region‚Äù

Content: The last app was absolute garbage. Wouldn‚Äôt cast, wouldn‚Äôt load shows, crashes constantly. Then this was came out, wow it‚Äôs even worse. Still won‚Äôt cast but if you‚Äôre lucky enough to get it to cast and actually get an episode to play, it won‚Äôt play anymore after. Same error message appears that it can cast the content so you have to close out and try it again only to play the same f@cling game again. On chromecast, the app is just painfully slow and constantly stops to reload. Last time I counted it was 15 times in a 40 minute episode. So glad I‚Äôm unable to watch the content I pay for
Title: Didn‚Äôt think it was possible this app could get any worse

Content: Rebrand the name. Change the entire app. Delete the old. Install the new.  Make a big deal about something no one cares about and then the new app is horrible.  Never saves anything you watch to continue later.  Try to hit the ‚ÄúForward/Back 10 seconds‚Äù and it is super delayed and freezes.   Disappointed. Feels like some ‚Äúhigher ups‚Äù pushed an unreasonable deadline on some poor programmers because upper management made promises.
Title: Garbage Rebrand

Content: The Max app does not accurately keep track of where I left off watching a program. The HBO Max was able to do that and had a number of other features which I appreciated as compared to the new app. I can understand rebranding since they‚Äôre bringing all this other programming, most of which doesn‚Äôt interesting me, and is just clutter, but the overall experience of using the app should not have been a downgrade. I use the app on the newest generation of an Apple TV device.
Title: New Max app is a downgrade from HBO Max app

Content: I love watching South Park and other shows and Max is the best platform to watch it on. You get barley any ads and lots of new shows to enjoy and watch. South Park is my favorite show and I‚Äôm a huge kin for the whole show and characters and I enjoy watching it here since it isn‚Äôt shown on my other TV apps. Great platform to watch shows and movies but it could cut down from the ads and how long you have to wait for the ad to finish.
Title: Great platform!

Content: I feel like I was super content with this app at first because there were so many improvements compare to the last. However , it started to crack under use and I‚Äôm now facing very annoying issues that were as janky as HBO. One very annoying example is the app completely restarting whatever I‚Äôm watching from the very beginning every time I close and open the app while casting. It makes watching movies and shows difficult as I can‚Äôt just close the app and re open it to fix small things such as subtitles or volume due to the app completely restarting what I‚Äôm watching. I‚Äôm aware of others facing this same issue when casting.
Title: HBO flashbacks

Content: I love this ‚Äúnew‚Äù app. Although it is similar to HBO Max it is easy to navigate and have all my shows and movies in one place. Although this app is really convenient to have it is missing one feature that I used a lot and I‚Äôm sure others used on the previous app. SharePlay needs to be added to this because I enjoyed watching shows and movies with my family and friends while on a FaceTime call. Having them choose something to watch or vice versa. Please add this in the future.
Title: Needs SharePlay

Content: Terrible performance ever since they dropped the most crucial part of their name. ‚ÄúMax‚Äù is a trash app with increasingly worse content. This show is doing slightly worse than last season? Cancel it.  Im very disappointed with this change in ownership. HBO used to be my go-to brand for anything in television. Now, I‚Äôd rather use Peacock, and that‚Äôs really saying something.  I encourage others to review bomb this terrible app, so they actually do something about it. Im sure this review will get buried immediately, but if anyone does see this, let‚Äôs try to force their hand. I support SAG and the WGA and think this whole thing is disgusting. Zaslov is a trash human being and needs to be let go.
Title: Max is less

Content: Max is much less friendly that HBO Max was for finding something to watch by category.  Few options and incomplete listings.  Before you could search Just Added for all shows recently added. Now it is just those they feature and not a complete list.  Pretty sad that I have to do a google search to get the list of shows added that month because they are too lazy to provide it in-app.  The old app also had a just added by category. Also eliminated.  Also lost downsized were the searchable genre categories and being able to click on the title for the row to bring up the entire listing in that category. Now you are stuck scrolling to the right and it has just a few in that category.  So much harder to find a movie to watch that I spend less time on this app and more time on prime.  Overall the Max app was a premature launch with limited functionality compared to its predecessor.
Title: Going backward on navigation

Content: This thing freezes and buffers so much I feel like I‚Äôm trapped in 1995. The subtitles don‚Äôt work, the volume doesn‚Äôt work, the videos freeze and close. Do you guys even have software developers, or maintenance, or are they also on strike because you don‚Äôt pay them either?  Updating this to add that now it is auto adjusting the volume to 100% every time I hit play on anything and it absolutely scares the heck out of all of us, is wildly unpleasant, and no matter how fast you try to adjust it, you‚Äôre not going to be fast enough to prevent the actual headache that occurs from something being so insanely loud
Title: Garbage- volume auto adjusts to 100% and scares everyone every time

Content: 1Ô∏è‚É£First off, movies don‚Äôt have extras anymore, only tv shows do now‚Ä¶not ok. Second, in regards to the information of quality for a movie/show, there is none‚Äîunless it‚Äôs in 4k, in which then it tells you all the details (including audio quality and whatnot). It‚Äôd be nice if ALL movies/shows would specify their quality‚Ä¶whether it be 4K, HD, SD, and so on, etc. etc.‚Äîjust be upfront. 2Ô∏è‚É£Second, all the content in the Extras tab for ‚ÄúThe Last Of Us‚Äù (for example) is completely out of order, nothing makes sense in the way it‚Äôs listed. Like, the Podcast episodes are randomly mixed with the behind-the-scenes episodes, just to name an example.
Title: HBO Max was organized better‚Ä¶

Content: Im tired of constantly having to log out because the system glitches and it won‚Äôt show me any shows or even what I‚Äôm watching. It‚Äôs so annoying. It‚Äôs already an entire process to connect it on the tv so for it to constantly glitch like this when you‚Äôre just paying to stream is ridiculous. I really hope they fix this, I never had this many issues with the other app which is why I didn‚Äôt give it one star. Love the shows on it, I just wish they would update and fix these issues.
Title: Tired of this app

Content: Since the update to ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù the continue watching feature has been buggy and not working for shows that I‚Äôm currently watching, though old items are still there that I have started but have no desire to finish (and wish I could remove). I have signed out of Max, restarted my Roku TV and logged back in and that fixed the problem for the time and now, the next day, I‚Äôm back to having to search for the series and episode that I was watching. First world problem but still annoying.
Title: Continue Watching Not Working

Content: Not able write reviews for Apple TV Max app. So writing the review here. With the change from HBO Max to a new Max app. The media player is no longer the native tvOS media player or no longer behaves like the native tvOS player. This makes it harder to rewind and fast forward. Also not able to use the clickpad ring on the remote to easily scrub through timeline to the exact point in the video. Please change back to native tvOS media player.   Also the sound when the app launches can be irritating, disrupting, and harmful especially depending on the volume level of headphones or sound systems.  Please give the option to disable the sound.  Thanks.
Title: Native tvOS Player Not Used for Apple TV app

Content: Haven‚Äôt had the displeasure of updating to Max on all my devices, but the app is terrible on iPad OS. For reference, I‚Äôm running the app on a 2022 iPad Pro with the latest OS update.  The app struggles with full screen mode. Sometimes leaving the dock bar visible, sometimes the clock/date/battery, sometimes both. Controls for play/pause, etc. permanently disappear, leaving the only route to play/pause content through the control center. Sometime the curser goes away, sometimes it stays indefinitely. When I zoom view (no black bars) it struggles to back to widescreen again and lags video when doing so.   Aesthetically the app is meh. I‚Äôm sure there were IP-related reason for creating the new app but there are zero enhancements in my opinion to the UX/UI over the outgoing HBO Max app. I would not have updated if given the choice and will begrudgingly update the rest of my devices to keep watching my shows.   I‚Äôm sure the app issues will get resolved in a future update but the QA of this initial release was awful.
Title: Terrible on iPad

Content: I was told that the switch from HBO Max to Max would be easy, but here I am not able to sign in and when I went to customer support all I get is no help from them, I kept waiting for help but just got different people saying that they were looking up my problem. What has with this app it used to be my favorite but now I‚Äôm thinking of canceling my subscription before I get charge for another month.
Title: Not working

Content: OK I like the app it‚Äôs just a little bit like the search letters are a bit too small and how I do like the way things are organized. I just please make the slightly bigger because it is hard when I am sitting at the back of my living room, and I just cannot see when I‚Äôm trying to search and don‚Äôt tell me just get a bigger TV. My TV is perfectly big thank you goodbye ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è PS if there is is if there is a way to do this on Settings please let me know. Thank you goodbye.
Title: A pretty good review

Content: The player software is almost unusable.   You can‚Äôt use any Apple TV 4K shortcuts, like changing to ‚ÄúReduce Loud Sounds‚Äù for late night play. You must quit the app and plunge deep into System Settings to activate it.  Then quit, back, back, back (you been there too, eh?)  If you want to see an episode again?  It starts waaay at the end of the episode, and never resets ‚Äî even episodes from GOT I have not seen in years still begin at the very end of the episode! And no quick choice like in ALL apps that use Apple‚Äôs built-in player to ‚ÄúBegin Again‚Äù.  If you watch a show episode or a movie, and ten minutes in you think ‚Äúyuck, this is horrible, forget this!‚Äù   Max keeps it in your ‚ÄúRecently Watched‚Äù area with NO recourse to remove it..   It‚Äôs like they are PUNISHING ME for watching a movie I didn‚Äôt enjoy‚Ä¶  And Search?  Don‚Äôt even go there, I been complaining way more than I ever do in an app review. So I‚Äôll stop here by saying, TWO STARS.  Barely.
Title: Terrible App on Apple TV 4K

Content: I really appreciate having to download a new app on each of my devices just so that Warner Media could drop one word from the name of their streaming service, and give it a stupid decided by committee slogan.  I also look forward to having to download ‚Äúax‚Äô- this is the one‚Äô in 2025, and ‚Äúx‚Äô-please don‚Äôt stop giving us money‚Äô in 2027.  All of which wouldn‚Äôt be an issue if they bothered to fix their broken app with the rollout. But that would have required them to focus resources on the technical side, instead of paying 30 marketers to rub all five of their collective neurons together so they could come up with something as inspired as ‚Äúthe one to watch‚Äù.
Title: Why is this a new app?

Content: We‚Äôve been asking for you to follow basic ui/ux concepts, but you seem determined to reinvent the wheel. You had chance to start anew‚Äîyou built a new app‚Äîand you still missed the mark. Buttons don‚Äôt look like buttons. The ones that do are tiny. Playback of a previously watched show/movie starts at the last second on the timeline, causing it to end and go back to the menu. Episode cards are so large that only 2.5-3 fit on the screen. For why, HBO? For why?
Title: Still managed to screw it up

Content: Seems pointless and inconvenient for users‚Ä¶especially if you have the HBO Max app already installed on several devices, like an Apple TV, Smart tv, IPad , IPhone ‚Ä¶.so now you have to download and re connect to you account on all those devices, not to mention having to delete the old app from all those devices‚Ä¶. And honestly speaking‚Ä¶for what seems to be really no benefit‚Ä¶.seems like the same shows as before‚Ä¶just a different interface, and I personally liked the old one better. Doesn‚Äôt feel like some kind of new and better experience‚Ä¶..really‚Ä¶..what was the point??? I don‚Äôt get it.
Title: Just‚Ä¶..why????

Content: Lol, what a joke! I‚Äôm not even a Lakers or Celtics fan, but how do you call a series ‚ÄúWinning Time‚Äù, base it on the Laker Dynasty, get the viewing audience to buy in, and then CANCEL it midway through following the most devastating playoff defeat in Laker history?  I really despise when networks cancel series for shock value, and that‚Äôs clearly what happened here. Netflix started this stupid trend and lost untold amounts of brand loyalty in the process. Now mindless HBO‚Ä¶.er, ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù (lol) has decided to act the part of trained mynah birds and do the exact same thing. It‚Äôs a pathetic tactic, and while you‚Äôll surely grab the headlines you seek, you can do it without my dollars going forward. Subscription cancelled and app deleted.
Title: Cancel ‚ÄúWinning Time‚Äù? See ya never

Content: I have been trying to sign in to my account and the service is not accepting my password on one of my TVs and my phone. It is signed in to two other devices with this same password and working fine. I tried to get a password reset email several times and one never came. There is no number to contact customer service and I am not interested in waiting for an email reply for a solution to my problem. I ultimately decided to cancel the service for this reason. It‚Äôs a shame because I like the selection of shows and movies.
Title: Great selection, nonexistent customer service

Content: I haven‚Äôt noticed any changes after the change from HBO Max. The only issue I‚Äôve noticed is when you use your iPhone to stream. Starting two weeks ago, the voice narration come on automatically. When you try to turn it off , the option isn‚Äôt there while casting/streaming. When you play on the iPhone, the option is there, but shows as not selected.  If you‚Äôre going to use the app to stream to your television, use another device.
Title: B+

Content: Content is pretty good. Seems to be relying more on dark, ‚Äúevil‚Äù, supernatural and the sensational, rather than the HBO of old that had movies and series that were thought provoking and original. I miss that. In fairness, there are a few exceptions. My biggest issue is with the interface. It can be more difficult than it should be to get back to something you‚Äôre watching after you‚Äôve left the app and come back. On other streaming services, it‚Äôs the first thing you see, or easily found on a drop down list.
Title: Needs some work

Content: Update: Somehow the app has gone backwards. Now every time I watch something on the iPad it always shows the bright white line on the bottom and the time info etc on top. It on constantly and extremely distracting. Why get rid of the HBO name that took years to build and earned a great reputation as the destination for quality. The app is a massive downgrade in quality. Plus, if I wanted discovery group of channels I would have signed up for it. This change makes no sense at all. Makes me rethink my streaming subscriptions. Update 2:  Max said to remove and download still not working properly. Almost unwatchable on iPad with everything still on the screen.
Title: Why?!?!

Content: The app is terrible. There‚Äôs no working Continue Watching feature, which is Streaming 101. If you hunt under My Stuff, it tells you you don‚Äôt have any programs in progress even though you do, so you then have to search for the show you‚Äôre watching, which wants to start with S1:E1 even though you‚Äôre already on S3, and then the episode starts at the end credits so you have to rewind it. The iPad version has a white bar at the bottom of the screen and three dots at the top that you cannot get rid of. Max powers that be: Expect the mass exodus you deserve for destroying a perfectly good app. Many executives need to lose their jobs for this debacle. GET IT TOGETHER!!!
Title: Absolute Trash

Content: I first wanted to watch horror movies like Halloween, scream 1996 obviously bc Billy loomis, and Friday the thirteenth but you had to pay for it all.  I already had paramount plus but it didn‚Äôt have everything. Maybe two scream movies and that‚Äôs all. But I wanted to watch other things other than those every. Single. Day. So it said the things that I‚Äôm looking for are all on max! So thank you soooo much! You actually helped me a lot.
Title: Max is amazing!!!!

Content: The new Max app no longer remembers where you left off. I just started a tv show and am on season 2, but the app doesn‚Äôt show it in the Continue Watching section. I‚Äôm forced to navigate to the tv show and select the episode I want. Qlso, previously watched episodes don‚Äôt have the white bar underneath, indicating that they‚Äôve been watched.   Speaking of Continue Watching, I‚Äôve only been able to remove *some* titles from the list. Not only that, but there‚Äôs lot of titles on there that I already finished months ago. There are a handful of titles that can‚Äôt be removed, no matter how many times I hit the remove button.
Title: Buggy since the name change

Content: Ever since the change from HBO Max to Max app, the app has been nothing but buggy. In the last couple weeks it‚Äôs started to automatically enable audio description when I cast on Google Chromecast. I have updated both the app and chromecast. Tried all the audio/ stereo settings on chromecast. When watching on my phone, I see the English Audio Description setting option however when casting, the audio settings only show English but I assume it‚Äôs setting it to Audio Description in the backend. Please fix this as I cannot watch shows and movies otherwise.
Title: Audio description issue

Content: I didn‚Äôt think the shift to ‚Äúmax‚Äù would have much meaning since they‚Äôre just trading three-letter words but it matters. Navigating HBO was super smooth and responsive. Max seems slower. Did y‚Äôall get rid of the bonus content at the end of every episode of Succession? I can no longer watch actor/director/show runner interviews and it‚Äôs super disappointing. How much content did we lose in your shift to max? I love HBO! It was always a big deal to have it back in the 80‚Äôs. Cinemax was known as ‚Äúskin-a-max‚Äù because of the racy late-night soft core porn they always featured. HBO should have taken over cinema, not the other way around.
Title: HBO Nostalgia

Content: I believe Max has probably one of the worst user interfaces for a streaming service platform. Constantly buggy and can never remember where you left off on a show/movie if you pause it and leave the app. I do like the content on max however after only a few short months I decided to cancel my subscription after its frustrating performance. Another thing that I really didn‚Äôt like is how they would skip a payment for the month and then collect 2 payments the next month to make up for it. HBO Max was a thousand times better.
Title: Garbage User Interface

Content: This app is very easy to use. However, I am trying to log in with my provider and it is not taking me to the correct page after selecting my provider. Instead, it just shows me the page advertising to sign up for HBO Max through XFINITY and when I log in, it does nothing. PLEASE correct this issue!!! It has been very frustrating to not be able to even log in to use the app.
Title: Weird Bug

Content: This app has been a pain since it came out I had to go back on everything and update everything then had to turn around and make a new account so it deleted all of my progress on my shows even though I already had max and now trying to log in on all my devices we had to change the password and it won‚Äôt let us get your stuff together if your gonna change the app at least make it better than your last one I‚Äôve never had any problems out of HBO max and ever since this max came out it‚Äôs been non stop issue after issue it‚Äôs making me really debate on canceling my subscription.
Title: Trouble logging in

Content: I‚Äôm not sure why they needed a whole new app, the old one seemed to work just fine. I just got the new app on my tv and in the last two hours trying to watch a movie with my kids it had sucked! We‚Äôve had lag every few minutes and we have to pause the movie for it to fix itself. But that only lasts for a few minutes then we have to do it again. I was really enjoying the HBO Max app and didn‚Äôt kind the cost. But if this doesn‚Äôt get fixed asap I‚Äôll be stopping my subscription and I fell like many others will too. HBO you need to work out this problem asap before you starting loosing money left and right!
Title: Why a New App

Content: Max has EVERYTHING on it. It has like this section on it called brand Highlights or something like that but on that section it has like ID,HBO OGS,Max OGS,and stuff like that. I love ID because I love true crime and horror and stuff. Yesterday I clicked on ID and found Body Cam and I was soooooooo happy it was on there because I can‚Äôt find that show anywhere anymore. Max has movies like The Goonies,Coraline,Stephan King‚Äôs It,Robots, it even has Naked and Afraid on there too. But the overall conclusion is that I LOVE Max
Title: I love Max

Content: I‚Äôm not a review-writing person, but this app is too terrible for me to ignore. It loses all control options when streaming: - Accessibility controls often disappear, losing subtitle options (which is non-compliant!).  - No volume control. Changes volume between streams without anyone touching the devices‚Ä¶ - Often experience ‚Äúunexpected errors‚Äù when trying to stream. Disconnects with no warning.  - App fails to react to prompts. I‚Äôll go to disconnect it (because of all of these issues), and the app becomes unresponsive.  I‚Äôve tried closing the app, signing out and in, redownloading. Nothing changes. And it‚Äôs clear these issues are the app, not the device(s), because all the other streaming apps work just fine.  We often end up watching something else on a different app just out of frustration, which is annoying because the HBO content is far superior, but no content justifies this headache.   The HBO Max app had its glitches, but nothing as disruptive as this.
Title: Terrible streaming functionality.

Content: If somebody from the design side is reading this, please fix this channel so when you're looking at the overview of the episodes you can select which episode you'd like and it gives you an option to restart after you've already finished. It only allows you to restart episodes your currently watching. And when you choose an episode you've already watched even if you finished until the very end, it'll automatically start at the very end and you have to be quick to rewind or it'll go into the next episode. I feel like I'm in 1998 rewinding Disney VHS tapes. The old HBOmax didn't have this issue. Please fix!
Title: Max on Roku

Content: If you would‚Äôve asked me what my preferred streaming platform was a year ago.. I would‚Äôve said Netflix but Max continues to bring the best content. From my day to day binge of Friends for comfort, the anticipation for the next season of Just Like That and nail biters like Love and Death‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm hooked and have cancelled every other subscription service but my live TV subscription! Also stoked on the ease of use with the upgraded app!!
Title: Truly is the ONE to watch.

Content: First you have to pay so much for a months subscription and the movies constantly freeze the app always has issues on loading and it‚Äôs definitely not my WiFi because none of my other apps give as much issues as this one. I hate the fact that I‚Äôm trying to watch a Spanish movie with no subtitles and you guys still have it in it so I see huge words when I know Spanish and don‚Äôt need subtitles it‚Äôs ridiculous. Also it would be nice to have better movies added if I‚Äôm going to be paying more than $15 for the subscription.
Title: Needs Improvement

Content: The Max app launched in May and was immediately panned for lacking many features of the old app. The layout is worse and some features, like being able to shuffle episodes of a show, are still missing months after release. What‚Äôs also bad is that outside of the US, HBO max still functions, so everyone else gets better features and a more established app. Until I feel this app matches what the old one did, it will be one star from me. I won‚Äôt give positive marks to steps taken backwards.   1 star without shuffle. 5 stars when it returns. Simple as that!
Title: Less features than old HBO max. 1 star until shuffle feature is back.

Content: I‚Äôm giving this 2 stars because it was working better then the last version.  For the last several days I‚Äôve been trying to get on the app on my tv and it just keeps kicking me back to the main menu screen.  I tried resetting the WiFi several times and it sort of worked but could only watch 1 thing and if I backed out of the app it would have the same problem of kicking back to the main screen.  Frustrating!  HBO has never been able to get their apps working properly with any kind of consistency since HBO Go.
Title: Problem for days

Content: Loving the new update to the app. It‚Äôs better and faster. Just have one problem the serious lack of Japanese, Chinese and Korean anime and Tv shows which by the way are 2 total different genres could use a lot of work. I now I‚Äôm probably not the only one with this issue. And if I am oh well. It would be nice if you guys to add these. And separate all the American cartoon from the Ghibli studios movies please and thank you
Title: It‚Äôs better

Content: Ever since they switched the app to ‚Äúmax‚Äù I can no longer watch it on my older iPads or iPhones that have iOS 12 because the older app no longer functions because they disabled the hbo max version that did work. for no reason..it no longer lets you log in.. and ‚Äúmax‚Äù requires iOS 14. I don‚Äôt see why they make the requirement so high for something as simple as a streaming app. Shouldn‚Äôt need the newest iOS or device in order to do something so simple that doesn‚Äôt necessitate the need for a new device or OS. Not thrilled with this nonsensical anti consumer move.. they must be working with apple for planned obsolescence.
Title: No longer works on some devices.

Content: 1) The excitement about the HBO+Max rebranding is all about you. Customers don't care. If there's a benefit to this switch, I have yet to find it. The MAX app is obviously the original HBO app with some new logos. Yay.  / 2) No Apple Magic Keyboard support. Your users (remember us?) have keyboards and would like to be able to do simple things like skip backward/forward/pause with the space bar and arrow keys. It's not hard. Call me if you need help. Or refer to the dev docs.  / 3) New bugs, including the transport overlay remaining on screen and having to be manually dismissed. This wouldn't be a big deal if the rest of MAX worked properly. It's easy to overlook a few bugs, but your entire app is a bug.  / 4) Summary: Your marketing team is probably patting itself on the back for swapping out "HBO" assets for "MAX": Your customers *don't care*. There's nothing like paying for a premium service and seeing the dough invested in all the wrong things. Your priorities are a joke.
Title: Rebranding: *Nobody cares*: Fix the app first!

Content: Only thing I want to say is bring back all the classic Ben 10 plz. My son was watching it and then you took it off the next day he was upset and I love the classics. Bring them all back on. You‚Äôll get more reviews and they‚Äôll be better. A lot of people like the old time shows we watched as kids. Like pink panther. Pop eye. All of those and more bring them back. It‚Äôll make a lot of people happy
Title: Bring it all back plz

Content: First, had the HBO Max app for years and it was great!  No issues as of late.  Had to switch to the new ‚ÄúMax‚Äù App and we have had nothing but problems. We have noticed about 30 minutes into steaming a show, it gets stuck‚Ä¶. spinning wheel... stuck again‚Ä¶. longer spinning wheel‚Ä¶.. then perpetually stuck.  Have to reboot everything g and start all over.  No, it does not remember where we left off‚Ä¶.. we have to figure that out and scroll to the episode and spot within the episode, and then it gets stuck again.  Absolutely frustrating!  Refusing to use it until things are fixed because it‚Äôs a  waste of our time.
Title: ‚ÄúMax‚Äù stinks!

Content: The most irritating thing about the change is my programs aren‚Äôt being remembered anymore. I‚Äôm in the middle of a couple of series and I have to go to the search and find the season and episode each time I want to watch. When it was still HBOMax, it used to mark my spot of whatever I was watching every time. If I‚Äôm paying for something, I expect to get my money‚Äôs worth. Frustration has set in, and I‚Äôm about at my wits end with the service. I know it‚Äôs ‚Äònew‚Äô, and the content is great, but please fix the issues.
Title: Frustrating

Content: The app runs well, there is a lot of content available, The shows and the menus look great, and everything transferred from HBO max without a problem so I‚Äôm enjoying it right now. The only issues I have is that certain features from the old app is missing here, like the ability to download the iPad version on the Mac, or being able to watch with friends on FaceTime. If you could implement these past features soon that would make a great improvement to the experience.
Title: Good app but lacking features

Content: Very pleased with content. There doesn‚Äôt seem to be much missing. I‚Äôve only been looking for my favorite series so far and they‚Äôre all here. I would strongly recommend better search options. There is SOOOO much content on this site that if you do a keyword search you‚Äôre getting 20 pages of everything from mythbusters to Sesame Street to Sex in the City. Would be nice if there were ways to search just in discovery or hbo etc.
Title: Advanced search options would be great

Content: Its a really good app and they have great movies and shows on it! However i really wish they had like a rate what you‚Äôve just seen like Netflix or other streaming services offer! Because i feel like that really does help personalize like your recommendations on what to watch next! And that really does help especially if you‚Äôre someone like me who will sit and watch like 3 hours of trailers trying to find something good to watch but then never end up actually watching anything!
Title: Great streaming service, besides one thing

Content: The content quality has gone down hill. Love that Rick and Morty are on here. We are going to take a break for a while until something decent comes on, like Dune part 2.  Wish they had not messed up the last season of Game of Thrones. We use to re watch that all the time. We stopped re watching it after season 6 , hard to rewatch one of your favorite shows when you know they rune it in the end. They really should have thought that through. Better to wait than rush crap and wreck something. Hopefully they learned their lesson.
Title: Quality of shows has gone downhill

Content: The old HBO Max was pretty decent for maneuvering the menus and shows, episodes were in 4 columns, there was a shuffle option for shows with more than X episodes which was very nice, and you had the option to start over a movie or show when you clicked it.  Now there is no shuffle, there's just one super long line of episodes instead of columns, and you have to access a submenu instead of clicking on an episode to start it over. Just a  pain to navigate around the menu now.   Please bring back columns, shuffle, and an option to restart without having to go into the options for an episode
Title: Horrible UI. Please Revert

Content: Personally I like the update I know a lot of people are having issues with it but I‚Äôm enjoying it. I do however wish it stayed the color purple just because of the fact it was the only streaming service with the color purple and I found that very unique. Especially because HBO max was saving discovery so I believe it‚Äôs should‚Äôve stayed purple.   But other than that I‚Äôm enjoying the new merging of the two apps.
Title: HBO Max >> Max

Content: I opened the HBO Max app today to be greeted with a message telling me to download their new app. I was forced to comply only to be disappointed. After waiting for the download and logging into the ‚Äúmax‚Äù app (super creative new name), I didn‚Äôt see any real improvements from their previous app. Now maybe I missed some changes because it was a short matter of time before it logged me out and refused to let me log back in. The online support was useless, and if I knew this was all going to happen, I would‚Äôve just cancelled my subscription yesterday to avoid it all. Don‚Äôt waste your time with this garbage subscription service or app.
Title: Unnecessarily Inconvenienced

Title: Harry Potter movies

Content: HBO continues to have the worst tech of all of the streaming services. 20+ mins to get logged into the new - and completely unnecessary- app, all bc you can‚Äôt connect with your provider through your smart tv and they hide the information about needing to connect through the (new) app in the subsection of a hidden ‚Äúhelp‚Äù page. God forbid they have a customer service phone number where you can connect with an actual human being to trouble shoot the issue, probably bc they‚Äôve replaced all of their employees with AI in addition to refusing to pay their writers all in the name of preserving their bottom line and paying exorbitant amounts of money to their CEOs
Title: Worst Technology

Content: App is good, worth the fee‚Ä¶. Only issue still is movies come in to dark and shows, app doesn‚Äôt have the ability to adjust the brightness like Netflix app does which is disappointing, being this has been an issue since hbo max started ‚Ä¶ and I have repeatedly have said this to hbo max and no updates to fix this issue ü§®üò©ü§¨ which takes away from viewing experience.
Title: Great

I do wish they kept all the categories(adult swim, max originals, etc) to the side instead of me scrolling to the bottom but hopefully I can adjust to that.
Title: So far I think it‚Äôs an improvement.

Content: It‚Äôs very cool cause it‚Äôs not just HBO, it‚Äôs to the max. So take whatever show you might like, say Game of Thrones, and with this app it‚Äôs GOT Max. You get more than even George RR Martin could envision, it‚Äôs like George RR Max Martin. It might get confusing if another show had Max in the title, for instance Mad Max, because it would become Mad Max Max. It might make sense for HBO to avoid shows with the name Max in the title. Actively working to prevent this type of a snafu would be best for the bottom Max line.
Title: Very cool Max

Content: I loved HBO Max, and didn‚Äôt really understand the need for a change. I‚Äôm sure someone bought out someone and the people in charge changed - blah blah woof woof. As with anything new, there are glitches. Shows keep pausing to load, fast forward and rewind options are slow‚Ä¶. And before you say ‚Äúit‚Äôs your internet‚Äù ‚Ä¶ my husband is a gamer and we have the fastest Internet available. None of which are affecting my overall life. It‚Äôs just really annoying and once again‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt really understand the need for a change.
Title: Meh

Content: Terrible low rent version of a well working interface - AppleTV seemed like an afterthought - subtitles don‚Äôt stay on so have to be selected for each episode of something even - continue watching doesn‚Äôt always show most recent episode watched if you‚Äôve watched on two different devices - if you try to rewatch the most recent episode it just defaults back out to the menu as if it doesn‚Äôt want you to rewatch it - so many issues for anyone with hearing issues/sensory issues (hello! That blue is terrible) only upside has been that I got to cancel the arbitrary Discovery+ sub we had since 95% of the stuff we watch is available on Max.
Title: Terrible

Content: Honestly, I like the Max app better than the original app, because it‚Äôs less glitchy and the chromecast experience is better. However, I‚Äôve noticed it tends to forget your current place in a show by ~2 minutes occasionally. My biggest complaint is that you cannot access downloaded shows without Wi-Fi (ie. on airplane mode). What‚Äôs the point of downloading shows if the app won‚Äôt load them when you aren‚Äôt connected? Please consider making this possible.
Title: Better than HBO max but could improve

Content: HBO has been there with games of thrones . I am sorry if you hate me or the show ! I am a DC F-fest I love dc everything as long as it‚Äôs good writing .  Some  anime is blah , but for the most part ! And true crime !!!!! Come on forensic files !!!!!    So Sansa can kick the f out of Batman any given day  while leaving clues so animal planet knows it was her !
Title: Why I love max

Content: Does not save my progress of the show I am rewatching. It's not listed on the "continue watching" section of the home page so I have to manually search for the show every time and then try to figure out what episode I left off with. To top it off, since this is a rewatch, every time I click the episode I want to start it skips to the last ~10 seconds of the episode and starts immediately trying to skip to the following episode. It is absolutely infuriating to use this app, to the point I almost want to cancel until they get it together.
Title: SAVE MY PROGRESS!

Content: There‚Äôs a lot wrong with this, and the HBO max app was way better. The app is harder to navigate and use and definitely still in an experimental stage. The main issue I have is SharePlay doesn‚Äôt work anymore. Me and my boyfriend are long distance and SharePlay makes it easier for us to feel connected and HBO max was one of our favorite apps to use. I know they removed stuff and stoped production of a lot of already green lit shows and movies (including the amazing world of gumball movie) but I didn‚Äôt think they would get rid of to many features like SharePlay. Extremely disappointed.
Title: üëé

Content: I was pumped for this app. Big disappointment. Shuffling episodes went away. Then I noticed when an episode ends and the next one starts, when you go back to the home menu it starts the series at season 1 episode 1. For example if I watched season 3 episode 2 of veep and episode 3 starts, if I decide I want to watch something else, the main series page will say "watch season 1 episode 1" and it'll be removed from my watch history. I now need to remember what episode I just watched in order to continue where I left off. So disappointing
Title: No shuffling and doesn't retain "keep watching"

Content: Does anyone else notice that shows you just watched will remain in your ‚ÄúContinue Watching‚Äù row? I have to go through and restart and fast forward to the end to get them to go away. Many won‚Äôt go away until you fast forward through the credits. Weird.  Also, a lot of the new shows are so trashy. ‚ÄúMy feet are killing me‚Äù is a reality show about foot doctors that has 4 seasons!!! Who wants to sift through shows like that to find something quality to watch? Sometimes less is more.
Title: Continue Watching

Content: Since you create a new version a week ago to ‚Äúfix bugs‚Äù your app took me out of my account not allowing me to sign in and showing this device sync error,I contacted your support team and they were unable to help me,I even tried to create another account but nothing seems to work the same error keeps popping up. So sadly I am afraid I won‚Äôt be able to create another account cuz you won‚Äôt let me and after almost 2 years of using HBO you forced me to request a refund for my last payment month of subscription which I won‚Äôt be able to use so why should I pay for it.
Title: Your new version don‚Äôt work

Content: I cannot play a single movie on the ps4 I‚Äôve done digging and neither can anyone else. It will play the same two or single ad in a very dodgy quality ab it‚Äôs not my WiFi everyone on ps4 is having the same problem they can‚Äôt watch movies or shows bc it started buffering immediately after the ad and refuses to play it they only way I could entertain the idea more was wait and it took an entire hour to load then it just restarted again and again. I have to give two stars since it simply doesn‚Äôt even work on this platform
Title: Serious issue

Content: I have two AppleTVs in my home. On one of them, Max automatically started working correctly without a hitch. Unfortunately, that‚Äôs the guest room TV. On our main TV, Max just didn‚Äôt want to let us in and refused to connect with my paid cable provider subscription. On hold with customer service for hours. I vaguely recall how they also botched the last transition from HBO to HBOmax where I lost my complete favorites list. Didn‚Äôt learn a thing apparently. These guys still don‚Äôt understand technology.  Adding boilerplate ‚Äûdeveloper responses‚Äú after a month doesn‚Äôt help either.   I temporarily solved the problem by swapping the two Apple TV units. After 2 weeks, I finally got through to support and they ‚Äúreset the blockage‚Äú in the account, whatever that means, which enabled me to reconnect the second unit. My email query finally received a response another week later.   If these guys were technically more competent, they would eat Netflix‚Äòs lunch. But like this, meh.
Title: Yet another botched transition

Content: When the new app launched, I was easily able to switch over to Max and had no problems. Until yesterday. I went to go on the app on my tv and it told me I had to sign in, so I tried. But it won‚Äôt let me log in. It says my information is incorrect. But every thing works on my iPad. I‚Äôve tried to do the reset email thing multiple times but I never get the email. Title: I have no clue what‚Äôs going on

Title: HBO Max upgrade to max

Content: HBO Max felt like a safe bet when it came to exploring new content. Incredibly high quality material and features across the board. Now it's swamped with z-grade guff from the Discovery Network. Not only that, but HBO Max's UI and features have all essentially been gutted. Even their ‚Äúhubs‚Äù section has been rebranded as ‚Äúbrand spotlight‚Äù which makes the entire app feel cold and corporate. Why is it blue now? Oh, because it focus tested well. I don't know if they were able to focus test the streaming quality though because it does not stop buffering. Nearly doubled the run time of the show. Just incredibly disappointing.
Title: I'm Legitimately Disappointed

Content: I don‚Äôt wanna question the marketing expertise of a company that‚Äôs made billions by foisting Chip and Joanna Gaines on the world, but Disney is blue. Paramount is blue. Prime Video is blue. This app is as generic as Discovery‚Äôs bland reality TV programming. It‚Äôs less user friendly than HBO. And it‚Äôs cluttered with extra programming.   With prestige shows like Barry and Succession ending, I fear for the future of HBO as a place for must-see programming. The buzz about The Idol being re-written to appeal to more viewers doesn‚Äôt sound great. And Discovery runs shows for 8 million seasons. Will that happens with dramas on HBO now too?  We already have a place for shows that run too long‚Ä¶Showtime.
Title: Discovery Bought HBO to Destroy It‚Äôs Prestige

I always find something I want to watch here - Cartoon Network shows from the ‚Äò90s, DC movies, and the HBO series from the 2000s. Keep it up, whoever is making those choices
Title: Tbh this is the best streaming service

Content: I had to download the Max app on my Apple TV to replace the old app‚Ä¶ and I hate the new one. The old app had content that was easy to find because of the hubs: here‚Äôs the DC Comics stuff, here‚Äôs the movie classics, here‚Äôs the Adult Swim, etc. And the new app just has it all lumped together. I can no longer browse content the way I could before. It‚Äôs a huge step backward and I‚Äôm very angry about it. I‚Äôm seriously thinking about dumping it altogether until it‚Äôs at least as usable as it was before. Just a few days ago, I was telling a friend that HBO Max was my favorite streamer. Now I‚Äôm thinking about dumping it altogether. Way to go, geniuses.
Title: A huge step backward

Content: Why do I need to log in and re-create an account every time that I want to use this app? It happens both on my TV, computer, and phone almost every time that I try to access max. I obviously have an account and I am able to log into it, but for some reason the app thinks that I need to re-create an account every time. Once I go through the silly process I am then told that there is ‚Äúalready an account under this email‚Äù. I already know this which is exactly why I used that email when logging in üòÇ
Title: Log-In Problems

Content: My biggest complaint with this is there is no setting for lighting.. it comes through so dark on iPhone that it‚Äôs almost pointless to watch. Idk why it‚Äôs like that but it really is quite annoying when you are trying to watch something and when it goes to any kind of darker setting or atmosphere it‚Äôs almost impossible to see.. and I‚Äôve checked my other platforms to see if it‚Äôs just the show and it is not.. it is something to do with max. HBOmax also was fine. So max let‚Äôs get it figured out. You are too big and too old of a company not to know and do better!!
Title: It ok I guess

Content: I have tried every single streaming platform and none have the shows that I actually want to watch like Max. Hands down best one. The price is the only thing that bugs me if at all,  it I‚Äôll suffer through it. As much as I try to dislike it for any reason, I can‚Äôt find many flaws it doesn‚Äôt make up for in variety of shows and movies.
Title: Best variety

Content: Max as my literal favorite shows but it‚Äôs so buggy. Currently it is randomly switching to dubbing over the show I‚Äôm watching in Spanish. Although this does feel like a funny prank‚Ä¶it‚Äôs less than ideal.  On and off it will skip episodes so when I come back to a show I was watching, it will be on a totally different episode. It also tends to remove shows from my currently watching. I love having to search for the show I was watching and try to find the episode I was on. TVs more enjoyable when you get to work for it.

Content: Love the app is great with alot of choices of movies and tv series, I recently find out that one of my favorite series is available in other countries and i would like to know when this series will be available for streaming in the US the name is (FLORICIENTA) very popular in the Latins Americans. And as a latins in the US and a subcriber to MAX would to watch it as well. Thank you so much and i hope you guys at MAX take this into consideration.
Title: PLEASED ADD SERIE FLORICIENTA

Content: I'm not sure why HBO tried to reinvent the wheel with a whole new app because it does not work as well as the previous ones. The downloads are unreliable. As soon as you start watching some thing it expires yesterday. And when you try to renew it's acting like you're trying to re-download from scratch, and most of the time fails with "failed to download" even though you're just trying to renew the contents and not actually trying to re-download it.
Title: Unreliable downloads

Content: The app hasn‚Äôt worked properly since I opened it. After several restarts, I can watch a program for a while, but if it is a series episode I‚Äôve seen before, I can‚Äôt re-watch it, and the system gets hung.   The menu is basic‚Äîso searching become more complicated. Work out these glitches soon,  please. I won‚Äôt keep a service that doesn‚Äôt deliver.
Title: Poor Transition

Content: I‚Äôve been trying to watch a show for a few days now and every time I finish watching an episode I back out, and then shut off the app in hopes of saving my place(like I‚Äôve done for this app and other streaming services). When I open the app back up to look for my show it‚Äôs not on continue watching and I have to search it up and then it‚Äôs back on episode one. Ever since it switched to ‚Äúmax‚Äù I‚Äôve had this problem. In the grand scheme of things it‚Äôs a dumb thing to complain about but whatever, I already typed it out. Just hopefully someone who knows how to fix that sees this lol
Title: Doesn‚Äôt save spot

Content: I had HBO and had to download HBO MAX and it‚Äôs horrible. It can‚Äôt retain shows I‚Äôm watching and I have to locate where I was when watching it, it doesn‚Äôt hold my shoes on the continue to watch list. It‚Äôs super annoying and seems like a bug that should be easy to fix. So how about do that! Also, really wish one of these streaming giants could figure out how to ALWAYS skip the intros. If I want to skip it once I want to skip it all the time. This doesn‚Äôt impact my rating but the lack of retention of shows I‚Äôm watching and where I was definitely does.
Title: What did you do?!

Content: I loved the original hbo max app, it hooked up to my projector through my iPhone perfectly. This app is garbage, everytime an ad plays it gets stuck and I have to close the app, restart, and get my show going. Meaning I have to do that 4 or 5 times in an hour long episode sometimes twice per ad. Its insane. Don‚Äôt consolidate apps if you don‚Äôt have the brainpower to test it first
Title: Fix airplay please

Content: It‚Äôs not just all talk with this update.  HBO said they were doubling the content availability and just looking through things, they definitely followed through.   Sooooo much more true crime is the major one I noticed, but then then I started looking through movies‚Ä¶ more, documentaries‚Ä¶. more.  Same quality original HBO content + more of everything else. It‚Äôs all more of a good thing and you really can‚Äôt go wrong with that.
Title: So much more more content!

Content: I would rather have HBO max back than this. It does not save anything I watch into my continue watching and I have to go back and find which episode I left off on and either find my place or start the episode over because at the top it says resume S1E1 when I know I am much further then that. It‚Äôs stupid and I hope it can be fixed.
Title: Terrible update

Content: I was hoping this app would be a good replacement for HBO Max because of how terrible the app worked, but this is just more of the same. Constant connection issues, and downloads take forever and most times fail. Most of my downloads I can‚Äôt even watch without WiFi, so what‚Äôs the point of downloading it. Safe to say HBO won‚Äôt be getting anymore of my money because this is absolutely pathetic and if anyone at HBO cared about their consumers then they would‚Äôve fixed this by now. All they care about is getting your money, and once they have it they don‚Äôt care about keeping you around. DO BETTER HBO!!!
Title: DO BETTER HBO!!!!!!!!!!!

Content: First I want to say that I really like the new app but for me it is not working correctly.  I have problems when I‚Äôm streaming and have to leave the app for some reason any reason and return to it what ever I‚Äôm watching restarts to the beginning. I stream from my iPhone and it is up to date the app is up to date. I have uninstalled and reinstalled app at least 8 times. This is been happening for around a month now.  The app is also not keeping track of what I‚Äôm watching when I finish a episode of what I‚Äôm watching it adds it back to my continue watching list.
Title: This app doesn‚Äôt work for me

Content: WT actual F. Chromecasting causes the volume to shoot to max every single time. The worst part is it‚Äôll do it even when I‚Äôve been watching the same show and it auto plays the next episode. So I can‚Äôt watch a series while I‚Äôm feeling a little sleepy because I might be awakened by my tv blasting whatever on full volume. I almost fell out of bed after nodding off and being startled awake by full blast series recap. The update didn‚Äôt fix this. Also a little annoying that it won‚Äôt save progress on the shows I watch half the time. But honestly thinking about canceling because of the volume thing.
Title: Volume

Content: Since the merger with Warner Brothers, Discovery decided to rebrand the HBOMAX app with this piece of crap. Apparently ALL of Discovery Plus‚Äôs content moved over to this app and mixed with HBO. The content is overwhelming and there‚Äôs a lot to watch and the way they categorize series and movies is a catastrophe it‚Äôs completely scattered. For example I finished watching The Last Of Us and then it recommended Sister Wives as a show I might like because of The Last Of Us. I didn‚Äôt watch it.
Title: Lots Of Content

Content: If anyone outside the United States can see this, please help us. Capitalism is failing and society is crumbling in front of us. What does that have to do with the US? Nothing, that‚Äôs why it gets four stars. It doesn‚Äôt get five because I am unaware of whether it‚Äôs owned by blackrock or not. If it is then redact my rating to a 1 star because zero stars is not available as an option. The app serves its purpose and does it well from what I‚Äôve experienced.
Title: The state of America.

Content: It‚Äôs kind of insane that when you scroll back on an episode that you haven‚Äôt finished, you‚Äôre forced to watch the ads you‚Äôve already seen. Incredibly frustrating as a simple accidental swipe leads to over several minutes of commercials that I already watched in the past twenty minutes.   I would understand if ads were shown again on separate sessions, but the fact that I‚Äôm being forced to watch ads over and over again is absolutely ridiculous and disgusting
Title: Commercials worse than ever

Content: I really appreciate the addition of the new discovery shows but I have to ask why you guys took the A-Z browsing away?  I don‚Äôt always know what genre of movie/show I wasn‚Äôt to watch and it seems that if I just look at the genres and sub genre options I just get the same movies/shows over and over again. Without the A-Z search I don‚Äôt actually get to see the entirety of your catalog. Please bring it back.
Title: Bring back the A-Z search.

Content: Who in the marketing department made this decision to erase the brand name that took years to develop and changed it to a word that doesn't mean anything. I trusted content produced by HBO. This move is, in my opinion, purely an attempt to create buzz in the streaming industry, the useful features in the navigation drill down menu are gone - no more LAST CHANCE, COMING SOON, GENRE - which were useful for managing viewing schedule.
Title: Bad idea

Content: I am trying to watch a movie on the app and the first time I tried to watch it yesterday, the audio would not sync and the picture was zoomed in (not on my tv settings). I tried a different movie on the app, and the audio and video was normal. Today I‚Äôm trying to watch the same movie from yesterday again and the picture is back to normal but the audio still will not sync. Super frustrating. Don‚Äôt understand why they needed to change the app. It‚Äôs just gonna cause weird bugs and unnecessary problems. Annoyed.
Title: Audio won‚Äôt sync

Content: what is the point of creating an entirely new app if it‚Äôs going to be quite literally the same thing. if musically could do it with tiktok, then of all companies, i should expect hbo to be able to do the same thing. a multi billion dollar company should be able to update a simple name change into the ui. to make a completely new app, and expect customers to switch with no concern is quite absurd. if this is the way hbo expects to run, then they should expect a decline in their customer base. it‚Äôs nothing more than an inconvenience to users and offers no benefits whatsoever to download a totally new app for the same content.
Title: Max??

Content: This app is exceptionally difficult to use and even restarting it doesn‚Äôt fix the issue of audio accessibility refusing to turn off. It also randomly changed languages during the show, and insists on non-skippable 2 minute long ads on a platform that I already pay for. If I have to google how to use your app, you‚Äôre doing it wrong. I keep thinking you‚Äôll launch an update fixing this issue but nope.
Title: Still waiting for the app update on audio description

Content: Love the variety of shows I‚Äôve found on max, but there needs improvement with the bugs. The list of current shows I‚Äôm watching doesn‚Äôt update properly so episodes I‚Äôve finished only show they‚Äôve been half watched, causing the show to jump back to episodes I‚Äôve already seen. Also have an issue with the volume jumping to 100% when I first start playing something on max or when I pick a new show.
Title: Good selection but lots of bugs

Content: Maybe I‚Äôm wrong but I swear you used to be able to browse around without paying and view a limited number of things for free. So I could tell a friend, ‚Äúhey go check out the first episode(s) of Barry and if you like it you can pay for a subscription to watch some more of it.‚Äù Now you can‚Äôt, and my friend isn‚Äôt particularly interested in anything they know about on the service so I guess that‚Äôs one less potential customer for you. Seems a shame.  I‚Äôll be back to close out the series but I don‚Äôt expect to stay.
Title: No more free access?

Content: I‚Äôve literally been dealing with having to turn off the subtitles on every single movie and TV show that I ever want to watch on any platform. but it‚Äôs particularly annoying with the Apple TV version, I have to uninstall it and reinstall every single time I want to use the app. I really wish that somebody would develop a workaround for this particular bug by making it impossible for subtitles to turn on automatically without user intervention. This is just inexcusable, it‚Äôs been like this since HBO switched over to Max. I want to watch the movie/tv show not read it. Thanks.
