Content: As an existing customer of HBO I enjoyed the content but have always had an issue is the presentation as if I couldn‚Äôt find what I really wanted to see in general even though I know they have it. The new merge with discovery forced them to come up with a new app and it‚Äôs so much more pleasing than the other one and the competitors especially on the Roku I think it‚Äôs great
Title: Switch over from HBO to MaX

Content: The streaming services provides unbelievable content, that can keep you entertained for hours. while also justifying it‚Äôs price. However, I don‚Äôt like the interface and wish it easier to navigate. I have had issues with search on both IPhone, Apple TV, Roku, and iMac. I know your platform is still in the genesis stages but I hope you continue to improve the product.
Title: Premium streaming platforms

Content: Legit the worst update an app/service could ever had. HBO was much better than this. I‚Äôve tried on phones, consoles and regular tv. None work. It baffles my mind why a company would want to take away the factor that makes it stand out. Many shows were known for HBO, and now it‚Äôs all gone. Not only has that factor been taken away, but so has performance quality. Each show I play on Max plays for thirty seconds before it says my connection is lost, even when Im clearly connected to the internet. This new update makes me want to unsubscribe to such a terrible service.
Title: Wish I could give this a ZERO.

Content: I want to like this new transition for HBO Max to Max, but it‚Äôd be so nice if I didn‚Äôt have to spend 10 minutes going through episodes trying to remember where I left off last every time I want to watch my show. Maybe 2 out of 10 times, there will be a ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù spot, and it‚Äôll take me to my show, but the majority of the time, I have to go physically search the show and flip through the episodes. It‚Äôs just getting really irritating and infuriating that it‚Äôs not saving my progress. Please fix.
Title: The continue watching is gone

Content: This app has THE BEST CONTENT! I feel the transition to MAX from HBO MAX was a little difficult on Apple devices and could‚Äôve used more detailed instructions but once complete all is great. The logging in problem errors resolved in less than 1 hour for me, maybe there was a lot of traffic. Great picture quality. My annual subscription and all my lists were transferred over fine. I LOVE IT!!!
Title: Great Content

Content: To be clear, the app would have to be pretty abysmal (like AMC+) bad for me to not subscribe, just because I have such a deep love for HBO‚Äôs original content. That said, the app works pretty well for the most part. There are occasional bugs, but not frequent enough to be annoying. The app functions pretty much as well as it did when it was HBO Max, so no complaints there.
Title: Great content, pretty good app

Content: it‚Äôs honestly ridiculous at this point. i used to use hbo max all the time and ever since it was changed to max, my chromecast doesn‚Äôt work. everything says to ‚Äúmake sure you‚Äôre on the same wifi‚Äù (obviously) and ‚Äúreset the app‚Äù or ‚Äúreset your chromecast‚Äù or ‚Äúreset your phone‚Äùwhich is crazy to me, because it works with every other streaming platform i use. it‚Äôs not really a usable app at this point. i can find anyone else having this problem either. my app is updated, my chromecast device works fine, YOU are the problem. fix it.
Title: chromecast never works

Content: I was a hbo max subscriber since the beginning. Once they became ‚ÄúMax‚Äù it went right down hill, one day I came home I had a year subscription already paid in full and they won‚Äôt let me log in with out a subscription. They wanted me to provide 4 forms of verification to get into my account and then told me it was through a different party. I bought the subscription through ‚Äúhbo max‚Äù they can‚Äôt even keep their records straight and had awful customer service. I will be boycotting ‚Äúmax‚Äù for as long as I live and I hope you will too after reading this
Title: Max is the worst streaming site of all time

Content: Like the content, but the mix is so flattened that it is impossible to hear dialogue. When raising the volume to hear the dialogue, everything else is way too loud.  Update to respond to developer: it‚Äôs not a setting issue, I just checked. It‚Äôs because Max is requiring a delivery file that mixes for an average of the high and low sounds to create a smaller file. You need to mix for dialogue, even though it creates a larger file. It is impossible to hear your content correctly.
Title: Mix is terrible

Content: I‚Äôll start with just two requests: 1 - a show / movie / episode is no longer ‚ÄúNEW‚Äù once it has been viewed so you can remove the tag. There‚Äôs not a new episode of Barry every day once we‚Äôve watched it! 2 - let‚Äôs add original air date.  You‚Äôve got the year so it‚Äôs a good start. The first episode of Chuck aired September 24, 2007 and it‚Äôs ok if you share that. We shouldn‚Äôt need IMDb because you know what they say, when you have to go somewhere else you might not ever come back!
Title: Off to a fair start

Content: So the previous HBO Max app couldn‚Äôt receive text input into its search field from a bluetooth keyboard. Simple programming that could be accomplished by a 1st year programming student, and a MAJOR FLAW (not a bug - a major error).  They NEVER fixed that in the old app - during years of service. Anyway it now seems to work in the new app. Congrats, you‚Äôve accomplished basic unit testing and a major feature flaw fix. Congrats, hope the rest works as well.
Title: Finally fixed a major flaw, kudos

Content: User friendliness down 100%‚Ä¶ keeps crashing during ads, then if I leave app and come back in it will restart the whole movie! Then if I try to fast forward it to where I left off it will either crash or just keep restarting from the beginning. The picture quality on the app looks weird.. everything about this app is terrible. I‚Äôm actually upset about all the good reviews this is receiving because I know they are not real .. fix this app so I can actually watch a full movie peacefully or I‚Äôm canceling my subscription.
Title: Nothing but problems since the change !

Content: I used and still use this streaming service a lot but ever since they made it into a new app and everything, it‚Äôs been completely horrible. There‚Äôs been one problem for the past week where It keeps on logging me out of my account, then when I try to sign back in, it loads, shows me a glimpse of all the profiles to choose who‚Äôs watching, then goes back to the, ‚ÄúChoose your plan.‚Äù screen, and SOMETIMES it will actually let me log in completely, but most of the time, including NOW it wont. I hate this new app.
Title: Go back to HBO Max

Content: I‚Äôm trying to watch Chernobyl through the app on the iPad pro( latest update) and it is too dark to watch. I own Chernobyl, so I can play it through Apple TV app and picture is great. Please fix this. And yes, my settings are set for best playback and brightness is turned all the way up.I honestly don‚Äôt know why you had to have a whole new app for a name change. HBO max app was fine, but now we get to play find the glitch with your new app. Also how has this won an award for editors choice when it‚Äôs been live for only like 16 hours??

Content: I don‚Äôt get why the changed from hbo max to max. The previous app worked flawlessly. I have had so many issues with max connecting to my chromecast. Some shows it will have audio subtitles and read everything that‚Äôs happening, and he only way I can make it stop it to uninstall and redownload the app. I‚Äôve also had issues with going out of the app into something else and when I go back into max it will restart my show from the beginning and make me watch the ads again. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating. If I could give it zero stars I would.
Title: So many bugs

Content: I‚Äôm so upset by the downgrade in app quality when hbomax became just max - the issue is most notable when casting to another device. If I ever switch to another app then go back to the max app, it resets whatever I‚Äôm watching. Basically that means I can‚Äôt try to pause something without trying to find where I was in the movie/ episode when it jumps back to the beginning. I‚Äôm willing to pay for the content at this point, but if it continues to be this frustrating, I may just look for other avenues.
Title: Consistent casting errors

Content: I am using this on an iPhone and casting it to my tv using chrome cast. When I go to resume my show it never resumes to the correct place.  It will start the show over or resume it from a previous resume. I am constantly having to rewind/fast forward to find my place. There is no thumbnail picture when doing that though so I can never tell where I was. If you are going to watch one thing then be done it is fine but so frustrating to watch a series. Please fix this HBO!
Title: Frustrating With Resume

Content: This is like the 3rd or 4th HBO app over the years youd think they would know how to make a decent streaming app at this point  I have plenty of complaints but the #1 issue is that for months now and this is the 3rd or 4th time ive had this happen when you update the app and have videos downloaded for offline viewing the app will ‚Äòlose‚Äô the videos and not show within the app but still have the storage space taken up. EX I have about 10gigs of movies downloaded for travel I updated the app because the crappy thing keeps crashing, all the videos are gone but im still missing 10gigs. The only way to resolve this is completely uninstall the app clear it off my ipad and reinstall.   Doesnt use the native apple video player accessing things like CC and audio settings arent the same as everything else in apples ecosystem  I could go on and on lucky i have hbo free because this app and hbo are garbage
Title: Max SUUCCCKS

Content: Great job improving the app from the original app. You went back to the drawing board and started fresh and it shows you really worked on your app. Haven‚Äôt had any major issues since the update and change it. No more signing out automatically and I love the new features such as new & notable. keep it up.
Title: Great job improving your app

Content: I renewed my subscription after HBO max became just MAX and it delinked my original account and then set up some random account with my Apple ID. The real kicker is this account has NO EMAIL OR PASSWORD LOGIN. I can only login by restoring purchase and it has none of my old watch history. -10/10 I do not recommend buying through the Apple App Store. I spent HOURS chatting to customer service on both ends and NEITHER could help. Awful service.
Title: Apple ID error

Content: Max has something for everyone in the family. Dive into your favorite shows like Succession (HBO), We‚Äôre Here (Max Original), The Nate & Jeremiah Home Project (Discovery +), The Whole Story With Anderson Cooper (CNN), U.S. Women‚Äôs National Soccer (Max Original), and more. Plus, if you have kids, then unlock content from Cartoon Network, Boomerang and more in the new kid section. This streaming service has all the content you love!
Title: Maximize Your Streaming with Max

Content: i will say before they did this new thing i LOVED hbo max but i have never hated a streaming service more. nothing loads, you can‚Äôt pick an episode to watch because it just switches to a different one. when you want to choose a certain episode it won‚Äôt show that one. you can‚Äôt rewind or nothing in the app will work in general. please fix your bugs before you go and delete what actually worked bc the bugs in this defeat the whole purpose of having this streaming service. on top of all this the look and everything is just so ugly.
Title: just get the other streaming services

Content: I love hbo max! They carry all of my favorite ghibli films. However, I used to be able to switch the preferred language on my ipad but now there is no option to change it. I have been through all of the settings. I can‚Äôt even find out where to change caption settings. Hope this problem gets fixed because this is my favorite streaming service.
Title: Language options disappeared?

Content: I liked the hbo max app better. I hate the blue, but that‚Äôs just a personal preference. It seems to take longer to look for movies and shows on this app than the hbo max app. I cannot have subtitles in this app. It says I can go into my settings & manage them there but there is no option for that in the settings. I have bad hearing, I need subtitles on, I will miss things if I don‚Äôt have them on. So, so far I cannot use it. I wish they would have just kept updating the old app, what was wrong with it? And why change it from hbo max to max? Were they just bored? I don‚Äôt get it. It‚Äôs very stupid lol.
Title: I don‚Äôt like it

Content: Even beyond the drastic changes to the content on HBO Max (which got rid of a bunch of good shows and movies and HBO originals and replaced them with Dr Pimple Popper), the app itself is so much worse than the HBO Max app, which is completely ridiculous. And not just on iOS, but on Apple TV too. Seeking barely works, discovery is now basically useless unless you want to watch one of the most popular shows, it does a bad job of syncing your progress on an episode across device, etc. WarnerMedia will make it as awful as they can as long as their board and shareholders think it will provide more value to them

Content: HBOMAX never had this issue.  If you pause, rewind, play for a bit, then pause, rewind; it takes you back to first pause location.  Same with FF.  So frustrating to find where you left off if you have a few interruptions (personal) during a viewing. Bouncing around backwards‚Ä¶. Happened with 5 titles over past 2 days.
Title: Rewind/FF after pause is messed up

Content: Please fix the continue watching section of the app. It‚Äôs not retaining any of the show information. When I start a show it won‚Äôt save my spot and I have to remember where I left off. Also, shows that are being watched on other family members are being saved on all ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù sections. Seems like a glitch that needs to be looked at since the old app worked just fine.
Title: Please fix the ‚ÄúContinue watching‚Äù section

Content: I could watch max all day and not get tired of it. I love the movie selection and the some of the best shows and documentaries I‚Äôve seen. The new app is slightly less intuitive than HboMax tho‚Ä¶  Please stop with the pop up notifications‚Ä¶. I cannot think of a single reason why anyone would want to be forced to click out of a pop up to use a streaming app.
Title: Probably the best streaming content out there

Content: The new app is worse in many ways than the app it replaces. It uses a custom video player that is stutters and demonstrably worse than Apple‚Äôs default player, especially on AppleTV. The app itself has crashed several times so far. Also, look at the terrible privacy report card. Next thing you know they will want access to the camera and microphone, too. As for content WBM has really started to ruin HBO. We see far cheaper content and less of a focus on quality. If I didn‚Äôt get this service for free via AT&T there is no way I‚Äôd pay for it as it stands right now.
Title: The new Max app is hot garbage

Content: This app is terrible. Every time I open it the how I am casting changes episodes. When I select episodes they load then the next or previous one plays. I can‚Äôt seem to change my place in the episodes as when I open the casting options it changes. This is fixed in pretty much every other app but no HBO/ Max can‚Äôt figure it out. The app refuses to tack shows I am currently watching so I have to search them each time. I love the shows but they make it impossible to appreciate. I am deeply disappointed with the app and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it to anyone.
Title: A large pile of ‚Ä¶

Content: When auto play is on, the app skips the last minute-ish of the episode. If you want to rewatch an episode, it picks up at that last minute. So I have to rewind the episode and watch twice as many ads.  Also everytime I play a certain show, it starts on the exact same episode, the exact same scene. No matter how many times I play the show, it will always go back to that random episode and start in the middle of it. So every time I want to watch this show I have to go hunt down the actual episode I was on. I hate using this app so much.
Title: Very annoying issues with auto play

Content: I love the app bc of all the shows on it, however since it‚Äôs swapped over to MAX instead of HBO MAX, the only shows that show as last watched are the ones I was watching when the switch over happened. So now every time I was to watch friends or won‚Äôt pick up where I left off and I have to search for the show then go through all the episodes to figure it out.
Title: Issue with last watched

Content: Honestly, the three stars are for the content.  The app is annoying because it allows you to download things, but you still need a good connection to open the app and access it. It should have a default that will take you automatically to downloaded material if the app can‚Äôt open.  It‚Äôs also annoying to navigate, all the categories are random and you have to sort of dig around to find what you‚Äôre looking for.
Title: The app is‚Ä¶fine

Content: Max fka HBO makes great television however it‚Äôs overshadowed by the terrible app. The user interface is less than ideal and I‚Äôm plagued by random bouts descriptive audio that ruin the watching experience. I am unsubscribing and will delete the app until this is hopefully one day resolved.  Update after dev response:  Deleting and re-downloading did nothing for the issue. When streaming directly to the phone there is the option to turn off descriptive audio, but that option magically disappears when casting to an external device.
Title: Awful app

Content: The top thing I do on Max is put on Sesame Street for my toddlers. When I used HBO Max, I‚Äôd be able to pause an episode and restart where we left off. Since switching to Max, the app does not remember where it left off. I have to go to go to the Sesame Street page and scroll from season 1 to season 53 and find the episode we were watching and then press play. It never appears in the continue watching section. It‚Äôs not user friendly. Plus now there is a bunch of non-quality reality show junk that shows up on the main page I have zero interest in.
Title: HBO content is good. Usability is not.

Content: The show I‚Äôve been watching won‚Äôt save to my continue watching now that it‚Äôs Max. The way the show is formatted when you scroll is more difficult too, because you used to scroll down and see all the episodes in the season but now you scroll one by one to the right. It takes a while to find episodes. Finally it always begins at the end and skips right to the next episode, never restarts the episode I want to watch.
Title: Glitches

Content: I think the variety of shows are really good but maneuvering around to find shows on the TV is confusing and difficult. Also skipping the recap is not as easy as Netflix doesnt run quite as smoothly to go to the next episode. Content is good and if I could find things easier I‚Äôd have given in 5 stars. Wish there was a chat feature to get help in getting around the site.
Title: New to Max

Content: There are small inconveniences like the side scrolling through seasons, all movies with the word the listed together, or just general app use. These are small annoyances and honestly going backwards for the user experience which are not great to start with. But then you add on that the functionality of the app is buggy and not just occasionally. Everytime I've started an episode I get a white snow screen within the 1st minute, the casting is now not easy, and the sound is cutting out throughout streaming shows.
Title: Hard to use and malfunctions

Content: To the excellent human reading this,  Well done:  E.) overall sleek / simple design looks good & is easy to use.  D.) Adding single episodes is awesome.  C.) Selections by brand very cool.  B.) Playback & acct sync across devices works quite nicely.   Room for improvement:  3.) Home screen customization would be great (option to remove SPORTS!! from my page / profile; especially not being at the VERY top Please.)  2.) The option to continue searching for show / movie while playing a selection in the background would enhance user experience as well as increase interest & engagement with MAX.   1.) Photos of the cast / crew in selection screen would be great. And search options by cast / crew would be better still.   & A.) Thank you.
Title: Watch & Search

Content: HBO has incredible stuff, no debate there. But the app itself even after the pivot to ‚ÄúMax‚Äù leaves a lot to desire. Simple things like viewing the episode list of a show are simply made less efficient than they need to be. Cast list, user ratings, trailers, are all not available when browsing shows.  The network has a stellar catalogue but it seems like the mobile devs have a poor understanding of the small things that really sell a streaming app.
Title: Great Network, Mediocre UI

Content: You can watch anything and everything on here! If i could only keep one subscription to a streamer it would be this one no doubt. And the app has made a lot of progress from the early HBO Max days. I think there is still some room for improvement in terms of recommendations and usability on the app, but the content for me is key.
Title: The best content!

Content: I have a  large collection of movies and tv shows to watch and with the option of ads or no ads.  You really can‚Äôt go wrong. There‚Äôs an account for everyone in my family and options for everyone to watch what they like. Definitely recommend if it‚Äôs in your budget.ü•≥
Title: Better than any other app

Content: So I believe it is a better updated version of HBO Max but to be honest it I think the HBO should have kept the name how it is and not create a entirely different app as that can just cause unnecessary technical difficulties switching over. Over all I do like the app and it‚Äôs new features, I just think for now on give the app updates instead of changing it entirely
Title: Nathan Montague‚Äôs opinion

Content: The parasitic CEO conglomerates of all these stream wars have just been ruining their platforms as time goes on (*cough* not to mention how they treat the actual industry talent the hungry hungry hippos siphon their riches from *cough*).   I felt blue as I watched what used to be a decent canon of the HBO & Cinemax (HBO Max) catalogues over the years then into a messy, glitchy, and overpriced mess of predominately Warner Discovery reality content curation‚Ä¶  The purple days were fairly solid, but poor Max here feels like a downgrade & if I had not been grandfathered in on the old 6 month contract renewal before the switch occurred I would of cancelled my subscription for sure.
Title: Another One Bites the Dust

Content: Thanks for the unnecessary change to a working app. Also, props on naming it something that makes sure people looking for HBO content, won‚Äôt recognize.  My ‚Äúsmart‚Äù TV won‚Äôt download the update, so now I can‚Äôt watch except on my phone‚Ä¶ so I‚Äôve got that going on too. If it‚Äôs not corrected by month‚Äôs end, I‚Äôll cancel and just watch next season of GoT at a friend‚Äôs. üí∏
Title: Pointless

Content: I was having problems with the HBO app but at least it played what I was trying to watch (not well but it played). I haven‚Äôt been able to watch anything on my ps4 only on my phone and I‚Äôm not paying the amount of money I am just to have it work on one small screen platform. The navigation set up was better with HBO as well. Other than that I haven‚Äôt had some other issues I‚Äôve been reading about. Some minor tweaks may be necessary
Title: Disappointing

Content: The content is fine, and overall seems abojt the same as HBO max but with one annoying flaw- the updated MAX does not keep the continue watching row up to date/correct. Things a series that I have just started does not appear, and even when I search for it it does not pick up where I left off, just completely starts the whole series over. This is the same for every device.
Title: Watch history is not correct

Content: Rather going full in on restoring HBO to its greatness and restore old shows removed from HBO libraries from the 90s which were removed because rich people in New York complained because the old HBO shows made the areas they gentrified look bad they just removed hit HBO shows. Now the management team that ruined HBO before discovery took over have suggested a name change, why? Same woke pandering shows and not fixing what was broke. Bring back HBO but with less woke pandering shows and return the shoes that were removed to pander to the woke crowd  The new update doesn‚Äôt fix much
Title: A name change isn‚Äôt going to fix the problem

Content: What a time we live in - Out of all the streaming apps, HBO has always packed a punch of great movies, shows and series. Always have choices, which is what everyone needs without the hassle of paying extra for this feature or that feature - streaming everything in the highest definition when possible. 4 out of 5!!
Title: HBO on the go?!

Content: HBO‚Äôs app used to be awful, you fixed the issues, and decided to bring the issues back with Max? ‚ÄúContinue Watching‚Äù is not accurate. I have to google episode plots for the title so I can search them to continue where I left off. If I accidentally play something (because sometimes it doesn‚Äôt respond to a clock, and sometimes it‚Äôs a long delay) it‚Äôs in my continue watching forever. I can‚Äôt dislike suggested shows. You removed customizations, sound doesn‚Äôt sync up, crashes, subtitles are in the middle of the screen sometimes?
Title: More glitches, less features??

Content: A lot of the same content with some good additions. My problem is with the app itself. Huge buffering issues that the HBO Max app didn‚Äôt have. Honestly, it‚Äôs like running Peacock or Disney+. One 30-minute episode of a show has had 7 buffering moments lasting between 10 and 30 seconds. I know it has it‚Äôs kinks to work out, as it is only a day in to the new app. I just wish they would have kept their original app and just added the new content and name from there.
Title: Versus HBO Max

Content: They added pip and up next already, glad to see that wasn‚Äôt dropped those are critical features for me.   Dinging the rating a bit though because I feel like discovery and navigation in the app is just a little clunky. I really almost with the brands thing was a little higher up. It just seems hard to navigate if you don‚Äôt know exactly what you are looking for.
Title: Revising from previous review

Content: This app is so unbelievably frustrating. You try to stream and it connects automatically at 100 volume. No matter what phone we try to connect with. And the audio settings are impossible to fix. Their help section says to click the speech bubble to change captions, but nothing happens, no menu pops up. It either streams in Spanish or with audio descriptions off. So many ads. Every time it disconnects, you have to watch the ads all over again. NOT worth the cost. After using the app for years, ill not be renewing my annual subscription this October.
Title: Awful

Content: This is going to seem like a very minute detail in what can really be addressed for what is wrong with Max, but the placement of the episode restart button in the ‚Äúdetails‚Äù of the streaming layout is just unnecessary compared to it just being placed within the individual episode I‚Äôm watching. Besides that, the current horizontal layout compared to the previous scroll one is just annoying.
Title: HBO MAX was superior

Content: I waited to see if devs would fix this issue but it‚Äôs been two weeks so here is the issue. Any time I play something on the app and cast it to my tv, the app will restart the video to the beginning if I open the app again afterwards. It will do this several times during a watch and I have to navigate manually where I left off.   Second, due to the above issue, Max is not remembering what I last watched at all. The content on Max is brilliant, but the bugs make the app unusable.
Title: App restarts show/movie constantly

Content: It‚Äôs just ok‚Ä¶with the additional discovery+ shows.  I should be allowed to add pins to my different even if they‚Äôre adults.  Why won‚Äôt you allow a pin for profile for additional privacy & security in general, not just to create a kids profile?  This is stupid!  This app is shared with adults who want their profiles pinned to prevent nosy housemates from viewing and changing you watchlist by ‚Äúaccidentally‚Äù clicking on your profile!  Will you please provide the user the pin option in general not just for parental control.  Please!!!
Title: Just Ok

Content: One thing that bothers me most is that ads keep popping up when I try to drag the progress bar to resume from when I stopped last time, when the video progress between different devices was not synched. It felt like getting punched for the mistake made by the developers, but as a paid customer, I have no choice but to swallow it.
Title: Ads when scrolling bar

Content: I've seen all the reviews on this and I have to say I've had the same issue. As soon as I downloaded MAX, all of the shows I had been watching on HBO Max disappeared. I love to binge, for example, The Middle and Young Sheldon. Every single time I want to watch these shows, I have to search it up again. It never appears in my continue watching section. This is horrendously annoying. Though I will still continue to watch the shows on this platform, it is something I think should be fixed.
Title: Annoying

Content: You would expect with an entire rebranding launch that the app functionality would remain the same or be enhanced. Unfortunately this is not the case with MAX. Previously you had the option to clear your watch history so if you completed a show and wanted to rewatch again it would show in your continue watching list. Now once a show is watched you have to search for the show and try to remember what episode you watched last every time you go in. Extremely frustrating, this is streaming 101. Please fix!
Title: Same price, more frustration

Content: Today, all of my downloads are gone. Two days ago, all of my daughter‚Äôs downloads were gone. We had to find all of them that are on my phone and redownload them onto hers. Now mine are gone. ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è And now, later tonight, my downloads wouldn‚Äôt open. So m, I thought maybe I‚Äôll sign out and sign back in, maybe that will help. Now I‚Äôm getting an error that I need to restore my purchase, which is active until October 10, 2023. Today is September 27. So I can‚Äôt even sign in now. Update, November 10: same fkng problem! Fix it or I quit paying. üëçüèª
Title: Keeps deleting my downloads

Content: It forced me to download MAX and so far the app is working better than the previous HBO Max app. The previous app kept stopping and dropping movies I was watching and that problem is no longer with the new app. There are still a lot of commercials but then it returns to the movie without incident. My movie watching experience has improved.
Title: It is an improvement

Content: this app is fine overall but every time i begin casting to the tv, Max turns the volume on the tv ALL THE WAY UP TO 100. this is extremely annoying and beyond loud when normally we set the volume on the tv to 20. the old HBO max app did NOT do this. would really like this fixed so that what the volume on the tv is makes the app match that volume and not the tv match the full volume of the casting volume (which is always set to full volume)
Title: problem casting to tv

Content: This app is somehow worse then there old app. The shows are fine but the app interface is so bad. It doesn‚Äôt have a skip to next episode or skip theme song option. It doesn‚Äôt save where I left off on a show rather is stuck on the episode I began watching. I‚Äôll happily change my review if this changes but for paying for this service the app needs to at least work as well as the other streaming options out there. I have higher expectations for HBO than this.
Title: Not as smooth as Netflix

Content: The Apple TV and iPad apps are terrible.  If you want to re-watch an episode it starts at the end of the episode and plays the last few seconds of that episode; you are left scrambling for the pause button and have to manually rewind it.  WHY would you do this, it makes no sense.  Playing downloaded content on the iPad app? good luck! 9 times out of 10 the app crashes and deletes all the content.  As a frequent traveler i can tell you that this has been an issue with HBO for YEARS‚Ä¶.and yes I have wifi turned off to prevent it trying to connect to airplane wifi.
Title: Terrible App

Content: The developers need to fix this. There is just too much clutter out there. Trying to find something right now is a struggle. I don‚Äôt need multiple recommendations for the same show (I.e. Friends in five different places).  Bring back the side navigation and the hubs, tone down the colors.  Not everything needs to be on the landing page. It is a hot mess. It looks like something your interns created and you guys just said, ‚Äúyeah, we can go with this‚Äù.  Separate the reality nonsense from the scripted shows too, it is really confusing. Right now, it is not fun trying to find things to watch anymore, especially with Jared from Subway in my face multiple times.   Another suggestion, please change the layout for TV episodes on Apple TV. The horizontal scroll is garbage. The vertical tiling on the old app was much better and easier to find a favorite episode. Essentially the entire season was visible.
Title: Terrible UI

Content: App is pretty much the same to me. Everyone else says more than just the name and look of the app changed but I guess I never noticed anything else.  My issue is, if you‚Äôre gonna revamp the entire platform, then at the very least, fix the episode order! Shows that had episodes out of order from the beginning STILL haven‚Äôt been fixed. I feel like that‚Äôs the easiest thing to fix and yet has never happened. I shouldn‚Äôt have to be playing a game of ‚Äúwhich one is the actual next episode‚Äù when I watch stuff
Title: At least fix the basic things

Content: Well I pay way to much money for an app to not work at all. I cannot cast anything to my tv with this app! I had no issues with the old app but this one will go to cast and then tells me there is an error and can‚Äôt do it yet I can watch it just fine on my phone and what‚Äôs also killing me is I‚Äôm rewatching friends and the stupid app can‚Äôt remember at all where I‚Äôm at in the show. Like I‚Äôm not paying all this money for this app for it to not work and for it not to do what I want. Fix it or I‚Äôll just get rid of it all together.
Title: About to drop MAX all together & reviews are a lie on it being good

Content: At first I was slightly annoyed because I‚Äôm unable to login into MAX on my tv, as easily as I did on my iPad, and I wasn‚Äôt sure how the conversation would work with paid subscription to HBOMax.  So, I still haven‚Äôt logged on to my tv yet; but I have been able to view the app changes on my ipad, and I like the ‚ÄúDisney‚Äù type, sectional- layout. Well done MAX.
Title: Things Change

Content: Overall app is ok. I didn‚Äôt have many issues others had. But two things were removed: 1) shuffling of episodes 2) in the details of the episode itself when playing an episode but paused the season is removed so instead of saying ‚Äús2, episode 4‚Äù it just says the episode. I don‚Äôt really care about that but just an observation.   I like the discovery plus integration but it doesn‚Äôt contain the entire d+ library. Just a best of
Title: Bring back shuffling of episodes

Content: When I tap on a show that I have previously watched, it opens to the last three seconds of the episode and then switches back to the main menu for the show. I have to then click the three dots and choose ‚Äúrestart‚Äù. Why doesn‚Äôt it know to start the episode from the beginning?
Title: Won‚Äôt replay episodes

Content: Ever since Max debuted we have experienced volume problems.  The is fine for an hour or two of viewing, but after that amount of time it starts to drop and.  Sometimes it stays at such a low level (and turning up the volume makes no difference) that we have to change to another app.  At other times it goes up and down which is more frustrating.  Max is the only streaming app where I have experienced this problem.
Title: Why does the volume drop unexpectedly???

Content: I‚Äôd love more control over my app notification settings. I get all my notifications about new episodes of shows through Apple TV so I don‚Äôt want these from Max but I‚Äôd love it if you could recommend new shows you think I‚Äôd like based on my viewing history. Please let me disable the former and add the latter  The recent ‚ÄúClick here for an adrenaline rush‚Äù notification is not what I had in mind though‚Ä¶ still no controls for this
Title: Notification settings

Content: I‚Äôve never had issues with previous HBO apps but for some reason the Max app does not save where I left off. If I go back into the app and press resume on a tv show or movie it starts from the beginning even if the bar on resume shows I had started it before and watched some already. This is frustrating because then I have to fast forward to where I think I left off before and hope I don‚Äôt spoil anything by going too far. Please fix this issue!
Title: Will not resume where I left off

Content: So I‚Äôm looking for a tv show I saw on tiktok called raised by wolves and it said it was on here, fairly annoyed I can‚Äôt actually check what movies they have from Google but whatever. I bought the subscription (the ad free version because who is paying for ads) looked up my show and boom I‚Äôm watch avatar 2 (the way of the water) so happy ( I‚Äôm not actually super happy but I‚Äôm pretty happy at least for tn)
Title: Looking for raised by wolves story

Content: I find the films on Max/HBOmax are generally poor in production value and the site relies upon a very few finely crafted series... the remainder of the content being obscure and some great but very few ... would save more money renting them directly.  An era of great films and thought provoking series from HBO is over ... anything new is a regurgitation of previous topics in different ways without top billing stats and the subject matter has been done to death and I'm referencing young adult topics shot in many different ways... invest in your product people
Title: Disappointing

Content: please either make HDR content brighter or add an option to turn HDR video off. content is completely unwatchable in any light that can be described as "bright" turning on power saving before starting streaming does disable HDR, but that's a workaround and not a solution, especially considering power saving also lowers the maximum screen brightness.  this is on an iPhone 14 pro, a device renowned for its impressive screen brightness. netflix and other services look much brighter
Title: HDR is WAY too dark.

Content: Since I the app changed over the subscription page tells me to go to my apple subscriptions to cancel but neither HBO max nor Max are showing up in my apple subscriptions.  The apple website has no help nor an email to write to for help.  The Max site has an automated help feature that railroads me into a preset response instructing me to repeat the above motions.  I want to cancel the subscription and their transformation has left enough bugs and problems so as to make it impossible and they have not actual tech help that I can speak to to attempt to resolve the issue.
Title: Cannot cancel

Content: It‚Äôs been pretty decent so far in my opinion. Only a couple stutters or app crashes since I‚Äôve been using it. One thing I really hope they add is an option to customize the subtitles, for instance making the subtitles background invisible instead of black and also being able to change the font as well. Please add this, so many people would appreciate it.
Title: Has potential

Content: Who‚Äôs the marketing genius behind rebranding the streaming platform Max? You have two of the biggest, most successful, and universally identifiable entertainment brands to exploit ‚Äî Warner Brothers and HBO - and ‚ÄúMax‚Äù is what you decide on? Seriously? Was Acme not available? Even the logo is completely uninspired. Coupled with a generic interface, navigating through what feels a like a bucket someone tossed a bunch of distinctly different brands into with no care or thought for how to present them. When you try to be for everyone, you wind up being for no one.
Title: Worst branding, terrible UI.

Content: Why someone would take an app that is working perfectly fine and turn it into a hellscape is beyond me. Regardless of all other complaints, my biggest issue is the fact that when you want to watch a tv show episode that you have seen before and you go to play it, it immediately starts where it left off, which is the end credits‚Ä¶ every single time‚Ä¶.Sometimes when I use this app I think about that quote from Mindy Kaling from the office ‚Äòif i had created a website with this many problems, I‚Äôd kill myself‚Äô.
Title: you ruined your app

Content: this app has the best, most interesting and entertaining shows out of any others. my favorite show right now is definitely The Idol. everyone hates on Abel for being in this show, but again, it is just a show. So please show some respect. They didn't sacrifice their time and money and privacy just for people to hate on it. But I love the show so yeah. HBO>>>
Title: The BEST streaming app!

Content: There is some great shows and movies on Max for sure, but the app is still so buggy to try to use. If you close out of the app, as soon as you go into it it‚Äôll start the movie or show completely from the beginning. If you turn on subtitles, at random points it‚Äôll turn on audio descriptions and the only way to turn that off is to restart the show completely over. It doesn‚Äôt save the progress of the shows you‚Äôre watching, and doesn‚Äôt save spots in movies at all.
Title: Buggy

Content: Great shows, great selection.  God awful streaming quality. Especially on PS5 or TV. Every show consistently buffering, slow to load, and unclear when it does decide to actually stream. Sometimes unwatchable. Been this way for years and absolutely unacceptable. NO other streaming service has these issues and HBO seems to be doing nothing to fix it. Fix your streaming service. Especially how much you charge for your service, there should be no issues. Period. Fix it.
Title: Terrible quality

Content: This app. I swear. It is sooooo terrible, when I connect via AirPlay it changes from English to Spanish and I have to manually change it back. If I use another streamer it comes on at volume 100 every time, it now also has narration to all shows that I cannot turn off despite following everything I can find on turning them off. The app also skips to the next episode before your previous episode is over, so you miss the end of every episode. The ONLY good thing about hbo is the shows they offer, otherwise their app is trash.
Title: Worst streaming app everrrrrr

Content: I‚Äôve always enjoyed HBO/Max now I‚Äôm loving MAX! There‚Äôs so many movies!! So many TV shows that I can watch!!!! It‚Äôs very nice! I am 48 yrs old so I grew up in the old days lol where you had to wait a week or even longer sometimes to watch some shows but now I DONT HAVE TO AND ITS AMAZING!!! And you use to have yo see a movie at the theater BUT NOT ANYMORE!!!! This is amazing & MAX is going above & beyond!!
Title: Have to love all these movies & Shows!!

Content: I never really had problems with the previous hbo max app. Worked overall decently well. The really frustrating thing about this app is while trying to rewatch a tv series (yea, I‚Äôm lame and repeating an old watch) it won‚Äôt include it in my continuing watching section. I guess it thinks because it‚Äôs been watched once my new watches don‚Äôt count? Never had this problem before but it‚Äôs pretty annoying, and disrupts the experience to the point of questioning is this subscription still worth it. Hope it improves, but currently kind of a shame.
Title: The last app was better üôÉ

Content: I am overall excited about the merger of content for max. But this app itself leaves much to be desired. It‚Äôs extremely buggy, crashes frequently, and I am logged out across my various devices on a daily basis. I‚Äôm not sure if this is intentional on their part as a way to prevent account sharing, but it is incredibly annoying and inconvenient, and I don‚Äôt know if I the annoyance is worth my continued subscription. I‚Äôll give it some time but I never experienced the level of issues with the old HBO Max app, so it‚Äôs surprising they released such a regression in user experience.
Title: Feels beta

Content: When they came onto the scene, Warner Bros streaming has always been trying to find what works. Max is the next version of that where they brought in more content, made their name shorter and simpler and it really seems like they are positioning themselves to be one of the streaming services everyone needs to have.
Title: The ugly duckling of streaming services

Content: The company recently switched from their HBOMax app to rebrand and use this new Max app and it‚Äôs awful. When I watch anything on the app, it doesn‚Äôt remember it across the site and therefore doesn‚Äôt save my progress on my other devices. The previews and description of tv show episodes are so tiny they are hard to see with my 20/20 vision. The set up is not optimal to use the app and the changes feel like they were just for the sake of change with the new app and and are harder to use and to see. Not impressed.
Title: Downgrade

Content: This is a great app it really is my only problem with the app is it never saves my place on the show that I watch so everything mine I go onto the app I have to search my show then skip to where I am at! This is really annoying to me because it is an inconvenience and I don‚Äôt want to sound like a Karen but it‚Äôs annoying! But it also has so many movie and show options and it works well most of the time so that is also a plus
Title: Save my place

Content: Ey ! It is possible to have as many series and tv shows as possible in Spanish as well ? I was rewatching Harry Potter saga again, but now the prisoner of Azkaban is only in English. It was in Spanish don't know what happened!, but anyways i would be awesome if we have Spanish options on every as you guys always do ! Thanks and just for your information WE LOVE THE APP üôåüèª
Title: Update

Content: This new app doesn‚Äôt follow any of the standards set by‚Ä¶ well, everyone else‚Ä¶ when it comes to controls, simple scrubbing forward or back isn‚Äôt available, or even asking Siri to turn on subtitles. This app is simply the worst cast of laziness I‚Äôve seen in a long while. It likes to randomly disconnect AirPods while playing (same issue on multiple headphones and on different platforms; eg iPhone Apple TV, etc). The interface is clunky and ugly and slow‚Ä¶ wow, is it slow. Swipe left, wait, Max catches up. It‚Äôs horrible. Please fix.
Title: The new Max is a repeat of first launch: horrible

Content: Not sure why but HBO Max and Max has always had the worst offline functionality. It‚Äôs always been weird about connecting to the internet, and now today it reached a new low when i opened it on my 8 hour flight and all my downloads are missing. They‚Äôre still on the device - if i go to iPad Storage they‚Äôre all listed there - the app just doesn‚Äôt want to show them to me. Fix. This.
Title: Love getting on an 8 hour flight and realizing that all of your downloads are missing

Content: My account was hacked, and I contacted customer service as soon as I realized. Sohail, my customer service representative, was extremely helpful in getting my account back to me. Using the texting feature was also very convenient because I have a newborn baby I am caring for at the moment. Thank you so much, Sohail!
Title: Superb Customer Service

Content: It‚Äôs sad to see what they‚Äôve done to my baby that was HBO Max.   There‚Äôs so much crap to wade through now. The interface is a mess, featuring a ton of things I have zero interest in watching. HBO has been sucky since they cancelled a bunch of shows and removed a bunch of content. I don‚Äôt need to see 20 variations on married couple reality shows. I don‚Äôt need things like shark week made front and center.   HBO Max used to be the app I used most, now Max is something I dread launching. If i wasn‚Äôt getting it for free, I wouldn‚Äôt pay for Max at all. Zaslav doesn‚Äôt deserve your business.
Title: Messy and Bloated - just like Zaslav

Content: look i‚Äôm not gonna put a whole shpeel about the app, i just have 1 complaint. Where‚Äôs the shuffle episodes button? as a person who like background sound while doing other stuff i like to rewatch shows/series with different plots each episode and once I have watched them multiple times I start to get tired of the sequence and the shuffle brings a nice change to the episode lineup. I just miss my shuffle button :(
Title: Shuffle episodes????

Content: Our image resolution is constantly wavering between blurry, more blurry, and crisp ‚Äî being ‚Äúmore blurry‚Äù a majority of the time. (Even when our internet service is strong) We love the shows available on this platform, and we were hoping the transition to ‚ÄúMax‚Äù from ‚ÄúHBO Max‚Äù would fix the issue. However it has only gotten worse and we are questioning resuming our membership. For such an expensive streaming service, the resolution should be reliable. We expect much better.
Title: Poor resolution

Content: I loved HBO Max, but for some reason Max was supposed to be better. On HBO Max there were always timely updates of new movies and shows being brought in that you could find and see the ones that were leaving . On Max I have only seen 1 new movie in the last 3 weeks and several new tv shows. Several movies have left, but I gotta say the quality is leaving if you are replacing movies with tv shows. Maybe it will be different in the next couple of weeks but so far Max is not impressive in terms of new content.
Title: Not an Improvement for new content

Content: Reset the password through the email link, ‚Äúpassword changed successful‚Äù goes to sign in with new password, ‚Äúerror wrong password‚Äù.   This is absolutely frustrating and customer service asked way to many personal questions for very useless responses, I was asked my account details and ip address (do not share that with them), just for responses like redownload the app. Very useless and also creepy company protocol.  Great content but my god please get the fundamentals right and make sure bugs like this get fixed. Did not have this issue in HBO.
Title: Password Reset doesn‚Äôt work

Content: I was excited for the addition of things from discovery+. The app in general needs a lot of work and I miss the layout HBO max had. Occasionally when I‚Äôm using the app on my fire stick it has completely frozen and eventually makes my fire stick totally turn off. I have to unplug my fire stick and plug it back in to get my fire stick to even turn back on. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating when I‚Äôm in the middle of watching something and I‚Äôve refrained from using the app as often as I did when it was still HBO max.
Title: Freezes and shuts down fire stick.

Content: So far 24 hours in and the app is trash. Never had a problem with the HBO Max app playing Dolby Vision and Atmos, but none of the HDR and DV programs are playing as listed. And I had to restart the Apple TV to even get the app to open properly.  You know what they say - if it ain‚Äôt broke don‚Äôt fix it. Title: App not playing proper resolution

Content: Please bring back the shuffle option. It was the best thing you guys ever did. Also, reverting to having episodes all in a line? It was better having episodes in rows so you can see more than 3 at a time. When watching an episode you‚Äôve seen before, the app starts where you left off with no start over option on the video, just rewinding the entire thing. Little things that could go a long way.
Title: Went backward

Content: I honestly don‚Äôt really care for it anymore. I‚Äôm gonna keep it though, but it would be nice to be able to watch the news as it previously was live in Las Vegas and why do I want to watch the news for Los Angeles? I mean really it doesn‚Äôt concern me, but I would like to watch the news like I did before but yeah I‚Äôm so unhappy with it right now.
Title: My review

Content: Don‚Äôt bother if you use a chromecast, it just gets worse and worse. Either 30-40 second pauses constantly, or SAP overplay. Always one or the other, never streams without one of the 2 problems. Takes forever to load (even just on a device). Also has started re-playing episodes rather than going on two the next. Fighting slow speed and blaring commercials, takes forever to figure out what you saw and where you need to be. Also commercials blast volume. Paid for a year in advance‚Äî- grrrr. Have seen little.
Title: So frustrating

Content: Good show options but the app has been giving me so many problems. My shows constantly freeze, it skips back to the beginning of the episode I‚Äôm on instead of going to the next one, it doesn‚Äôt keep track of what episode I‚Äôm on in my shows so every time I go back to a show I have to guess what episode I left off on. I could honestly go on with more problems I‚Äôve encountered I‚Äôm not pleased to be paying a monthly subscription for an app that barely works.
Title: Good show options

Content: I like the app a lot but why get rid of some of the Cartoon Network shows I love the CN shows and my kids do as well but why only a few shows why isn‚Äôt there cow and chicken, two stupid dogs and Johnny bravo? all the good old show not there. Paramount plus has all the nickelodeon shows. I was hoping Max has all Cartoon Network shows.
Title: Needs more CN shows

Content: HBO max wasn‚Äôt the best app but it had an amazing catalog that outshone everyone else. Now, after the discovery merger the app has gotten slightly worse (more clicks/scrolling, less intuitive, and glitchy on console specifically) but the catalog has dropped off a cliff. Max‚Äôs main spending cut was in its catalog and it shows- it now has an incredible amount of bloat and the recommended has turned into popcorn flicks rather than the dramas I feel like HBO is known for.
Title: It was good while it lasted‚Ä¶

Content: Great app.  Miss being able to fully customize the profile pics. Bring that back!  When watching an episode of downloaded content, you can‚Äôt just play next. It takes you back to the download screen and you have to navigate to the next episode. Recommend adding a play next button‚Ä¶and a play next and delete button.
Title: Downloaded content options, profile options

Content: Every time I finish an episode, the next episode I have to manually play (even thought I have auto-play on), the audio description feature is on and it narrates everything going on. This feature is for blind people so they understand what‚Äôs happening. I am not blind. The app is not giving me a choice to turn it off when I look at my options under ‚ÄúAudio.‚Äù And I‚Äôve looked, like I said, I‚Äôm not blind. Every time this happens I have to completely delete the app and redownload it. This is becoming ridiculous.
Title: Audio description won‚Äôt turn off

Content: My account migrated to Max but I lost all my profiles and apparently created a ghost account without an email address. This is problematic since I cannot access the max account from a pc or any device that isn‚Äôt my main iOS account.  It took a while to get it resolved via support and I was informed my yearly subscription would be not be honored - still waiting for details on how that will work.  Overall, I don‚Äôt appreciate having to jump through all these roadblocks.
Title: Migration to Max is questionable

Content: I‚Äôm already subscribed to Max and it‚Äôs not allowing me to use the app because it says I need to renew my subscription. Please fix it soon this is a huge error.  Edit: I found the workaround if you cancel your subscription, and then enter the app it recognizes the subscription, and then re-subscribe everything works perfectly.
Title: Not working

Content: Quality is present but the app when casting content is extremely lack luster and missing key features you would expect from basic streaming services.  No option to skip intros No option to skip recaps No option to choose next episodes easily
Title: Lacking key features

Content: June 13, 2023. Scroll through the 5-star reviews for this app and you will see how obviously fake they are. It‚Äôs one word reviews posted by nonsensical user names. We can only assume that Max/Warner Bros Discovery is behind this?? Wow. Reprehensible.  And since my original review magically disappeared‚Ä¶ I‚Äôll state again the biggest issues with this app are the terrible playback controls (give us the Apple built in functionality!), you can‚Äôt use the scroll wheel to scrub through the timeline, lack of SharePlay, Picture in Picture, non standard closed captioning support.
Title: Mostly FAKE reviews!

Content: This is the glitchiest streaming app I have ever used. When I use it to stream on my Chromecast, it pauses/buffers about every 3 minutes and lasts about 30 seconds. I can (and do) immediately switch to a different streaming app and have no issues. It‚Äôs the same with the Firestick. I‚Äôve read that it helps to have a wired connection but I don‚Äôt have to do that with any other app. I have access for free through my cellular service otherwise I would cancel it. Good selection though.
Title: Good selection, terribly glitchy

Content: So my mom got a promotion from buying cricket phones Not the entire company and that promotion gave us HBO max for free and I using it so I can watch villainess because that‚Äôs all I really got it for also when I did it, it worked when I made my login, it actually worked so 2 Gordon stars  sense I was going to give it three stars

Title: Awesome

Title: Plagued with problems

Content: HBO changed to MAX in order to screw over all the syndication actors and writers. They were able to get out of their contracts by changing the name.   More importantly asva result of that, you can no longer use your MAX sub outside the US. With people more nomadic than ever, this is a psychotic action. Cancel immediately and stick with Netflix, they're better anyway.  Been an HBO subscriber for 15 years, ever since I first had the money to do so. At some point customers have to push back on these disgusting degenerates that run the companies. Cancel HBO immediately, be part of the movement.
Title: CANCEL YOUR SUB NOW

Title: What

I feel like I‚Äôm im at a Cheesecake Factory flipping through their 20 page menu - overwhelmed & sticking to what i know.  Also the blue aesthetic is just not It, i miss the purple.
Title: Difficulty Navigating

Content: ‚Äúhey let‚Äôs change our name from one of the most recognizable brands in the entire media industry, to just being ‚ÄòMAX‚Äô which will require a conversation to introduce context, and prompt people to still call us HBO because the name change is f(censored) moronic. not only that, but our SEO will be ruined and literally everyone will hate it and call us idiots.‚Äù   ‚Äúoh my, that idea sounds FANTASTIC. while we‚Äôre at it, how about we‚Äîinstead of just updating our existing app‚Äîcreate a whole brand new app that is buggy, and won‚Äôt allow 70% of our users to log into.‚Äù     ‚ÄúFANTASTIC work, gentlemen, you‚Äôre both promoted!‚Äù  i plan on cancelling my subscription at the end of this month, no need to pay money to a company that cancels beloved shows and removes them from the app entirely, and uses their profits to implement the stupidest changes i have perhaps ever seen a company attempt. cheers.
Title: Absolutely STUPID Business Decision

Content: Are you sure you guys went to college? I don‚Äôt understand the marketing thought behind changing the HBO streaming app from HBO Max to just Max. You realize that when I want to use the search bar on my phone to open the HBO app, I can no longer type in ‚ÄúHBO‚Äù‚Ä¶. You know, like the name of the service I am paying for. it may seem little, but it‚Äôs pretty stupid on your part to remove the name of the company from the app. I bet this was some GenZ marketing execs that spent more time with social activism than actually learning marketing while in college.
Title: I don‚Äôt understand

Content: Great app so far, yet it keeps deleting the show under ‚ÄúContinue watching.‚Äù I have to go back and search for the series and find the episode versus picking up where it left off. Additionally, close captions keep disappearing, needs to be updated soon please (I have hard of hearing family members)
Title: Need a few Fixes

Content: This company is just poor.  They ruined both discovery plus and HBO Max to create this abomination.  They sucker people in with their prior programming then lock them into a auto renew year long contract.  The menu is a mess, they‚Äôve cut so many shows it‚Äôs insane.  We never watch this yet we‚Äôre stuck in a no early termination contract. Stay far away from this garbage, you get better content on free apps like freevee and  Tubi. You‚Äôve been warned..
Title: When tow good companies join and ruin themselves in the process over greed

Content: I can‚Äôt speak for the mobile app, I don‚Äôt watch shows on my phone, but the Roku app is awful. If you pause your show, prepare for it to go back several minutes when you push play. It‚Äôll have a white mark showing where you were, but you have to fast forward to get there. If you leave the show and go back in, it completely starts over from the beginning. It doesn‚Äôt register where you were at all. Never had any issues with HBO Max so I don‚Äôt understand why this new app is so much worse.
Title: Roku Max is awful

Content: This may be unfair as I don‚Äôt know where I can review the MAX app on Roku but it has a major glitch that has been all over the internet for weeks yet no fix. If you pause a show and hit play it either completely restarts or rewinds back a good 30 plus minutes. Hitting the quick review or rewind :30 button works as a workaround but who remembers to do that most of the time? Please fix!
Title: Maybe unfair but Roku app has a glitch

Content: Casting to any device is shotty at best, can‚Äôt pause or control the volume with it so every time a new episode starts it automatically sets my volume to 100. Even the downloads arnt really downloads, you still need Wi-Fi or some kind of internet access to watch them, I thought the whole point was to watch without data especially when your on a 7 hour plane ride with no Wi-Fi. It has some great shows and movies but the customer experience is very sub par.
Title: Needs ALOT of work

Content: It would be really nice if we as users could filter our home page more. I personally do not want to see the horror movies and would like to be able to filter my homepage to where it only shows suggestions for the genres I enjoy. Also, please add an ignore/don‚Äôt show again/hide option under the add to list, so we don‚Äôt have to keep looking at shows/movies we don‚Äôt want to see.
Title: Please give users more filters

Content: I pay the monthly plan for no ads. After HBO went from HBO to max, I noticed at the start of shows before the intro, max has snuck in ads‚Ä¶on my ad free plan.   Called customer service and he said it was ads when at the bottom of my screen I have an option to ‚Äúskip ad‚Äù.   Bottom line, I pay for ad free, but Max isn‚Äôt going to honor their end of the deal, so I will be going elsewhere for my streaming.
Title: Ad free plan but I max still sneaks in ads

Content: Every time i want to restart an episode of a show, it doesn‚Äôt actually restart it and it immediately goes it to the next episode. I thought when the line on the bottom of a show is full and you click on it it would restart the episode but it just goes to the last few seconds of an episode and goes to the next one it‚Äôs really annoying
Title: Restarting an Episode

Content: We run most of our streaming services through our iPhones to the Chomecasts on our TVs. Other apps perform seamlessly but the Max app is just horrible. When you try to pause or back up the app you‚Äôll find the app has lost connection. Then you have to start the stream over and find your place. That‚Äôs the second big problem. The Max app doesn‚Äôt remember where you left off. It will pick up on the previous episode or jump ahead to the next. Fail.
Title: Pretty terrible app

Content: I am constantly getting ‚Äúsomething went wrong error‚Äù while watching a series. I killed app, uninstalled and reinstalled issue still persists, no matter how many ways I tried issue didn‚Äôt fix. This is really frustrating, I am sure this would be my last month with this app, oh I also found another bug, when you pause a video and after unlock the app using facial recognition video rotates on its own until you pick up the device and tilt it to rotate again to its original position.
Title: Worst experience of Streaming App

Content: I don‚Äôt mind switching over apps, but the fact that this is the third time there has been a change over does not make sense to me. I would be happier about it if the SharePlay option did not completely disappear. My boyfriend and I are currently long distance, and being able to watch a movie or our favorite TV shows is a nice way to do something together. I wonder if it will be added back :/
Title: Where‚Äôs SharePlay??

Content: Thank you WBD for cleaning up the app. I love that you separated the HBO content for ease of access but also left it accessible in the other areas. The categories are now more subtly placed across the top and they simplified the main menu by a lot. Although the price hike is rough, I hope it comes with more content and continued success in the movie roster!
Title: Looks great!

Content: Was excited to explore the new interface. Logged into my xfinity box, started a movie, it crashed the system and went to blue screen within 10 minutes. Had to full restart. Will update review if product improves. First attempt pretty lousy thus far.
Title: Crashed almost immediately on xfinity box

Content: its actually so good i love it, its worth paying for they have so much more things than like starz and stuff, tho they dont really have like subtitles in other languages on SOME , others do im sure of it, and if u ever have to rewind past a add , it doesnt make you watch the add again, its like it knows that you already watched the add so its good.
Title: max

Content: So I go an download the app right and when it boots up it‚Äôs logged into some random account. So then I had to login to my actual account. That is not a smooth transfer. I only have one HBO account so it should have pulled up correctly but it did not. I don‚Äôt even know what account that was it didn‚Äôt show me and information on the account. The account I was logged into on HBO app was the one I had to enter MANUALLY into ‚ÄúMax‚Äù üôÑ. It‚Äôs giving ghetto already.
Title: Max??????

Content: Maybe someone already reported this but if not, BEWARE of unlocking your phone after you‚Äôve already started your movie or show in Max. We love this app and the content, BUT we will start a movie or show and continue about our movie night. When we open our phone to do anything else, our show/movie will restart. This is so annoying. I can re-rate and give more stars once this is fixed. We have iPhone 14s and the app is updated on our phones.
Title: PLEASE FIX‚Ä¶

Content: The app is pretty good. Sometimes a series or movie will be in the wrong genre. What would be great if we had the capability to name the devices that are using the app. The device names are basic like Xbox or Roku. When one of my Xboxes broke I had to sign all of them out. Then sign back in the other Xboxes. It would definitely save time with being able to name devices.
Title: Name Devices

Content: Up until 2 days ago, this app had been the most reliable for downloading shows and steaming later. But yesterday, all my Vampire Diaries episodes disappeared (I had just downloaded them last week). Now, I can‚Äôt even access the episode list to re-download them. This is the only show that seems to be affected, so that‚Äôs why I gave 2 stars. But it‚Äôs the show I‚Äôm most interested in watching right now and I‚Äôd like this problem to get fixed ASAP.
Title: Deleted my downloads

Content: I got Max because it housed some of my favorite shows, movies, and even pretty decent originals. For awhile, I had no complaints but as of the past few weeks, the audio has not been in sync more often then it is. I‚Äôve powered off my device and even tried reinstalling the app which only serve to fix the issue temporarily. All in all, I hope the app itself improves so I can use this service to its fullest.
Title: Great catalog, terrible app

Content: I thought the old HBO app was a bit wonky but it got the job done the majority of the time. This new MAX version is unusable. I tried choosing a particular episode only to have the wrong one start playing repeatedly. Once I figured out a way around that issue this app could not find my chromecast even though every other streaming app I have was able to. Seems like they should quit worrying about the name of the platform and focus on delivering a smooth app that‚Äôs easily streamable. At least Netflix has that going for them.
Title: It got worse

Content: I love Max but I can't watch anything on here. I can only watch it on my TV.  I  miss HBO Max I can‚Äôt watch. scooby-doo on here only on my TV!! I want you guys to fix it but.  My parents can for I can watch stuff on Max. So I really really really love Max I just don‚Äôt know if I do but for. When I can watch I love it thank you for reading bye!
Title: The way I feel about this.

Content: I love the app and everything brings but it‚Äôs been two days and it‚Äôs still won‚Äôt work. I have tried everything deleting and reinstalling it signing out and restarting my electronic, and still nothing shows up. I even checked my internet speed and this problem is currently on all of my electronics. My iPhone, Xbox, IPad and my PS4 and still no luck. Please fix this quick I never had this issue with HBO MAX.
Title: App not working

Content: Very disappointed with this new app.  Did not automatically update my current HBO Max app.  Actually, it would not even allow the HBO max app to load.  It just crashed.  Could not find it in the App Store, until I searched for Max.  Once I installed it, it acted like I was a new customer.  Took me a while to restore my account.   Finally, when I opened the app there are all sorts of shows that are not HBO movies or shows.  Shows that look dumb are intermingled which look like reality shows.  I just want entertaining movies and tv.  Not reality shows.
Title: Why the name change

Content: Are we, the viewers, consuming so much media that we lose interest?   Are we desensitized to the spectacle of high budget productions?  Is there a media fatigue that has set in for the average consumer?  Has large media producers prioritized activist audiences or niche audiences over broader audiences?  Has entertainment become  a way for producers to promote an agenda or indoctrinate their audiences?  Is quantity prioritized over quality?
Title: What are we doing here?

Content: I have the app on my Samsung TV and it will go to the next episode before the current ends. It never saves my last view so I have to remember what was the last episode I watch and in what minute I left it. Trying to cast from my iPhone is imposible. Every time I open the app while casting it will restart the episode and play ads. If I scroll to any part of the episode it will restart it instead of taking me to the location I commanded. Impressive that this company as big as it is can‚Äôt produce a fair quality app.
Title: Buggy app

Content: Stop asking me to sign in almost every other time that I click on your app. HBO max was just changed to max, so why should I have to login every single time. The credentials have not changed nothing else is changed stop asking me. This is frustrating. The previous app wasn‚Äôt great and neither is this one.
Title: Dear Max

Content: Every episode / show I have to go in and click to turn on subtitles. There‚Äôs a note saying you can change this in settings, but there‚Äôs no actual option there? Along with this there‚Äôs no ‚Äúplay next episode‚Äù button most episodes so it needs up glitching and replaying the episode. It doesn‚Äôt save when it pauses mid episode so it restarts and I have to skim to the part I left at. Has great potential but feels rushed. Hoping new releases fix these issues
Title: Missing Features

Content: I‚Äôm loving the new app, particularly the access to more content. Just in a couple days of using the app I‚Äôve found old shows that I‚Äôve wanted to rewatch but couldn‚Äôt. Not sure what the issue was around people having problems with the app but I‚Äôve had not problems with using it.
Title: More Content

Content: I‚Äôve noticed this version of the app does not keep track of most of my shows progress. It‚Äôs very frustrating having to search for the show I want (even though I added it to my list, still doesn‚Äôt show up) and then proceed to find where I was in that show. It‚Äôs specifically annoying with South Park since I‚Äôm on season 17 and there are a ton to choose from.  I feel like it‚Äôs not asking much to just have my shows progress tracked like the old app. Hate all the rebranding nonsense ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Title: Doesn‚Äôt save my shows progress

Content: The new max app has issues. Using on Sony A80J 77 Inch TV: BRAVIA XR OLED 4K Ultra HD Smart Google TV. Audio goes out of sync with video constantly by several seconds. Support hasn‚Äôt been much help. I‚Äôve gotten disconnected from chat several times, and tired of doing the same reset your tv steps, and ‚Äúis it only this 1 show‚Äù every time. Build in more telemetry into the app so you know it‚Äôs happening , with better ability to support. I‚Äôm hoping it‚Äôs just issues with the new app that are going to be resolved soon. If not I guess I‚Äôll cancel my subscription.
Title: New max app has issues

Content: It‚Äôs already ridiculous that this company had one rebrand not too long ago. That said, with the seamless transition of the HBO Go/Now apps into one, many considered it a success. Of course, these people just can‚Äôt help themselves and have decided they need a second rebrand in one decade.   This new Max switch was a complete dud in comparison. Not only is the name dumb, removing the most iconic part of it (HBO), it requires you to download a completely separate app. We‚Äôll see how it holds up in actual functionality, but so far two big thumbs down.
Title: Not as seamless as the Go/Now switch

Content: I honestly love HBO max, it‚Äôs a fair price, no ads, you don‚Äôt have to worry about limiting the number of screens you have running, it never clicks out, so it‚Äôll play all day long without having to touch anything or click ‚Äúare you still watching‚Äù unlike most other apps. And the wide variety of content is awesome!
Title: Love it

Content: All I have to say is thank you, I finally can watch what I want, when I want, and return to favorites and know they‚Äôre still there ready to be watched again. Also I‚Äôm a big sports fan and I‚Äôm excited to see games being broadcast here as well. I‚Äôm really enjoying MAX and I think you will to.
Title: No b to the S I love MAX

Content: I want to start off by saying that I LOVE HBO Max! But ever since the transition from HBO Max to Max I could not for the Life of me log-in to my account. I‚Äôve tried resetting the password, uninstalling and reinstalling, updating, tried with different devices, and even texted the customer service number only to be told that I just have to ‚Äútry again at a later time.‚Äù I can‚Äôt even pause my account because I cannot log in. So I‚Äôm hoping the developers can fix this problem ASAP because I really don‚Äôt want to cancel my subscription.
Title: Log-in malfunction??

Content: extremely buggy. I loved hbo max and would reccomend to everyone. not even 24 hours in and it has deleted ALL my watch history making finding an episode i was on a nightmare. and i thought maybe it would come back but no, it deletes any evidence that i even watched the episodes as soon as i close the app. the new Ui is horrible and you removed your best features. Clearly idiots run this company and i will be cancelling until further notice. if i could leave no stars i would
Title: did you even test your own app before launch?
