Checked to see if the audio was up and when I saw the description it apparently is but when I watch it the show only has English audio. I‚Äôd greatly appreciate if there was taken a look into such problem, oh and fyi the show is Mike and Molly.
Title: Need Audio Added

Content: The brightness is really bad on here- it‚Äôs super dark I can‚Äôt even see what I‚Äôm watching. the darkness is as if when you click on the screen to show the play button and it dims the screen. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs just a glitch but it‚Äôs really bad. Also not a fan of the blue color I miss the purple of HBOMax. And I hate that it‚Äôs called ‚Äúmax‚Äù. I‚Äôve never left a review for an app before so this is kinda disappointing. However the movie selection is great though. Hopefully the darkness will get fixed
Title: Miss the colors of HBOMax

Content: That‚Äôs the message I receive as soon as I sign in to this new replacement for HBO Max. Please try again, you say? No thanks. I‚Äôll go back to my HBO Max app which DOES work.   It amazes me that in 2023 software producers still do not know how to test apps‚Ä¶or don‚Äôt care to. at least it‚Äôs consistent. It fails on Apple TV and my iPhone. so congrats on that.  This app is useless. HBO or whoever spent weeks hyping this app called Max. And it just doesn‚Äôt work. What a joke. My only question is how did this become a Apple ‚Äúeditors pick‚Äù if it doesn‚Äôt even work??
Title: ‚ÄúAn error occurred. Please try again‚Äù

Content: still don‚Äôt understand the rebranding to just max, kind of lame tbh like max is what you name a dog so idk why they changed it to that. i pay every month just for movies/shows to not play at all or i get logged out of my account randomly for no given reason. has a lot of my favorites tho so i gotta give them that, it‚Äôs the only reason i still subscribe.
Title: She‚Äôs cool

Content: in an attempt to expand their scope, HBO is now trying to bring sports and news into the app, which means more things to wade through with it's "time for some HBO".   in its current version, it also restarts your content from the beginning every time you open the app to go pause or adjust volume when casting to the TV, which is really disruptive. really hoping they fix that soon.
Title: info overload and buggy

Content: This is the best streaming app out there. Content is always current. Great selections old and new.  I would like to see more of the older HBO series available (Dream On being one). I have no complaints and have had no problems every since it was launched as HBO GO. Keep up the great work!!
Title: Not Sure why HBO changed the name to Max

Content: Love max a lot cause it‚Äôs got quite a bit of my favorites on it and it‚Äôs not too confusing to use and it‚Äôs recommended stuff is pretty spot on with the stuff I watch normally. And I also loveee the vampire diaries and pretty little liars and this is where both of them ended up lol definitely recommend 10/10
Title: Awesome!

Content: If there is a series I have already seen, when I go to rewatch it and pick and episode it skips the episode I picked and takes me to the next one.   In my ‚Äúwatching‚Äù section if I want to go to episode instead of watching where I am I have to search the series instead of being able to click right there.
Title: A couple changes.

Content: For a such a beloved and game-changing network like HBO, the user experience for ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù is sub-par. It‚Äôs actually pretty terrible and embarrassing. 75% of the time I‚Äôm reloading the app because it doesn‚Äôt load properly. One ongoing issue is that I would click on a show like Hard Knocks or Telemarketers and the screen would be black. Nothing to click or do on it. I‚Äôd have to reload and attempt it again, and still issues. This has been going on for weeks.
Title: Terrible user experience

Content: Gotta say, as a giant movie buff hbo or max or whatever you wanna call it has gotta say the best movie catalogue I‚Äôve seen on streaming service. Title: Best streaming service for big movie buffs

Content: I have a Max subscription through Xfinity and the newer updates made the iOS app unusable.  When I select Xfinity through the provider section, I am directed to an Xfinity home page where I am logged out.   If it would just use Safari to authenticate like it used to I would already be logged in, but it directs me through some built in Max web browser.   After I log in, the Max app browser does not reroute me back to the app to authenticate. It keeps me on the Xfinity homepage. If I then click cancel to close the browser, I still have not authenticated in the app. If I hit back on the Max app brier to try and re-load the authentication page, it successfully authenticates me now that I‚Äôve logged in but TRIES TO STREAM MAX THROUGH THEIR CRAP IN-APP BROWSER RATHER THAN AUTHENTICATING MY LOGIN TO WATCH THROUGH THE APP!!! Wildly infuriating. Please test and fix this bug.
Title: Newest Update Makes App Unusable

Content: I had to restart the app 3-4 times yesterday just to get one episode to load properly. Shows either start with no sound or no visual playing, and the app will freeze my TV as I try to exit/restart. It also starts me on the wrong episode instead of playing the newest one like other streaming apps. I wish my show was just on Netflix so I could be done with this app. It got worse after it became MAX
Title: Poor functionality, non-user-friendly interface

Content: Since I downloaded MAX I‚Äôve had issues only on my tv. I am trying to watch ANJLT or for example Avatar and the screen size will either be distorted or it crashes and shows a snowy screen. If I want to continue watching anything I have to use my iPad or phone. I‚Äôd love to watch from my tv more than my other devices but I can‚Äôt. I pay way too much for this service. I‚Äôve tried troubleshooting like uninstalling the app and turning off the modem or wifi. Nothing fixes it. I am ready to cancel if things don‚Äôt get fixed soon.
Title: Crap

Content: Honestly, it‚Äôs cool that they added everything they own under one app but the app on my roku and my phone are terrible. It don‚Äôt remove things I have finished watching and if i started watching. The app refuses to put in my co tinue watching list and the episodes i did watch it doesn‚Äôt register them as watched. Please i hope they fix this issue which is utterly annoying.  Update: now it logged me out and won‚Äôt let me log back in. So I changed it to 2 to 1 star. What is even going on? Fix this issue.
Title: Nothing is working correctly

Content: Overall not a bad experience, good shows but for some reason MAX does not want to keep my shows in continue watching. I have been watching the big bang theory and every time I go back to watch it is no where to be found in continue watching (which is the most convenient.) I have to go search it up, which when i‚Äôm on my ROKU is just a PITA. I don‚Äôt know if this is something that can be fixed but it does tend to be pretty annoying.
Title: Continue Watching Issues

Content: Really? You got rid of the BEST feature I have ever seen on a streaming service? The thing I used every time I watched one of my comfort shows? The shuffle button was what put HBO above any other streaming service. I was telling everyone that it was what every app needed. On shows I‚Äôve watched a million times in my life, I‚Äôd play the game of ‚Äúcan I guess the episode before the theme song.‚Äù Please bring it back. I‚Äôll change my one star to a five because I really do like Max. But taking away a great feature just isn‚Äôt it.
Title: No shuffle button?

Content: You have great options, but your signal outreach can be pretty awful. Takes a long time to get going when you‚Äôre first pulling up the app and often have trouble keeping signal during shows/movies. Everything else is fabulous. You‚Äôre also a constant provider of all things Harry Potter which is major.
Title: Almost top notch

Content: HBO seems he‚Äôll bent on cramming low grade content down my throat. All we want is a one stop shop for quality programming (the HBO we pay for) instead we get a firehouse of trash and god help you if you want to recreate the HBO Go experience.  Worse still it does not integrate with Apple‚Äôs up-next as all the previous versions did and of course it has also deleted my viewing history.    I‚Äôm probably just going to let my subscription lapse and go to Apple TV+ which has better programming anyway now that succession and Berry are both done.
Title: This app is hot garbage

Content: I came here for multiple shows for example infinity train. And I got into summer camp island. But almost all the shows I came to enjoy are gone now. Please bring them back. Also how dare you guys remove custom icons, it was one of the best things you had. I just realized you just removed dexters lab. This is going too far. My 1# use of this streaming service was to look at old cartoons that I haven‚Äôt seen much of. And now the it has almost no purpose for me.
Title: Removed all the shows I came for

Content: I've barely even used the app, and I've still had so many issues. It drains my battery even when my phone is plugged in, so it uses battery faster than my phone can charge. You can't double tap to fast forward/rewind. If I swipe down from the top of the screen, the video orientation flips upside down, and won't go back to normal unless I flip the entire phone that way and then back. It's a mess, objectively worse than HBO Max, and a company with this much money has no excuse releasing something so sloppy.
Title: Horrible functionality

Content: Bring back HBO!!!! Enough dumbing down your core user base ‚Äî shoving Discovery garbage content from other platforms and studios in our faces via the Home Screen will not get us to consume it over HBO original elite programming, which deserves its own platform unsullied by low brow drivel.   The world rejects your shortsighted rebranding campaign.   Oh and to add insult to injury, the app is glitchy. Amongst other things already covered by countless previous reviews, my watch history isn't synced across different devices.
Title: I do not want to see Dr. Pimple Popper or Friends on the app I use for high quality HBO CONTENT.

Content: Please hurry and fix your login via AT&T when a user attempts to login from an Apple iPad (latest model and latest Apple and App update installed).  What‚Äôs the point for me to have this included as part of my AT&T Plan when you have an issue allowing users in and I can‚Äôt even use it? Very frustrating and I have changed different networks since it says that it‚Äôs a network issue to prove it‚Äôs not.  Once this updated I‚Äôll update my star rating as I can‚Äôt use it at all so that‚Äôs a 1 star in my book.
Title: FIX YOUR LOGIN VIA AT&T

Content: Bring back the shuffle button!! Content is great(thrilled about the addition of How It‚Äôs Made), 4K works very well on my shield/TV, only thing that would make it perfect is bringing back the shuffle button! Shows like South Park, How It‚Äôs Made, and others with large episode numbers would be so much better with a shuffle button like HBOMax had.
Title: Just missing one thing‚Ä¶

Content: This app has many bugs that need to be fixed.  First off, the app doesn‚Äôt know where I‚Äôve left off on the shows I watch. I could be in season 6 and it‚Äôs trying to start me back in an earlier season which is frustrating.  Second, whenever I cast my shows and leave the app, it glitches and restarts my whole episode after it plays an ad. Incredibly frustrating.  I‚Äôm really debating if this app is even worth it anymore. Why create an entirely new app when it‚Äôs just as bad as your last one?
Title: App glitches

Content: The app is alright but there‚Äôs an issue with pausing shows that makes the user experience a little bit annoying. I noticed that whenever I pause a show & leave it paused for a bit, when I press play it takes the show to the end. Which means I‚Äôd have to rewind it back to where I had initially paused it. Idk if this is a bug but please fix it! I didn‚Äôt have this issue with the HBO Max app.
Title: Annoying Bug

Content: I have all my DC movies & animated movies in one place!  I can down load them to watch later when I‚Äôm out of signal, which is amazing when the weather blows out  everything I still have it on my phone.  Has a ton of other great movies and shows well worth the subscription
Title: All my DC in One place

Content: Yes I know this is for the iOS and iPadOS, but‚Ä¶ There doesn‚Äôt seem to be a way to write a review for the MAX Apple TV App, so here‚Äôs my beef.  The current version of MAX has some bugs that need to be addressed. Watching a series on TV, the normal behavior isn‚Äôt there. For instance; watching The Last of Us (or anything else), when the episode is near the end, it should allow one to watch the next episode without issue. But it doesn‚Äôt. Content: 1) I don‚Äôt want cheap, reality t.v productions mixed into prestige shows. The whole app just seems tacky and cheap now.  2) The UI is a mess. I could easily find new releases on HBO Max. Now I cannot.  3) More content but nearly all trash. HBO was a vanguard in the premium tv space. New leadership has decimated that reputation for short term gains.   Bottom line, HBO Max is too expensive and too poorly designed compared to competitors. We all have streaming subscription fatigue, and I am cutting this one out first.

This is still happening everyday! I try to watch shows but still buffers and play for a minute, then buffers and play, then buffers and play. I would let it play for over an hour thinking it would play smoothly, but does not improve and keeps buffering and play, buffering then play.  Please fix this issue.

Content: The rebrand was a bad move!  Interface, design, color, font - everything is a DOWNGRADE! I don‚Äôt even want to use this cluttered, obnoxious mess of an app anymore!  I‚Äôve been a subscriber since HBO Now days‚Ä¶

It took a few weeks or months to fix. This is not a great start.

But here you go even after Zaslav‚Äôs promise, that it would be a better experience, it actually comes out even worse! What a piece of garbage and we‚Äôre expected actually to pay MORE for this? Let‚Äôs talk about all the features that are missing from this.  No integration with Apple TV and its Up Next feature No native video player No Picture in Picture Frame rate issues Dynamic range issues Can‚Äôt scrub a video worth a crap with Siri Remote   Since my current subscription ends next month, I will probably go for a month and when there‚Äôs something worth watching, probably when the second season of the Last of Us premieres. This isn‚Äôt worth it.
Title: Didn‚Äôt think it possible to screw this up even more‚Ä¶

Content: As stated, there are several features that used to function perfectly fine in the former ‚ÄúHBO Max‚Äù app. The two features I‚Äôm talking about in particular are:  - Match Content (Dynamic Range/Frame Rate) - Apple TV app synchronization   Match Content is an important feature that allows the Apple TV to change the dynamic range (SDR/HDR/HDR10+/Dolby Vision) and frame rate (generally 24fps for movies and tv shows). Many people want the content to display in its proper dynamic range and frame rate.  Apple TV app integration allows you to view shows and movies that you‚Äôre watching in the ‚ÄúUp Next‚Äù section and continue watching them which would open the Max app and take you to the video.   Overall, while I like that there‚Äôs more UHD content in Max than there was with HBO Max, the app itself is a major downgrade.
Title: Many Apple TV app features are missing

Content: The app is much better but it still struggles to play downloaded shows. Also, navigating between different shows and episodes within a particular show is nowhere as easy at Netflix.

Content: HBO Max was near perfect for a fan of both HBO and DC animation. Gone are searching by ready made categories or any coherent sorting.   What we now have is what every fan wants: My 600 Pound Life right next to House of Dragon right next to 90 Day Fianc√© right next to Superman: Under the Red Son right next to Sisterwives. No more will you have that awful experience of having all DC animation. Nope. Now all Adult Animation are shoved together. Except that they aren‚Äôt. Some are moved into action. Some into comedy. How will you know?   That‚Äôs a mystery you will need to call Zaslov about. Thanks John Stankey for negotiating the worst merger in entertainment history.

Title: Fix the player on Apple TV!!!!!!

Content: Max keeps trying to replace the native Apple playback options with their own. It didn‚Äôt work before and it‚Äôs just as bad now.   On the Apple TV, for example, you can press the play/pause button to stop playback. The same button will not resume playback. Why??  You have to tap the main button.   Play the next episode from the watch screen and it goes to the right episode, but if you‚Äôve seen it before, it resumes it even if there is less than two minutes left. Why?  Maybe I‚Äôm watching it again?    Any option to start from the beginning? Nope. Have you scrub all the way back to the start.   Since there is zero value added by replacing the player, let‚Äôs not reinvent the wheel please?

Title: Missing features

Content: This ‚Äúalternative‚Äù to HBO is quite pointless. What is even the point of forcing all of your users to switch to a completely different app that is, not to mention, barely functional. While steaming the show or movie lags frequently and any videos that you were in the middle of watching do not show up under the ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù tab, meaning that you have to manually search anything that you wish to watch. I do not recommend this atrocity to anyone.

Content: I cannot fathom why anybody would even think (let alone suggest to a supervisor and get approved) to drop the HBO branding and use the Discovery/Max branding instead.  People tune in for Westworld, The Leftovers, Game of Thrones, The Sopranos, The Wire, Succession, Barry, Veep, and Chernobyl. I had to google a list of names for Max shows because the branding is so poor, and the original content from that side doesn‚Äôt seem much better. I certainly won‚Äôt be watching ‚ÄúAlaskan Killer Bigfoot‚Äù or ‚ÄúUFO Witness.‚Äù This is one of the worst marketing decisions that I‚Äôve ever seen.
Title: Why Max? HBO is better

Content: Will not lie love Max got it when it was first HBO MAX just one suggestion is to push for better shows/originals mad by HBO for more subscribers as the app calls for more audience it‚Äôs best to bring comedy or drama shows to the domain! Lots of great movies and shows to watch already tho but this seems more like a review for what I want so I‚Äôll end here!
Title: Take a look!

Content: Ever since switching to max, after the ads end, the subtitles that are shown are for a totally different episode. Before the advertisements start, the correct subtitles are displayed. It only happens after ads. It‚Äôs really difficult to reset the problem manually. Closing the app is usually the only fix‚Ä¶could be a bug.

Content: Okay so before I begin, I absolutely love HBO Max!!! But they have got to do something about the signing in crap. I am constantly having to sign in and I don‚Äôt understand why it‚Äôs so hard for them to keep my information so I don‚Äôt have to sign in every time I open the app. Hopefully they can fix this soon because that is the only problem that I have with HBO Max!!

Whenever I open the app, whether I‚Äôm casting it to my tv or just watching on my phone, none of my progress in my continue watching shows/movies have been saved. I tried uninstalling/reinstalling, updating the app and signing off and back on but nothing is fixing the issue. I have to start everything over from the beginning. Very very very very frustrating.

Its frustrating to the point I will probably switch to another streaming service that actually works.  Also, content for kids is very under par and they make it super hard to find. Title: Constantly fails to play downloaded content

Content: Always has worked but no longer even after uninstalling and reinstalling about 10 times. Rebooting phone. Hopefully just a glitch but will try later.
Title: Works great until it doesn‚Äôt

Content: HBO is one of the only streaming services I consistently use and think is actually worth the money. However I think the name just to just MAX is pretty stupid and they‚Äôre just copying the rest of the streaming services. Bring back HBO MAX and change the background back to Purple.
Title: Stupid name

Content: The accessibility issues have gotten much more worse ever since HBO max became max. Did they not take being accessible and inclusive into consideration. I pay  the same amount to view content. This app is very very hard to navigate using voiceover. There‚Äôs no reason why it cannot be made accessible. It‚Äôs just needs to be a priority to make accessibility a requirement within the app development.
Title: Major accessibility issue for voiceover user who is blind

Content: How y‚Äôall went from being the best, most cohesive app to the absolute worst boggles my mind. I don‚Äôt know who decided the interface needed to be the same as all the other ones. It was great as it was before, I could easily find movies and shows. I liked knowing what was ‚ÄúJUST ADDED‚Äù and what was ‚ÄúCOMING SOON‚Äù or even what was leaving. Whoever made that decision to ruin the cohesion deserves nothing but warm pillows on both sides for the rest of their lives.   If it ain‚Äôt broke‚Ä¶ so ridiculous.
Title: Finding something to watch‚Ä¶

Content: I was trying to watch Harry Potter and the prisoners of Azkaban, and it buffered at the opening scene and wouldn‚Äôt go past I had to of tried restarting about a hundred times and realized that it was probably my wifi, it wasn‚Äôt the connection speeds were plenty fast enough. So I had to watch it on peacock instead. Sorry HBO but if y‚Äôall could fix it would gladly change my rating to 5 stars because frankly I love this app.
Title: Buffering too much!

Content: I like the new layout of the app. It is easier to find, sort through, and filter through options now. I hope they stop changing the name of the service though. Personally I was a fan when they just called it HBO. Overall a great service that doesn‚Äôt break the bank.

There is something for everyone, Adult Swim, TCM, DC, Discovery, TLC, Blippi, Sesame Street, Cartoon Network, etc., as well as the huge amount of HBO originals and their available movies and shows.

So, I‚Äôm constantly having to turn them back off. It‚Äôs frustrating and annoying and makes me not want to use the app at all.   You could accuse me of being dramatic with this, but it really is very frustrating having to reset the subtitles. I‚Äôm tired of having to compensate for the development team‚Äôs inability to test things like this.

And I love trash reality tv - but this isn‚Äôt it. 90 day fianc√© and the last of us mingling together is just off putting. Maybe this is a testament to HBO‚Äôs branding prior to this merger.  The sections are a mess. The interface is ugly. I feel like I downgraded in quality, despite having more selection. I‚Äôm not sure how they managed to do it, but I don‚Äôt feel like paying for this app anymore and I‚Äôve lost interest in HBO. It‚Äôs quite impressive!

Content: I love that I can like certain shows or movies and it genuinely will show me similar titles and also the easiness of looking for hbo, Cinemax, showtime, dc etc and it has such a wide range, it‚Äôs extremely easy to use and a main reason I got rid of cable üíúüëç

I‚Äôm not finding the app easy to navigate in it comes to shows in my queue, etc.  The fact that they dropped ‚ÄòHBO‚Äô from their name was a stupid business decision as well. Content: Why on Earth would anyone think a merge of a Premier content provider and‚Ä¶well, just junk was a good idea?!?  I‚Äôm baffled.  To top it off, the actually good content is now only accessible through an unnecessary labyrinth of master menus.   I won‚Äôt even get into my thoughts on The Idol‚Ä¶too many landmines!  **Biggest app complaint‚ÄîEver since the change‚Ä¶the playback software has been glitchy at best.  I pick a title & choose ‚Äúplay again‚Äù only for it to return to the very end of credits; over & over.  So‚Ä¶one must be very nimble fingered (no so easy at my age) & quickly push and wait for a quick total rewind.    I‚Äôm sorry, but even PBS‚Äôs app has got the ‚Äúresume or start from beginning‚Äù options down pat.  For the premium price, I‚Äôd hope for premium app function!

Title: Always Glitching

Content: Try as much as I can the app keeps freezing on the opening ad. I have to wait through the frozen app as the sound still plays, then I have to wait for the show I‚Äôm trying to watch play for a little bit (at least 2-3 minutes, all while still frozen on the ad) and then back out  turn off my television, reboot it and start it from the ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù option. Officially lost my business
Title: Canceling my subscription due to this app

Content: I remember HBO back from when it was a thing that only some people had on their television. When I lived in New York I used to go to the Bryant Park HBO summer movies. HBO did that for free for anybody who wanted to show up. Really appreciate that they are still around and making amazing content.
Title: Seriously

Content: This new app is terrible compared to the original HBO Max app! Every time I try to watch a show on my phone, it plays the episodes in a different language. Then when I eventually get it to English, it plays the description version instead so I can‚Äôt even enjoy that. I don‚Äôt understand why they switch to a new up. I never had issues with the last one and now I‚Äôm thinking of canceling my subscription because I can‚Äôt even watch a show properly now.
Title: New Max

Content: Max is definitely a worse app than it‚Äôs predecessor. It keeps taking shows you‚Äôre currently watching off your ‚ÄúContinue Watching‚Äù list and tries to restart you at the beginning of the series if you just hit play. It does it to me and my parents. The ways to search up shows is shortened as well so we‚Äôre now removing features from the app. And for some of my friends, their Max accounts just doesn‚Äôt work with chromebooks.
Title: Definitely a leap in the wrong direction

Content: Are used to hardly ever watch HBO, but the new max version is really awesome and now it‚Äôs the platform I watch most often. It has all my favorite shows in real time with no commercials. I absolutely love it and watch it every day!
Title: Really great shows, no commercials.

Content: South Park plays on all of my devices except my tv, but the app and every other show/movie so far has worked. It‚Äôs only the South Park series that black screens on the tv. You can hear the episode but no visuals. It works on all my other devices just fine. Only occurred when the app updated on my firestick for the new max app. Can you help?
Title: Issues with a show playing.

Content: HBO Max changed into Max. The app is well-made, but there is one thing that throws the whole thing down to two stars. This is because the battery, time and date icons DO NOT disappear when watching a show on mobile devices. This needs to be changed ASAP because this is infuriating. If this was purposeful, please make an option to change this manually on the app. Not a great design choice.
Title: Would be a 5 star, but‚Ä¶

Content: It‚Äôs launch night and the new app will not let me sign in. I‚Äôm using the same credentials that still work in the original HBO Max app. Why did they have to release a new app anyway? Couldn‚Äôt the old one just have been updated? It would have made things a lot easier for the customers and fans of HBO.  ‚ÄúUnknown error requesting service. Please try again later‚Äù  I wasn‚Äôt thrilled to hear HBO Max was being rebranded to Max. Everyone knows what HBO is, what is Max??
Title: new app doesn‚Äôt work on launch, bad rebrand IMO

Content: Max has a wide selection of different television shows and movies. There will probably be something that appeals to you, whether it‚Äôs one of the food shows, the sitcoms, or the variety of sports programming. I would say that it‚Äôs a worthwhile investment if you like watching television.
Title: One of the better streaming services

Content: I love the new additions of CNN. Before today I would need to search for reliable news sources documents and videos online. It would take forever.  Now that CNN is on MAX this will be my first stop daily. Thank you!  PS, Hey James Gunn, we need some phenomenal DC content so let‚Äôs get on that.
Title: CNN

Content: Really makes you appreciate Netflix. It‚Äôs funny how you take for granted basic functionality until you experience the lack thereof. Where do I even begin?  The app never remembers where I am in a show. 100% of the time I have to manually go through a shows episodes to figure out where I left off. It seems to randomly latch on to episodes and get stuck there, sometimes multiple season back.  If I open the app when I‚Äôm watching something, it restarts whatever I‚Äôm watching for no reason without clicking on anything.   There is no way to skip to the next episode. The only way to do this is to exit out of what you‚Äôre watching, go through the menus to find what you‚Äôre watching, and manually scroll through the episodes.
Title: This app is garbage

Content: There is a lot to chose from but on some shows there is a voice explaining what is happening on the show and there is no way to turn it off.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Hbo max(max) gets an automatic 9/10 for me I love how they add all the new movies that came out this year or the year prior and this app always keeps me entertained would recommend everyone who sees this review gets it‚Äôs worth trust me
Title: One of the best movie and tv shows app I‚Äôve been on

Content: My family is enjoying Max. However if they continue to keep shoveling shows containing LGBTQ I will quit them just like I did Disney Plus and Netflix. I don‚Äôt want my children watching it and I have no interest in it. Go woke, go broke. Take notes!
Title: Enjoying Max However

Content: NEW UPDATE!!!!! Now the thing shut off mid episode and when I click try again it starts from the beginning. Complete garbage.  UPDATE!!!! Now as I‚Äôm streaming I get kicked off and it asks me to try again or hit a back button. I know there‚Äôs nothing wrong with my Internet. This is pretty decent and the selection is pretty good. I would give it a lot more stars if I didn‚Äôt have to login every other time that I go to use it. Really really really really really annoying! üò°
Title: Junk!!!!

Content: I honestly find it hard to find things i‚Äôm looking for without the hubs tab. The hubs tab was really useful for me and organized. As someone on the spectrum I start to get really upset if something isn‚Äôt organized and easy to find. I really would want the Cartoon Network, Studio Ghibli and other hub tabs back! It‚Äôs better, and the old style for HBO Max is way better, Max new style doesn‚Äôt sit right and I absolutely hate it.
Title: Hubs back?

Content: I want Max to work. I really do. I love the selection of movies and shows available. My issue is that now MAX doesn‚Äôt save where I am in movies and shows. I can‚Äôt get a continue watching section no matter what I‚Äôm watching. It always goes back to episode 1 when I‚Äôve looked for the show. It‚Äôs really frustrating. Please fix this.
Title: Great Potential but Crappy Execution

Content: The app is way faster with speed and rarely buffers at all. My only complaint with the mobile app is that you have to re-login every time you get on. It‚Äôs just frustrating that it doesn‚Äôt keep your account or give you the option to, ‚Äúremember me.‚Äù
Title: Faster!

Content: I do not think the people at HBOMAx understand what "downloads" entails, and why people download content. You will need wifi to access your downloads, and Max will randomly log you out (in order to access your downloads, you'll need to stay logged in) so that you can't access your downloads when connecting to wifi is not possible (for example on a flight). Terrible terrible user experience, UX team needs to do something about it.
Title: downloads

Content: The new app is terrible. It doesn‚Äôt use Apple‚Äôs native video player, so using the jog shuttle for going forward or back in the movie or show doesn‚Äôt work. Nor does ‚Äúhey Siri what did they say?‚Äù work for automatically rewinding about 10 seconds and temporarily turning on subtitles if you miss something.   And how do you change the name from HBO to Max? HBO is a stellar brand that‚Äôs been around since the dawn of cable television. What are they thinking? This app is terrible.
Title: It isn‚Äôt just the new name that‚Äôs terrible‚Ä¶

Content: The latest iteration of HBO-Max finally puts all those disparate video chunks and properties into a cohesive unit. It has lots of great shows and movies to dig through, a comprehensive task for your couch potato master watcher !!  Exclusive content like the show ‚ÄúBarry‚Äù is just ONE ITEM out of many that keeps me dedicated to perusing this channel. Get it.
Title: MAX is TOPS

Content: I subscribe to several screening services. In fact, too many. Of them all, MAX and APPLE Plus consistently have the best options. Prime is good too but so many titles are pay per view in addition to the prime charge per year.
Title: good content. Something for everyone

Content: Ever since the new update to ‚ÄúMAX‚Äù happened the app on my ROKU lags, wont register anything new I start on ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù and when I start scrolling down the selection is not even visible it‚Äôs past the screen it does not let you see what titles you‚Äôre selecting, like it‚Äôs not centered. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs an individual issue or if it‚Äôs happening to other users but it only started happening after the update and it‚Äôs very aggravating
Title: New update Frustrating to use.

Content: It would be nice if the clock would disappear when watching on an iPad.   The bar at the bottom of the screen stays on so does battery and the clock. Very annoying when you are watching something that is supposed to be dark like Spawn.
Title: Clock displays while playing video

Content: I remember the old HBO+ app and it was terrible to navigate. Then they came out with HBO Max and seemed to fix the app so that you could actually find things easily. Now it‚Äôs right back to terrible design like they had before. What happened to the hubs? Why can‚Äôt I go straight to the TCM section? Where is the leaving soon section? Why does every suggested category just have the same movies in different orders? Nobody asked for this change. This is the opposite of improvement.
Title: Nobody Asked For This

Content: Just miss some of the old features from the previous HBO Max app. Video setting during the movie/show that just made a more confident and the fact that the 10 second skip didn‚Äôt lag the whole video each time you pressed it.
Title: Nice, but just miss old features

Content: Annoying. Since the switch you are not able to continue watching tv shows and only options available are movies you want to continue watching. Then if you go into the tv show you were watching, instead of picking up where you left off, it only give options to start all over again or you need to figure out what episode you were in previously. Fix it please
Title: Cannot continue watching tv shows

Content: Ever since the app updates to ‚ÄúMax‚Äù, the tv shows I‚Äôve already watched are not coming up in History, Continue Watching, or My List. I had to re-add all the tv shows I watch to My List, and when I try to watch them the app will NOT save what season or episode I left off. This also causes me to find the episode I was on, and manually rewind to the beginning since there is no Restart available either. Total crap app.
Title: No Continue Watching, Restart, or History

Content: On iPad, ‚ÄúConnect Your Provider‚Äù -> ‚ÄúAn error occurred!‚Äù Since updating iPad OS to 16.5, I don‚Äôt even get a list of providers to choose from now, just a blank white pop-up dialog. Is it their idea of making you subscribe directly? No thanks. It‚Äôs not that exciting to get into the Mike Rowe-ization of HBO anyway. Nothing against him personally, but the board room-‚Äúinspired‚Äù amalgam doesn‚Äôt exactly sound like a continuation of HBO‚Äôs tradition of blockbuster must-see movies and TV. The ‚Äúmax‚Äù in ‚ÄúHBO Max‚Äù meant quality. The ‚Äúmax‚Äù in ‚ÄúMax‚Äù means quantity, diluted.
Title: Worthless

Content: MAX provides a tremendously diverse streaming service.  With an excellent collection of classics that are hard to find elsewhere and timelessly easy to enjoy, along with a wide range of recently released blockbusters as well as binge worthy original series's in every category.
Title: Review of MAX Streaming Service.

Content: The acting is superb. It makes you feel like you‚Äôre in on it they keep you wanting more Barry flight attendant curb your enthusiasm vicariously watching others live takes me away from the reality of today for me. It‚Äôs like having a movie theater in my home. Calm is so soothing, educational and it puts me to sleep at night I love HBO Max.
Title: Exciting stories

Content: The app will not allow me to login on my iPhone. Every time i enter my account credentials, i get an error stating ‚Äúdevice time is out of sync.‚Äù My phone has the proper date and time, and i have tried everything their help center suggests several times. nothing will fix this bug and allow me to login. not really interested in a subscription that wont allow me to access the content paid for, very disappointed.
Title: Device Time is Out of Sync

Content: Definitely better than the original app, but needs much work, for instance; why is it that I find myself downloading the same episodes over and over again, all because the app deletes the episode itself within literal minutes of me downloading them? Makes no sense honestly

Content: Buggy on portable devices. Constant buffering even with excellent signal. And please stop forcing update. Would prefer to update via wifi but have to choose between watching another streaming service until I get home or updating via cellular.
Title: Mostly okay

Content: This app is a laggy pile. It‚Äôs worse on my tv where it‚Äôs almost unwatchable. Things don‚Äôt fully load. There is massive lag. Shows will say ‚Äúnew episode ‚Äú even after you have caught up so you are never certain if there is a new episode or not. The roll back when you pause or restart a show is stupid and unnecessary.  There is a lot of content but the only streaming service that‚Äôs worse for the app is Netflix and that‚Äôs saying a lot.
Title: Horrible app.

Content: I love max and there‚Äôs so much I want to watch, but I keep having this problem where I can‚Äôt make audio descriptions stop!! It‚Äôs making max basically unusable because I find it so annoying. There isn‚Äôt a way to turn them off from the caption menu, looking forward to when they fix this

Content: This is by far my favorite app of all times  Only problem I have is there are to many old movies that have been on there since I started watching max and that‚Äôs been like 3/4 years now but other than tht Great app 20 star

Content: So I renewed my subscription and I haven‚Äôt been able to watch hbo i‚Äôm only able to watch it on my computer but other than phones,ipad or tv i can‚Äôt it says i don‚Äôt have a subscription and i have to renew it but i tried signing out and back in but it still doesn‚Äôt let me watch please fix this sooner.
Title: subscription issue

Content: I cast to my TV via wifi.  This app literally blows my speakers out every new episode, and it also adjusts the volume on my TV when it should always be set at 0 (using a sound bar instead of TV speakers).  I have no idea why it doesnt remember the volume settings and adjusts my TV's volume to some random number.  I also get a black box saying "unexpected error trying to cast the content" even after I have clicked a different episode.
Title: Cast to TV volume errors, unexpected errors

Content: I absolutely adore what they‚Äôve done with HBO max turn into max. I enjoy the next year between 1000 lb pound sisters in the classic HBO programming. I just wish they would‚Äôve canceled legendary. That was an amazing show and I wish you could‚Äôve stayed on this platform.
Title: What is the skeptic for the new merger

Content: It doesn‚Äôt matter if I‚Äôm home watching something on the Wi-Fi or if I‚Äôm watching something on my phone with 5G, every few minutes, there‚Äôs a buffering issue where the video quality gets blurry OR I get the spinning circle.  It‚Äôs unbearable.  I mean, the content is great. Plenty to watch and all of that, but how can I watch a movie where I get a loading circle every few minutes?
Title: Spinning Circle or Blurry Video

Content: When playing a video in full screen on iPad, everything should disappear so you see ONLY the video. In this app, the menu bar, all its icons, battery percentage, the clock, date, etc does not disappear. Nor do the three dots at the top nor does the white line at the bottom of the screen. Very distracting when trying to watch something. Not to mention disappointing ‚Äî this never happened with the HBO app.
Title: Menu bar, three dots, white line won‚Äôt turn off

Content: I like HBO it has a great selection in movies and now even more shows thanks to the merging with discovery. However the issue I have with this app is it doesn‚Äôt save my spot at all on shows. I leave off a show and it won‚Äôt pick up that I have already watched that episode or save my spot. Content: The app is great, good titles, simple interface and design yet none of that matters because every movie and tv shows image size are super small, Im not sure if its just not optimized for the 12.9 iPad Pro Im viewing it on but its super small like squint to view small lol almost ruins the whole experience trying to focus rather than watch !

Content: As with thE previous app, the download function is still buggy. I downloaded some videos to watch while traveling. However, the entire set of downloads suddenly disappeared for no reason. Very frustrating.

Content: PLEASE, fix the download option. It is literally DISAPPEARING from the show or movie once you‚Äôve started the content. If you haven‚Äôt clicked the show or movie yet, the option to download is there, but you totally mess yourself up if you watch some and then decide to download. FIX THIS PLEASE. I don‚Äôt want to be afraid to start a show at home and not be able to finish it on the go. This is a big issue I would think. Thanks.
Title: Download option gone after starting content

Content: I was a user of HBO max, now I am using Max. I loved HBO max, the graphics in Max is even better, however, I loved having options to shuffle different episodes for TV shows like ‚ÄòFriends‚Äô, I was very disappointed to see the shuffle option was removed. Title: Hi

Content: When I turn my phone clockwise to the side to watch, (charging port facing left) Ill receive a message or notification and swipe down to view it, but when I swipe up to resume watching, the portrait will flip upside down.

Content: For the most part it is good but one thing I don‚Äôt understand is why would they change it from hbo max to just max it was super confusing because when me and my mom went to go watch HBO Max one day I was like did they get rid of HBO max cause what is max? Content: The content is the same and the UI is familiar, but I personally have developed a habit of pulling down on control center or notification center when i‚Äôm in full screen, and in a certain rotation, the screen comes back upside down. Other than that I have seen no other issues.

Just like HBO original stuff. Plus the app is really buggy most of the time to the point I had to turn off automatic updates. You can take features but not I‚Äôm closer to canceling my subscription.

Content: I tried to download a season of an HBO original show and ran into issues downloading the episodes forcing me to restart a lot of the individual downloads. Once finished, most of the episodes were corrupted about half way through, making them unwatchable. Then once I got to my destination, I couldn‚Äôt redownload because HBO isn‚Äôt available in that region.   And don‚Äôt get me started on the Apple TV app is much should be negative stars.

Content: I don‚Äôt like sex and the city. They actors and story line and dialogue irritate me. I wish I could delete it from the front page. It‚Äôs annoying to see something you don‚Äôt like. It makes me want to delete the whole app and save myself $25 per month. The theater is better anyway.

Content: I don‚Äôt understand what‚Äôs happening. I‚Äôll start watching a episode casting through our chromecast if I close my phone and then go to open the app again the show starts all over from the beginning.  I‚Äôve contacted customer service to let them know as well. This last week has been super frustrating with this issue. Please please fix this issue.

Content: It‚Äôs exactly the same and everything is perfect except that I can‚Äôt SharePlay on FaceTime anymore üò≠üò≠üò≠. I already tried reaching out the app developers and submitted a suggestion. I just hope it gets updated quick so that I can return to watching Steven universe with my friends again.
Title: Why the update???

Content: When watching a video on the apple tv, if you double tap the touchpad, it will bring up the timeline and tell you what time (exactly) the video will end. The max app broke this. You double tap the remote, it jumps forward instead of telling you what time the video will end. It worked on the HBO app, so this must've been an intentional decision to break it. Fix it, and I'll change my rating. Also, the name is dumb.  Stop asking me what profile I want to use every time I launch the apple tv app.   It's me.   It's always me.  Every time I launch the app on this tv, it's me.   Just add an option for a default profile and we'll be good. That way every time I launch the app on a certain device, it'll take me straight to my profile and not ask me who is watching.
Title: Broke apple tv

Content: Previously an HBO Max user - never had any problems. Since it switched over to Max, I get audio descriptions randomly all the time and they won‚Äôt go away unless I uninstall and reinstall. Movies will play in Spanish and won‚Äôt swap to English unless I uninstall and reinstall. Movies randomly quit casting and then it doesn‚Äôt keep my spot in the movie - I have to just guess where I was before it closes out. This‚Äôll be my last month paying for Max. I hate this app.

Please fix this, and maybe I‚Äôll fix the stars portion of my review ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Content: This app is the worst. How do you not have a queue on top for the next show in a series someone has been watching? Not even a ‚Äúrecently watched‚Äù at all!!! Title: Movie is just dark

Content: So much great content removed, no innovation with the user interface, hardly any incentive to invest in watching anything since it would likely be cancelled at a moment‚Äôs notice. David Zaslav has ruined an entire company, it‚Äôs channels, its movie studio, and it‚Äôs streaming service. The only saving grace is the stuff we still have left over before he seized power.
Title: Ruined by corporate bologna

Content: I would like to see improvements in the New Max App. Every time I select the Max app it opens and redirects to a download page, which is tedious because the app is already downloaded. (On Mobile and Smart TV.)  The subscription fee was raised again, which is something else that the developers should look at before launching on platforms.
Title: Official App

Content: I can‚Äôt tell you how much I miss the old app (HBO) this has so many cliches it‚Äôs ridiculous. Again why did you fix / change the old app when there was nothing wrong with it.  Just to put the name Max on the app? Hmmm
Title: If it‚Äôs not broke why fix it

Content: Signs me out every time I exit, and it can‚Äôt find my email I used to literally buy a subscription so now I can‚Äôt sign in. Like why switch to or make a new service. Tried making me pay for 2 subscriptions
Title: Terrible

Content: If you have already watched a show and want to rewatch it‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt recommend doing so on this app. It won‚Äôt pop up on your continued watching and if you scroll to find it all the episodes are already watched so you can‚Äôt just pick up from where you were. Title: Fix the continue watching issue

Content: Absolute trash app. They intentionally make it as difficult as possible to cancel a subscription. The app of course won‚Äôt let you do it. It points you to their website, without actually giving a link. Then when you manually navigate to that website, after painstakingly tapping in the URL character-by-character, it redirects you back to the app. Gross incompetence or disgusting business practice? Either way they do  not deserve your money.
Title: Trash

Content: I think I‚Äôve ‚Äúreplaced‚Äù this app no less than 3 times in the last year and a half due to rebranding or changes from AT&T, TW, etc. Not only is it annoying but really messes up downloaded content plus you have to sign back in, it‚Äôs all a big PIA and something that should be considered when this is done, especially when it‚Äôs only to change the name!!
Title: How many times can one app be changed

Content: Can‚Äôt get through a single episode of a show or watch 10 seconds of a movie without constant lagging, buffering, pausing, loading, and glitching. Have the fastest internet speed and have run connectivity tests but it is not my devices or internet at all. It is this horrible app and it has never worked fluidly and smoothly not even once across any device. Terrible terrible streaming app and that‚Äôs saying something.
Title: absolute worst streaming app around!!!!

Content: I don‚Äôt know who‚Äôs idea it was to change such a great legendary name HBO to Max but personally I think it‚Äôs the biggest blunder conceivable in the whole history of the entertainment world! Title: Bring back HBO

Content: Everyone that did a 1 star complaining that they can‚Äôt get into there account is stupid they all forgot there passwords and is now blaming it on the app all of my logins worked perfectly fine haven‚Äôt had a single issue
Title: Max

Content: It was a terrible decision on the part of Warner Bros Discovery to use their own video player rather than use the native tvOS player. It‚Äôs frustratingly difficult to simply rewind or fast forward content, either in short 10 second bursts or scrub to find a particular spot. Content: A complete, straightforward, and updated version of HBO Max! Downloads are working fine! Watchlists all transferred successfully from the previous app.  Hope everyone has a smoother experience than before, free of any bugs and crashes!
Title: Looks good so far!

Content: I love being able to open up my phone an look for all the old movies I didn‚Äôt have a  chance to catch up on. I enjoy my subscription an look forward to new movies out  I can enjoy on Max
Title: Max Is Amazing

Content: I understand having a cheaper subscription with ads, but one every 5-10 minutes is ridiculous!  Not only are the frequent, but also absurdly long. On top of that the selection of shows and movies are horrendous. Only thing saving this app now is live sports. Max must be down bad and I hope that it‚Äôs competitors leave it in the dust. I wish I could give it zero stars, but the only justification is now they have live sports.
Title: Egregious Ads make me sad.

Content: Absolutely ridiculous that you have to download the app on your phone, even if it's already on your tv, to cancel your subscription. Cannot do anything on the website and bot won't give any cancellation help.
Title: Cancel

Content: Volume goes all the at up to 100 everytime a show starts. Can't get audio narration off, tried everything. Shows often start in different languages. It's hard to watch anything and enjoy it with the audio narration and having to switch languages and turn the volume all the way down everytime a show starts. The 2 stars are for content.
Title: Good content awful app

Content: I hate that you need to pay more for different shows, I wish you could just pay then be done. Also why name it max when it doesn‚Äôt have maximum things. Also why change the name to max instead of keeping it HBO-max? Just stop being roblox and adding and deleting unnecessary stuff.
Title: Why fix it if it‚Äôs not broken?

Content: like. i can‚Äôt cast. can‚Äôt turn on subtitles. when it does cast the quality is dookie and gives out after 2 mins. the app on literally every TV i‚Äôve tried won‚Äôt even load up; you can only watch stuff via casting from ur phone but that also struggles and struggles and struggles. hbomax was my go to before the ‚Äúmax‚Äù launch. now i just wish it would work anywhere other than on my tiny phone
Title: i just want this application to function

Content: We just watched a movie we thought from the description we would like, but ended up NOT liking it at all. Its one of the few things we‚Äôve watched, the first since the rebranding to ‚ÄúMax‚Äù. Now it keeps showing ‚Äúmore shows like‚Äù!  I don‚Äôt want more shows like that.  It seems like a serious design flaw in the whole Max system.  No like/dislike on the Sony/Google TV app or the website either. That‚Äôs why the low rating.
Title: No dislike/like option!!!!!

Content: Even though Disney Plus is my number one favorite streaming service, I think Max is a very useful streaming app to watch many shows and movies!   Those include HBO, Adult Swim, Cartoon Network, DC, Discovery, and more.    I really like this streaming service a lot!
Title: Very useful video streaming app!

Content: I got an email from max support saying my login may be disrupted because of multiple emails associated to my account. Try to login and could not.   Sent message to max support who claimed they could not help. Despite subscribing for 20+ years in various iterations of the app and cable providers  - and this company said it was surely a problem with Apple.   Then why did max send me an email and ask me to contact them??  Poor service. Will not resubscribe.
Title: Terrible app and poor service

Content: HBO Max was a lot better than Max.  The functions work, playback well and audio was in sync. Now Max does  the opposite. It‚Äôs difficult to search for an episode in a show. The audio is terribly sync. I thought it was my Roku or I restarted it multiple times only to find out it was Max. I‚Äôm not the only one with this problem. The only reason I still have max is to finish one show. After that, I‚Äôm canceling my subscription.
Title: Don‚Äôt fix things that don‚Äôt need fixing

Content: When picking up where you left back it‚Äôs a minute or so behind where you actually stop watching. Not major but gets annoying. Best shows on our here though for sure
Title: New app feedback

Content: The app doesn‚Äôt do a good job of picking up on a show where you leave off. I‚Äôve had to search through episodes to get back to where a was (sometimes it‚Äôs minutes off, sometimes it‚Äôs a couple of episodes off). Other than that I love it!
Title: It‚Äôs alright.

Content: Buffers terribly, and I mean every 7-10 seconds it buffers. Doesn‚Äôt matter if the app is up to date, you have a good connection or reinstall the app. Nothing will work! Great job switching over from HBO Max!!
Title: Genuinely one of the worst streaming apps

Content: Still needs some work making it easier to find the classics of each network or franchise but it‚Äôs. It‚Äôs as if they need a button to see the all time popular rankings of all shows.
Title: So much better than HBO max

Content: Really like the app, it‚Äôs smooth, the menu looks good, and there is lots of 4K content to watch.  This said, I‚Äôd request the makers of the app to review one issue that users like myself are getting on the Apple TV (don‚Äôt know about other platforms).  I can‚Äôt get to watch any content in Dolby Vision on my Apple TV. Sure, the image is 4K and sound is Atmos, but there is no DV. (I‚Äôm talking about the Ultimate plan that includes 4k content)   Myself and other subscribers will be grateful if the people at Max or the app developers kindly rectify this issue and come up with an update.
Title: Great app, with some tweaking needed (for getting Dolby Vision on Apple TV)

Content: I‚Äôve been trying to get assistance for more than a week. The only choice is to read and answer questions online help. Since I cannot read the very pale script, I am just frustrated that I have no option for phone assistance.  Older adults desire these movie/tv apps-I have several and have not encountered this much difficulty!
Title: Frustrated

Content: Since they have switch to ‚Äúmax‚Äù and charged me 18$! I have not been able to watch a full episode of anything without having to wait multiple times for it to load up or completely back out and go back in.. it‚Äôs not my internet service bc everything else works fine.. this can easily be the superior streaming service but the price is steep and it lags..
Title: Lagging

Content: Max is similar to the previous app HBO Max, but the way the menus are organized are different and it‚Äôs harder to find things.  There used to be a menu under Movies to find the genres, last chance and just added lists, but now you have to scroll through several different categories to find those sections.
Title: Max is Alright

Content: HBO Max with Discovery * Best partnership around. Only thing better than that is Disney with Marvel + National Geographic  But then again you can't compete with the OG's All I have to say is FFF Netflix and their lame wannabe home made shows with dumb actors that want to get payed more than the president for sucking at their jobs Anyone who still has Netflix is because your parents still pay for it and you haven't tried a real streaming program  Quick explanation in case you're wondering, Disney+ has All the Marvel movies HBO Max has All the DC Movies  Binge out

Content: I love that MAX has a lot of the shows I love but when I try to watch it on my phone it doesn‚Äôt save where my place is under continue watching    It‚Äôs probably user error so correct me if I‚Äôm doing something wrong‚Ä¶ otherwise this is one of my favorite apps!!!
Title: All the best shows but‚Ä¶.

Content: Completely non-functional for me. Why didn‚Äôt they just update the old app with the new name and new color, if it was all that important to them? I‚Äôve been fighting with the app for two days now, with zero help from MAX support (if it even exists), and all I get when I try to log in with my provider is ‚ÄúAn error occurred! Something went wrong. Please try again.‚Äù WB/Discovery are well on their way to destroying the brand that created the very idea of prestige TV.
Title: Why why why

Content: I literally can‚Äôt even play a movie or show. The app both on tv and apple iPhone just don‚Äôt work! Nothing loads, no titles to click, nothing! The tv app just sits on the setting page and won‚Äôt let me navigate anywhere else to view shows/movies. The app just has genre titles but ZERO shows and movies under EVERY genre. There‚Äôs nothing on this app. I LOVED hbomax for Studio Ghibli before the app change. Now I‚Äôm terminating my service. This is complete trash.
Title: Won‚Äôt load any movie at all

Content: This is easily the worst rebranding I have ever seen. It no longer has the HBO brand recognition going do it and purple was a better color since Disney + and prime video already had blue. But you know what, at least this may be a better app, right? No! It literally looks exactly the same as HBO Max. Zaslav, what are you doing?! This guy really has no clue how to run an entertainment company in the 21st century. I swear I could run Warner Bros. Discovery 5x better with no experience in upper level management.
Title: Pointless rebranding

Content: The previous HBO app was so much better than the new MAX app.  The MAX app doesn‚Äôt save your spot in whatever you‚Äôre watching, so when you try to continue at a later time, it restarts from the beginning. It also does this when you lock your phone screen. If you lock and unlock your phone while in the app, it will restart whatever was playing and not save your spot.  MAX needs to fix this because it makes it super inconvenient to watch anything if you need to pause it or want to stop watching for the time being. I know multiple people who have this issue with the app.  What was the point of making a new app with a major glitch/issue if it is was going to ruin the user experience?
Title: MAX App Needs to be Fixed

Content: This app used to work great, and recently it‚Äôs been having some trouble. I will either leave the app, or switch apps, and my show starts completely over or sometimes hops back an episode. Or if I‚Äôm out of the app and go back into Max, it does the same thing. Hopefully this is being looked at by developers :)
Title: Glitchy

Content: I have this subscription through my phone carrier (AT&T)......this app USED to be somewhat "good" until they changed the name to MAX!!!! When it was the HBO app I rarely had to re-sign in due to updates or whatever would log it out. Now, with this garbage app, I have to go through the sign in process through my carrier and the Max app almost every single time it updates or I decide to use it. This happens on my iPhone AND on my TV both! So so so so so so so so ANNOYING!!!!
Title: So annoying!!!!

Content: The Max app randomly logged me out one day while i was at school and every time i try to log back in it takes forever. and with the app, i don‚Äôt like the way it‚Äôs set up, i feel as if it should be more organized and helpful to find what the person is looking for.  please fix these issues
Title: log in and app

Content: Enjoy the selection of the new and old. Easily able to navigate menu options. Definitely a deal for the selection available. Hope you enjoy as much as I have.

Content: Auto play in Picture in Picture mode doesn‚Äôt work. Each time an episode is over I have to manually go back in the app to press play. This happens on my iPad and iPhone. Can this be fixed in the next update pleaseeee??

Content: I‚Äôm not a fan of this so called update. I LOVED HBO Max! I DO NOT like Max so far. It constantly logs me out. It doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs my TV, phone, or game consoles (PlayStation/Xbox). It does it on all of them. I never had any issues like this before and it‚Äôs frustrating. I figured these bugs would be fixed by now but it‚Äôs still aggravating. Also in agreement with others, the setup and the loss of features is disappointing. The app is not better as promoted; its worse.
Title: Log Out Issues!

Content: AMAZING CATEGORIES there‚Äôs allot of good movies and it‚Äôs very organize nice opening etc. it‚Äôs a good way to find what you need to watch and how to watch has a LOT of languages to choose from the subtitles are not in the way nor to big or small it‚Äôs probably the most useful streaming app in my opinion. ;))))
Title: YES YES YES MAXX

Content: Might be the worst streaming app I‚Äôve ever seen. Old HBOMax was good. Literally told me my password didn‚Äôt meet the requirements (was too short), but it was the saved HBOMax password that they told me to use. Keeps making me re download it, crashes, didn‚Äôt save more than half of my continue watching or saved Queue. It‚Äôs bad enough that as soon as we finish the show we‚Äôve been watching, we will probably delete it amd unsubscribe.
Title: Should have tested before they released

Content: As much as I love having access to so much more content it‚Äôs annoying when none of the things I‚Äôve started watching since this transition show up on my ‚Äúcontinue watching‚Äù section, or that it won‚Äôt let me continue on the last episode I watched. It automatically tells me to restart at episode 1 even when I‚Äôm already on season 3, episode 6.
Title: So annoyed it compelled me to write my 1st review

Content: Really enjoying the amount of content!  Lots to choose fro with this rollout. Always concerned when it was being reported that shows and movies were being pulled. Not anymore!  Lots to choose from for the summer and beyond!

Content: For whatever reason since the merge, my continue watching never saves. So I have to remember what season & episode im on and manually select. I understand this is a total first world problem, but I‚Äôm spending money every month on the app that also recently started having ads.. I love that discovery and HBO came together to make the ultimate streaming app, but unfortunately there are still some kinks, all of this does discourage me from continuing to use the service
Title: The app lags

Content: As if I didn‚Äôt have enough subscriptions! I was worried about if I would have to pay for another platform to screen the Discovery of Witches and here we are! They have added it onto Max and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! ü•π
Title: No way!

Content: I had no trouble last night going onto HBO Max to then redirect me to download Max. It auto-logged me into my AT&T account on the new app so I immediately start downloading some shows for a flight. Morning of flight, I check Max app and I'm logged out. My login credentials are accurate but it says I have no existing account through my phone provider? What an inconvenience.
Title: Force logout, can't log back on with correct login info

Content: Looks great as before, but just wish with the new app you would have improved some stuff. Really wish when I clicked a title it didn‚Äôt resume the show automatically. I wish it went to the bio of the show or movie first. Other then that love it.
Title: Same app new look.

Content: The new Max app is a step backwards.   Maybe two steps.   The app has a hard time remembering exactly where you stopped playing a show when you return, a frustrating step backward.   The app doesn‚Äôt feel  as responsive as the old HBO Max app but that could be me.  I would give it me star but they did add the time remaining to the video player and that was needed.   And it seems to work.
Title: This is an upgrade?

Content: I have used HBO max for years and not had any problems going from my TV provider to my phone or iPad. Of course, now that they‚Äôve changed the name they made you download a new app which constantly gives me an error message. Please think these things through before you change your system, very disappointed. Now, despite being ridiculous monthly fees through my cable provider, I cannot access the app anywhere.
Title: Crappy Transition

Content: Very disappointed with the new TVOS app that has been released. The lack of Apple‚Äôs native video player is one of many problems including the app not syncing with Up Next and not abiding by system wide settings with closed caption. Huge disappointment.   Equally disappointing is that we were misled to believe that all Discovery+ shows would be added to this platform and that does not appear to be the case with many shows missing.
Title: Break in functionality

Content: I primarily stream HBO from my phone to Sony Android‚Äôs built in chromeCast. Previous iterations of the HBO app worked fine; however, now with the new Max app, when starting a video, the volume defaults to max on the tv. so I have to play the game of lowering the volume fast enough before it wakes up my entire household, or trying to pause it before it makes a noise so that I can lower the volume. No other app has this issue with the ChromeCast software.
Title: Chromecast functionality bugged

Content: I have been an HBO subscriber for over 15 years, and the content is undeniably top tier in comparison to other streaming services.  Before they killed the old app, I used SharePlay every day to watch shows and movies with my friends. Since they switched the app to just ‚ÄúMax‚Äù they completely killed the SharePlay feature, and even worse, now advertise it as working when it absolutely does not. Please add this essential feature back to this app.
Title: NO SHAREPLAY. Great Content. Horrible App

Content: With HBO Max app I used to cast and had no issues except slow response. However, since Max took over everytime I cast I have issues using controls. For example- when I am casting a season and automatically the new episodes start playing, however, when I unlock the iPhone it will play from the first episode I started casting from. Also, sometimes an episode will start over if I return to the app while casting.
Title: Casting is a pain

Content: GOAT of the streaming apps hands down nothing else to say keep doing a great job with variety maybe we could work on adding more movies an tv series but overall on of the better ones out there.
Title: Review

Content: I‚Äôve had HBO max or max for at least 2 years now and it‚Äôs the best services I‚Äôve gotten constant new things to watch new movies to see and I love how dc movies come out on max as well, plus their amazing collection of HBO max originals. Also have to say if they have live sports NFL,MLB, and NBA they will never lose my subscription.

Seems like a ploy to trick people into renewing their subscription unnecessarily. I don‚Äôt even want to watch HBO anymore because of this app.

Content: It should have different languages for series. For example in Cartoon Network there‚Äôs not a single cartoon in another language. I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs a specific reason for that but I would love to watch it in Spanish for example. But overall it‚Äôs good.

Content: Ever since they change the app and merged with everything else there has been no continue watching feature so every time I wanna try to watch the show I have to go to search search search for it find the show and then try to remember which season episode I was on and then how far I was into it how hard is it to have a continue watching feature every single other app has one you need to fix it

Content: So you take away the definitive regal purple color and opt for the exact same blue as every other streaming app? I guess that matches what you‚Äôve done to the content. HBO was an iconic,Long-standing, watershed filmmaker‚Äôs pinnacle, with top-tier ultimately superior quality content. Now it‚Äôs a low brow, discovery channel\lifetime\Hallmark movie-of-the-week debacle. Congratulations. You have turned a three-star Michelin restaurant experience into a fast food takeout joint just off the Jersey turnpike.
Title: Who‚Äôs the gEniUz behind this appalling turn of events?

Content: Military dude here, HBO MAX really is the only thing that gets me through duty. I can confidently say better than those terrible Netflix series and what they have to offer. Better movie and show selection 10/10 best 15 bucks I‚Äôve spent.
Title: Amazing

Content: Love the shows and movies offered but on my TV, when I select a show, I get an error message repeatedly. Not on my IPad, only on TV. I‚Äôve done all the troubleshooting but still get the error message.

Title: Great app

Content: The service should be called HBO, not MAX .. HBO created many great movies & programs with almost innumerable Emmy awards .. MAX? I‚Äôve used nearly all my data for the month unaware that MAX just keeps going until you turn it off .. you would do well to follow Prime Video‚Äôs example in this matter.
Title: HBO

Content: I firmly believe this app is some sort of black ops government test designed to test the limits of human patience. About 2-3 times a day, the max app says that my subscription has expired (max is included with AT&T subscription so literally can‚Äôt expire unless I switch phone providers) and requires a painstaking process to get working again. Honestly, I‚Äôd prefer the feds just come to my house and rip my boxers off to get there rocks off as opposed to work with Max dev team.

Content: The controls act weird on Apple TV. Also, you can‚Äôt use Siri to turn captions on and off. Why not just stick with the standard interface? Also, it seems weird that you can‚Äôt customize your profile photo. This isn‚Äôt really a performance comment, but rebranding to MAX was a terrible idea.
Title: Seems really basic

Content: So this app is great the one problem is more of an opinion when u fast forward it only fast forward u 10 seconds so if u need to get to the end of a episode or movie it can take a while but besides that THIS APP IS GREAT

Content: Honestly max is probably the best app to watch shows on. But I just have 2 questions. Why did you guys change it to max. What happened to creed 1 and creed 2? Content: Found out two things about downloads on Max while traveling.   First, there‚Äôs a 30 download max across all devices on an account. This sounds like a lot unless you‚Äôre traveling with kids that download many short cartoon episodes.   Also, we noticed that downloads expire 2 days after your start watching them.   Of course, you can avoid these limits of you pay even more on top of their already high subscription fees.   I‚Äôm not doing that. I canceled my account instead.   Also, changing the name to Max was a terrible idea from a branding standpoint. HBO has long been the TV brand with the best reputation and goodwill amongst viewers. Putting the Max brand as the main name was a real genius move.

Content: Wish i could scroll through titles as i write this then i could list the shows that have saved my life, quality and quantity, and been fun all the while. However this review window just popped up so doing what i can in the moment.  They used to call TV the ‚ÄúBoob Tube‚Äù while overlooking its impact on a young priviledged generations‚Äô witnessing war atrocities and asking questions and taking action as a result as well as shows that were cathartic for the social changes that without art to help integrate would have been even more overwhelming than they already were.  And I think the plethora and quality of shows these days in general is astounding and likely taken for granted as we humans tend to do; there are teams of writers these day more so than in the past and perhaps larger teams, more diversity and so much more integrated with knowledge in general such as psychology and politics and ecology etc.  ‚ÄúMy List‚Äù feature nice as is option to download.  I haven‚Äôt used Netflix in a long time so can‚Äôt review a comparison and Showtime‚Ä¶well again I don‚Äôt recall programs there vs here off the top of my head.  Too bad all these providers can‚Äôt share content more readily as while it is great to escape and even conversely or concurrently get deeper into life and relationships etc. through art that also means my brain is not paying so much attention to the service through which i am watching it so no details stored in my old brain to list here.  Also it is somewhat socially separating to have access only to shows in one streaming service vs another.  Another improvement would be to have more social access, discussions about the movies and potentially even watch parties where we all watch one at the same time and discuss afterwards.
Title: Therapeutic and far more sane often than the so called real-world

Content: I use an Apple TV to watch Max, and the first issue I noticed with the new Max app (after changing from HBO Max) is that the player has been completely changed. Quick rewind/fast forward has been removed. With the old HBO Max app, I could simply click the left/right sides of the remote during playback to quickly move backward or forward. Now with the new Max app, I can only do quick rewinds/forwards by pausing first. This issue is compounded by the fact that resuming playback after pausing always jumps the video forward by a few seconds, so I can never actually resume the video exactly where I left off, and I can never skip to exactly where intended. The main reason I usually like to do a quick rewind is to listen again to something I missed, but when the video jumps forward upon resuming playback, I still end up missing what I'm trying to listen to, which is needlessly frustrating. The issue with the video jumping too far forward also happens when skipping intros. Whenever I hit the option to skip an intro or an ad, the beginning of the episode is cut off as it skips forward too far. This becomes very obvious with fast paced shows that have dialogue the moment the episode starts, as I usually end up missing the first half of a sentence of dialogue after skipping an intro. So then I end up pausing, doing a quick rewind, and then being forced to watch part of the ad and/or intro just so I can actually see the beginning of an episode. The player is just so much clunkier than it needs to be now, especially considering the player was perfect the way it was in the original HBO Max app. Developers, if you're reading this, please consider fixing this in a future update by reverting to the original player from the HBO Max app.
Title: Please bring back the original player controls

Content: Who is the marketing genius? That thought people weren‚Äôt gonna confuse this with Cinemax? The  channel that HBO has been in competition with since premium cable was invented. I hate the blue I loved the purple I understand whoever made the choice to change it to blue doesn‚Äôt like purple and that‚Äôs why they did it. They did not think of your consumer base when they did that. if someone is not being fired over this change, they really need to be but I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôre getting fat raises and bonuses because of it because in house you‚Äôre thinking this was a good launch. there was zero reason to make people download another app. My TV could not figure out how to do it. I downloaded the app about six times before it actually took and that‚Äôs not an old TV that‚Äôs a new TV so it shouldn‚Äôt of had any trouble and after I download it, it would get confused on which apt actually open, even when I would click the Max app, which makes no sense since they‚Äôre supposedly two different apps.   Add to the fact that nothing is sorted the same way either so I can‚Äôt find anything now which is also irritating. Unless it was actually in my list I got no idea how you guys are sorting things. On HBO max everything was broken down really nicely into different categories and now it‚Äôs just all lumped together and I hate that. Again unless you guys have merged with Cinemax which I couldn‚Äôt find any news on there was zero reason not to just call this HBO. Drop everything else, drop the go, drop the now, drop the whatever and just call it HBO. Why is that so difficult we don‚Äôt need plus we don‚Äôt need add we don‚Äôt need any of that discovery or whatever just call it HBO and let that be the end of it even if you‚Äôve merged with whatever but since you are not merging with Cinemax, there was no reason to call it Max.  With all that said, if you need a new person to take over whomever made this decision I am your girl. I got qualifications and got degrees with over 30 years work experience. I got whatever you need and you can pay me 75% whatever you paid the person that made the decision to call this Max and I‚Äôll be fine with it. I don‚Äôt even need a bonus but I‚Äôll take it and I guarantee you I can make it a better app than anybody who decided to call this Max and confuse people thinking it‚Äôs Cinemax.
Title: Oh this isn‚Äôt Cinemax aka Skinemax?
